    –£ –Ω–∞—Å —á–µ—Ç–∫–∏–µ –≤—ã—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å—ã, –º–∏–Ω–∏–º–∏–∑–∏—Ä—É—é—â–∏–µ –ª–∏—à–Ω–∏–π —Å—Ç—Ä–µ—Å—Å –Ω–∞ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–µ. –î—Ä—É–∂–Ω–∞—è –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞, –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–∞—è –æ–±—É—á–∞—Ç—å –∏ –ø—Ä–∏—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç—å –Ω–∞ –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å. –ú—ã —Å–æ–≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–Ω–æ –æ–±—Å—É–∂–¥–∞–µ–º –∏ —Ä–µ—à–∞–µ–º –ø—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º—ã –Ω–∞ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–µ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–∞ –º–µ—Ä–∏—Ç–æ–∫—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–∏ –∏–¥–µ–π.

    –í —Å–≤—è–∑–∏ —Å —Ä–∞—Å—à–∏—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º —à—Ç–∞—Ç–∞ –∏ –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–æ–º –Ω–æ–≤—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–æ–≤ –≤–µ–¥—ë—Ç—Å—è –ø–æ–¥–±–æ—Ä –Ω–∞ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—é –°–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–Ω—ã–π –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç–æ—Ä Linux/ DevOps engineer.

    –û–±—è–∑–∞–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏:

    • –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—É. –†–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —Å –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–µ–π –∫–∞–∫ —Å –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–Ω—ã–º –∫–æ–¥–æ–º (IaC);
    • –æ–±—Å–ª—É–∂–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å–µ—Ä–≤–µ—Ä—ã (Linux);
    • –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å—ã CI/CD;
    • –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞ –∏ –ª–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è;
    –¢—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è:
    • –≤—ã—Å—à–µ–µ –æ–±—Ä–∞–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ;
    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è Linux, –≤–ª–∞–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç–æ–≤—ã–º–∏ —è–∑—ã–∫–∞–º–∏ (bash);
    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ WEB —Å–µ—Ä–≤–µ—Ä–æ–≤ (nginx, php-fpm) –∏ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–µ—Ä–æ–≤ –ë–î (MySQL);
    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ Zabbix –∏ Grafana;
    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ IaC, –∑–Ω–∞–∫–æ–º—Å—Ç–≤–æ —Å Ansible;
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—Ä–æ–ª—è –≤–µ—Ä—Å–∏–π (Gitlab), –Ω–µ–ø—Ä–µ—Ä—ã–≤–Ω–æ–π –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ (Gitlab CI);
    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–π –∏ –ø—Ä–æ—Ç–æ–∫–æ–ª–æ–≤: TCP/IP, HTTP, SSL/TLS, –≤–∏—Ä—Ç—É–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è (QEMU-KVM, LXC), —Ñ–∞–π–ª–æ–≤—ã–µ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã (LVM, ZFS, ext3/4), DNS.

    –ë—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–ª—é—Å–æ–º, –µ—Å–ª–∏ –µ—Å—Ç—å –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Docker –∏ Kubernates, –æ–ø—ã—Ç –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ ELK –∏ Graylog, –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ PHP –∏–ª–∏ Python.

    –£—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è:
    • –æ—Ñ–∏—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ —Ç—Ä—É–¥–æ—É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤–æ;
    • "–±–µ–ª–∞—è" –∑–∞—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–Ω–∞—è –ø–ª–∞—Ç–∞ –æ—Ç 120 000 —Ä—É–±. ("–Ω–∞ —Ä—É–∫–∏" –æ—Ç 104 000 —Ä—É–±.);
    • –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã 5/2, —Å 9-00 –¥–æ 18-00;
    • –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ–µ –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ;
    • –∫–æ–º—Ñ–æ—Ä—Ç–Ω—ã–µ —É—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è —Ç—Ä—É–¥–∞;
    • –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–∞—è —Å–∫–∏–¥–∫–∞ –Ω–∞ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ü–∏—é –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏;
    • –≥–∏–±—Ä–∏–¥–Ω—ã–π —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã (–æ—Ñ–∏—Å/—É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–∫–∞).


  19. Senior Frontend —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫ (—É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ) ("–¢–µ—á—Å–µ–π–Ω", –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞) map[currency:RUR from: gross:false to:350000] [ 2022-05-22 ]
    ... —Å–æ–±–µ—Å–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è; –ü–æ–ª–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–∞—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ (–≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫ –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω–æ...

    –í –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç –ø–æ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–µ c–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å-–∞–≥—Ä–µ–≥–∞—Ç–æ—Ä–∞ –ø—Å–∏—Ö–æ—Ç–µ—Ä–∞–ø–µ–≤—Ç–æ–≤ —Ç—Ä–µ–±—É–µ—Ç—Å—è Frontend —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫.

    –û –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–µ:
    –ü—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–µ–¥—É—Å–º–æ—Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–æ –¥–ª—è –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–π, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–º –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º–∞ –ø—Å–∏—Ö–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∞—è –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å, –∞ —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –¥–ª—è –≤—Ä–∞—á–µ–π, –∂–µ–ª–∞—é—â–∏—Ö –æ–∫–∞–∑—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å —ç—Ç—É –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å –æ–Ω–ª–∞–π–Ω.

    *–î–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é —Å–∞–º–æ—Ñ–∏–Ω–∞–Ω—Å–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω –∏ –Ω–µ –∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏—Ç –æ—Ç –ø—Ä–∏–≤–ª–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–≤ —Å—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–Ω–Ω–∏—Ö –∏–Ω–≤–µ—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–≤.

    –û–±—è–∑–∞–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏:
    • –ù–µ–ø–æ—Å—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–µ —É—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏–µ –≤ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–µ —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è
      1. –¢–µ—Å–Ω–∞—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ —Å –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–º;
      2. –†–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ —à–∞–±–ª–æ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–π;
      3. –†–µ—Ñ–∞–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥ —Å—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤—É—é—â–µ–≥–æ SPA;
      4. –í –¥–∞–ª—å–Ω–µ–π—à–µ–º –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Ö–æ–¥ –Ω–∞ micro FE;
      5. –†–µ–≤—å—é –∫–æ–¥–∞;
      6. –ù–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏—Å—Ö–æ–¥–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–æ–¥–∞ –∏ –µ–≥–æ –ø–æ–∫—Ä—ã—Ç–∏–µ Unit —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∞–º–∏;
      7. –†–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∫—Ä–∏—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏ –≤–∞–∂–Ω—ã—Ö –≤–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å–æ–≤ –∏ –ø—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º;

    • –£—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏–µ –≤ –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ–º —Ü–∏–∫–ª–µ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏
      1. –§–æ—Ä–º–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ç—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–π;
      2. –ü–ª–∞–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–µ–ª–∏–∑–æ–≤;
      3. –û—Ü–µ–Ω–∫–∞ –≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–∏ –∏ —Ç—Ä—É–¥–æ—ë–º–∫–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á;
      4. –î–µ–∫–æ–º–ø–æ–∑–∏—Ü–∏—è –æ–±—ä—ë–º–Ω—ã—Ö –∑–∞–¥–∞—á;
      5. –û—Ç—Å–ª–µ–∂–∏–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è –∑–∞–¥–∞—á;
      6. –£—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏–µ –≤ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–µ—Ä—Ç—ã–≤–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –∞—Ä—Ç–µ—Ñ–∞–∫—Ç–æ–≤;

    • –í–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏–µ —Å –∫—Ä–æ—Å—Å-—Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–π –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–æ–π —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–æ–≤, —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤—â–∏–∫–æ–≤, –±–∏–∑–Ω–µ—Å-–∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏—Ç–∏–∫–æ–≤ –∏ UX/UI –¥–∏–∑–∞–π–Ω–µ—Ä–æ–≤.

    –¢—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è:

    • –û–±—â–∏–π –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ –æ—Ç 4 –ª–µ—Ç;

    • –û—Ç–ª–∏—á–Ω–æ–µ –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏ –ø—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ CSS/HTML.

    • –•–æ—Ä–æ—à–∏–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è —Å–æ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ JavaScript –∏/–∏–ª–∏ TypeScript.

    • RxJs, Redux, SASS

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π –≤ —Ñ—Ä–µ–π–º–≤–æ—Ä–∫–µ React.

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –ø–æ–¥–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è REST APIs –≤–æ frontend`–µ.

    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ —à–∞–±–ª–æ–Ω–æ–≤ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ –∏—Ö –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ –≤ –ø–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω–∏–∏ –≤–µ–± –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π.

    • –ü—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫–∞ –∏ —É–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —Å —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–º–∏ –≤–µ—Ä—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è.

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Webpack.

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Azure DevOps;

    • –£–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø–ª–∞–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å–≤–æ–µ –≤—Ä–µ–º—è –∏ —Å–æ–±–ª—é–¥–∞—Ç—å –¥–æ–≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏.

    –ë—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–ª—é—Å–æ–º:

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –æ–ø—Ç–∏–º–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∏ —É–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ –≤—ã—è–≤–ª—è—Ç—å —É–∑–∫–∏–µ –º–µ—Å—Ç–∞ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã;

    • –•–æ—Ä–æ—à–∏–µ –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏;

    • –¶–µ–ª–µ—É—Å—Ç—Ä–µ–º–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å, —à–∏—Ä–æ–∫–∏–π –∫—Ä—É–≥–æ–∑–æ—Ä, –∂–µ–ª–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏–∑—É—á–∞—Ç—å –Ω–æ–≤—ã–µ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–∏, —Å–æ–≤–µ—Ä—à–µ–Ω—Å—Ç–≤–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è.

    –£—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è:

    • –û–∫–ª–∞–¥ –¥–æ 350.000 —Ä—É–±. –ø–æ –∏—Ç–æ–≥–∞–º —Å–æ–±–µ—Å–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è;

    • –ü–æ–ª–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–∞—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ (–≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫ –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã 9-18 —á–∞—Å–æ–≤ –ø–æ –º—Å–∫);

    • –†–∞—Å—Å–º–æ—Ç—Ä–∏–º –∫–∞–Ω–¥–∏–¥–∞—Ç–æ–≤ –∏–∑ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏—Ö –≥–æ—Ä–æ–¥–æ–≤ (–Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –≤ —Ä–µ–ª–æ–∫–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –Ω–µ—Ç);

    • –°–≤–æ–µ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω–∞—è –æ–ø–ª–∞—Ç–∞.

    –ï—Å–ª–∏ –≤–∞–º –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–µ–Ω –Ω–∞—à –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç, –∏ –¥–ª—è –≤–∞—Å –≤–∞–∂–Ω—ã —Ç–∞–∫–∏–µ —Ñ–∞–∫—Ç–æ—Ä—ã, –∫–∞–∫: —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å, –ª–æ–≥–∏—á–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥–∞ –∫ –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—é –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏, –∫–æ–º–ø–µ—Ç–µ–Ω—Ç–Ω–æ–µ —Ä—É–∫–æ–≤–æ–¥—Å—Ç–≤–æ –∏ —É–≤–∞–∂–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ –æ—Ç–Ω–æ—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ, —Ç–æ –≤–∞–º –∏–º–µ–Ω–Ω–æ —Å—é–¥–∞!


  20. Full-Stack Developer at Aura (ironSource) ("–û–Ω –ó—ç –°–ø–æ—Ç –î–µ–≤–µ–ª–æ–ø–º–µ–Ω—Ç", –ü–æ–ª—å—à–∞) [ 2022-05-22 ]
    ... courses - 2 times a week (at the pandemic time - remotely); Full legal and accounting support in Poland....

    We are looking for an experienced and talented Full-Stack Developer to join our highly skilled team.

    About the company:

    Hello, we are Aura!

    We are an ironSource‚Äôs market standard for creating rich device experiences that engage and retain customers. With a powerful set of solutions, Aura enables complete digital transformation, letting operators promote key services outside the store, directly on device.

    Responsibilities:

    • Work as part of a full-stack agile team, working in high velocity, and delivering great quality on a daily basis

    • Design, implement and innovate features using cutting-edge technologies

    • Be responsible for developing and designing major features as well as building new services from scratch

    • Work closely with the product, architects, DevOps, and automation teams

    • Develop & implement tests for ensuring the quality, performance & scalability of our products

    • Architect, develop and maintain high performance, resilient UI using React.js

    • Work with UX team to translate the design into reusable and accessible components using our existing design system

    Requirements:

    • +2 years of experience with web development in React

    • +2 years of experience with backend development in Node.js

    • Practical experience in the design and architecture of large-scale systems

    • Excellent interpersonal skills, we‚Äôre looking for a real team player

    • Be an independent self-learner, responsible and curious

    • Write understandable, testable code with an eye toward maintainability

    • Upper-Intermediate English level

    Will be a plus:

    • Working knowledge of databases (MySQL, MemSQL, Redis, PostgreSQL)

    • Application security knowledge (CSRF, SQL injections, XSS, JWT, etc.)

    • Awareness of microservice architectures

    • Experience with AWS services (Cognito, S3, Dynamo, SNS)

    What we offer:

    • Work in a highly professional team. Informal and friendly atmosphere in the team;
    • Additional compensation benefits;
    • 4 additional Friday-days off during the year;
    • Training/Courses: OTS compensates 50% of costs for various courses, certifications, proficiency exams, and attendance of professional events initiated by employees or Customers;
    • Paid vacation - 25 calendar days, 100% sick leave payment;
    • 5 sick days per year;
    • Inflation-protected wages with a regular revision of compensation conditions;
    • Medical insurance in Luxmed (after the end of the probationary period);
    • English courses - 2 times a week (at the pandemic time - remotely);
    • Full legal and accounting support in Poland.


  21. Middle System Analyst | remote ("HEADS and HANDS", –ö—Ä–∞—Å–Ω–æ—è—Ä—Å–∫) [ 2022-05-22 ]
    ...±–æ—Ç—ã –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –∏–∑ –ª—é–±–æ–≥–æ –≥–æ—Ä–æ–¥–∞, –≥–∏–±–∫–æ–µ ...

    Heads and Hands ‚Äî –ø–µ—Ä–≤–∞—è –≤ –†–æ—Å—Å–∏–∏ —Å—Ç—É–¥–∏—è —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ —Ü–∏—Ñ—Ä–æ–≤—ã—Ö —ç–∫–æ—Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º. –†–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–æ–≤—ã–≤–∞–µ–º –∏ –≤—ã–≤–æ–¥–∏–º –Ω–∞ —Ä—ã–Ω–æ–∫ —Å–ª–æ–∂–Ω—ã–µ –≤–µ–±-—Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å—ã, –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏ —Å—É–ø–µ—Ä-–∞–ø–ø—ã.

    –ú—ã –¥–µ–ª–∞–µ–º –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç—ã –¥–ª—è –ö–∞—Å–ø–µ—Ä—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ, Land Rover, Lamoda, Leroy Merlin, 12 Storeez, –°–ø–æ—Ä—Ç–º–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–∞ –∏ —Ç.–¥. –ü–æ–º–æ–≥–ª–∏ —Å –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∞–º–∏ –Ø–Ω–¥–µ–∫—Å—É, ABBYY, Mail.Ru –∏ –¢–∏–Ω—å–∫–æ—Ñ—Ñ. –ê –µ—â–µ –º—ã –≤—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º –≤ —Ç–æ–ø-5 —Å—Ä–µ–¥–∏ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–æ–≤ –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π –ø–æ –≤–µ—Ä—Å–∏–∏ Tagline, –∏ —ç—Ç–æ –æ—á–µ–Ω—å –ø—Ä–∏—è—Ç–Ω–æ :)

    –ù–∞—á–∏–Ω–∞–ª–∏ –º—ã –≤ –¥–∞–ª–µ–∫–æ–º 2012 –∫–∞–∫ –Ω–µ–±–æ–ª—å—à–æ–π —Å—Ç–∞—Ä—Ç–∞–ø, —Å–µ–π—á–∞—Å —è–≤–ª—è–µ–º—Å—è –æ–¥–Ω–æ–π –∏–∑ –∫—Ä—É–ø–Ω–µ–π—à–∏—Ö –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–π –≤ –†–æ—Å—Å–∏–∏ –≤ –æ–±–ª–∞—Å—Ç–∏ –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ–π —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏, –∏ –∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ –≤—ã—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º –Ω–∞ –º–µ–∂–¥—É–Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–Ω—ã–π —Ä—ã–Ω–æ–∫. –£ –Ω–∞—Å 4 –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–∞ (–≤ –ü–∏—Ç–µ—Ä–µ, –°–∞—Ä–∞–Ω—Å–∫–µ, –ù–æ–≤–æ—Å–∏–±–∏—Ä—Å–∫–µ –∏ –°–∞—Ä–∞—Ç–æ–≤–µ) –∏ —Å–≤–æ–∏ —à–∫–æ–ª—ã —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ –∏ —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è. –ù–∞—à–∞ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞ –∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ —Ä–∞—Å—à–∏—Ä—è–µ—Ç—Å—è, –∏ –º—ã –∏—â–µ–º —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏—Ç–∏–∫–∞.

    –ß—Ç–æ —Ç—ã –±—É–¥–µ—à—å –¥–µ–ª–∞—Ç—å:

    • –†–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–Ω—É—é –¥–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ü–∏—é: —Å—Ö–µ–º—ã, —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ –∑–∞–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è –Ω–∞ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫—É API –∏–ª–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –∏ –≤–µ–±-–ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π

    • –ü—Ä–æ–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç—å —Ä–µ–≤—å—é –¥–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–Ω—ã—Ö –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏—Ç–∏–∫–æ–≤

    • –ü—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã –∏ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –º–µ–∂–¥—É –Ω–∏–º–∏

    • –î–µ–ª–∏—Ç—å—Å—è –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è–º–∏ –∏ —É—á–∞—Å—Ç–≤–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –≤ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–∏ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞

    –ß—Ç–æ –∂–¥–µ–º –æ—Ç —Ç–µ–±—è:

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –æ—Ç 2-—Ö –ª–µ—Ç

    • –£–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ –æ–±—ä—è—Å–Ω—è—Ç—å —Å–ª–æ–∂–Ω—ã–µ –≤–µ—â–∏ –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç—ã–º —è–∑—ã–∫–æ–º

    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∫–ª—é—á–µ–≤—ã—Ö —Å—Ç–∞–Ω–¥–∞—Ä—Ç–æ–≤ (OpenAPI, HTTP, WS, REST, SOAP) –∏ –Ω–æ—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–π (BPMN, UML);

    • –£–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ —á–∏—Ç–∞—Ç—å, –≤–æ—Å—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–∞–≤–ª–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –¥–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ü–∏—é –ø–æ API, —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å—ã (—á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ Swagger / Postman);

    • –ù–∞–≤—ã–∫ –æ—Ä–≥–∞–Ω–∏–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å, –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—Ä–æ–ª–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å, —É–ª—É—á—à–∞—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –Ω–µ–±–æ–ª—å—à–æ–π –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã

    • –ì–æ—Ç–æ–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–∑–±–∏—Ä–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –≤ –Ω–æ–≤—ã—Ö –∏ –Ω–µ–∑–Ω–∞–∫–æ–º—ã—Ö –º–µ—Ç–æ–¥–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—è—Ö, —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—è—Ö –∏ –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥–∞—Ö

    –ü—Ä–µ–∏–º—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ–º –±—É–¥–µ—Ç:

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –≤ —Ä–æ–ª–∏ –º–µ–Ω–µ–¥–∂–µ—Ä–∞ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∞ / —Ç–∏–º–ª–∏–¥–∞ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã / –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—è —Å—Ç–∞—Ä—Ç–∞–ø–∞

    • –ù–∞–≤—ã–∫–∏ –¥–µ–ª–æ–≤–æ–≥–æ –æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–ø–∏—Å–∫–∏

    • –£–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Ä—É–∫–æ–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç—å –≤ —É—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è—Ö –≥–æ—Ä–∏–∑–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–π —Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–∫—Ç–∏–≤–∞

    • –ü–æ—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –∏ –ø—É–Ω–∫—Ç—É–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å

    –¢–µ–±–µ –ø—Ä–∏–≥–æ–¥—è—Ç—Å—è:

    • –ù–∞–≤—ã–∫–∏ —Å–∞–º–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã, —Ç—Ä—É–¥–æ–≤–∞—è –¥–∏—Å—Ü–∏–ø–ª–∏–Ω–∞, –æ—Ä–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –Ω–∞ —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç, –∞ –Ω–µ –Ω–∞ –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å

    • –£–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–∏–∑–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å, –ø–ª–∞–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å, –¥–µ–ª–µ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏

    • –£–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ –æ–±—â–∞—Ç—å—Å—è —Å —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–º–∏ —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏—Å—Ç–∞–º–∏ (—Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–∏, —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤—â–∏–∫–∏, DevOps —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏—Å—Ç—ã)

    –ß—Ç–æ –º—ã –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ–º:

    • –û—Ñ–∏—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ –æ—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏ –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é –±–µ–ª–∞—è –∑/–ø

    • –§–∏–∫—Å–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π –æ–∫–ª–∞–¥ (–æ–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª—è–µ–º —Å –∫–∞–Ω–¥–∏–¥–∞—Ç–æ–º –ø–æ –∏—Ç–æ–≥–∞–º —Ç–µ—Ö. —Å–æ–±–µ—Å–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è)

    • –î–ú–° —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ –≥–æ–¥ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã

    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –∏–∑ –ª—é–±–æ–≥–æ –≥–æ—Ä–æ–¥–∞, –≥–∏–±–∫–æ–µ –Ω–∞—á–∞–ª–æ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–µ–≥–æ –¥–Ω—è (—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ - —Å 9:00 –¥–æ 11:30 –º—Å–∫, –Ω–æ –≤—Å–µ –æ–±—Å—É–∂–¥–∞–µ–º–æ:)

    • –ß–∞—Å—Ç–∏—á–Ω—É—é/–ø–æ–ª–Ω—É—é –ø–ª–∞—Ç—É –æ–±—É—á–∞—é—â–∏—Ö –º–∞—Ç–µ—Ä–∏–∞–ª–æ–≤, –±–∏–ª–µ—Ç–æ–≤ –Ω–∞ –ª–µ–∫—Ü–∏–∏ –∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∏ –ø–æ —Ç–≤–æ–µ–º—É –∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å—É

    • –†–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ –Ω–∞–¥ –∫—Ä—É–ø–Ω—ã–º, —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏ —Å–ª–æ–∂–Ω—ã–º —Ñ–∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–æ–º –¥–ª—è –æ–¥–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∏–∑ —Ç–æ–ø–æ–≤—ã—Ö –±–∞–Ω–∫–æ–≤ –≤ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–µ –æ–ø—ã—Ç–Ω—ã—Ö –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏—Ç–∏–∫–æ–≤, —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–æ–≤, QA, –¥–∏–∑–∞–π–Ω–µ—Ä–æ–≤ –∏ –ø—Ä–æ–¥–∂–µ–∫—Ç-–º–µ–Ω–µ–¥–∂–µ—Ä–∞ - —Ä–µ–±—è—Ç–∞ –≤—Å–µ–≥–¥–∞ –Ω–∞ —Å–≤—è–∑–∏ –∏ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤—ã –ø–æ–º–æ—á—å, –µ—Å–ª–∏ –≤–æ–∑–Ω–∏–∫–∞—é—Ç —Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏

    • –í–µ—Å–µ–ª—ã–µ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∫–∏ –∫ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–µ –∏ —Ç–∏–º–ª–∏–¥–∞–º (–µ—Å–ª–∏ —Å–æ–≤–ø–∞–¥–∞–µ—Ç –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç—å –∏ –∂–µ–ª–∞–Ω–∏–µ)

    –ï—Å–ª–∏ –≤—Å–µ –æ–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–µ –≤—ã—à–µ —Ç–µ–±–µ –±–ª–∏–∑–∫–æ –∏ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–Ω–æ, –º—ã –±—É–¥–µ–º —Ä–∞–¥—ã —Å–æ–ø—Ä–æ–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–º—É –ø–∏—Å—å–º—É —Å –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç–æ–º –Ω–∞ —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏–µ –≤–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å—ã:

    –í –Ω–µ—Å–∫–æ–ª—å–∫–∏—Ö –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è—Ö, –≤ –ø–∞—Ä–µ –∞–±–∑–∞—Ü–µ–≤ –æ–ø–∏—à–∏ (—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–æ), –∫–∞–∫–æ–µ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–µ –∑–∞–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ç—ã –ø–∏—Å–∞–ª? –ß—Ç–æ –≤ –Ω–µ–º –±—ã–ª–æ? –ö–∞–∫–∏–µ —Å—Ç–∞–Ω–¥–∞—Ä—Ç—ã, –Ω–æ—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏ —Ç—ã –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–ª? –ö–∞–∫ –≤—ã–≥–ª—è–¥–µ–ª –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å —Å–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –¢–ó?


  22. DevOps engineer ("–¢1 –ö–æ–Ω—Å–∞–ª—Ç–∏–Ω–≥", –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞) [ 2022-05-22 ]
    ...—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å –≤ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–µ –∏–ª–∏ –Ω–∞ —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–∫–µ. ...

    –¢1 –ö–æ–Ω—Å–∞–ª—Ç–∏–Ω–≥ ‚Äì —Ä–æ—Å—Å–∏–π—Å–∫–∞—è –ò–¢-–∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è, —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏–∑–∏—Ä—É–µ—Ç—Å—è –Ω–∞ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–º –∫–æ–Ω—Å–∞–ª—Ç–∏–Ω–≥–µ –∏ –≤–Ω–µ–¥—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–∏ –±–∏–∑–Ω–µ—Å-–ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π.

    –ö–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–µ—Ç –∏ –≤–Ω–µ–¥—Ä—è–µ—Ç –º–Ω–æ–≥–æ–∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–Ω—ã–µ —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è, –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –Ω–∞ —Å–∞–º–æ–º –∞–∫—Ç—É–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–º —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–º —Å—Ç–µ–∫–µ, –≤ —Ç–æ–º —á–∏—Å–ª–µ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç—ã –º–∏—Ä–æ–≤—ã—Ö –∏ —Ä–æ—Å—Å–∏–π—Å–∫–∏—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–∏–∑–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª–µ–π –±–∏–∑–Ω–µ—Å-–ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π: Oracle, SAP, 1C, Arenadata, Directum, Terrasoft, –¶–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä —Ä–µ—á–µ–≤—ã—Ö —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–π –∏ –¥—Ä.

    –°—Ä–µ–¥–∏ –∑–∞–∫–∞–∑—á–∏–∫–æ–≤ –¢1 –ö–æ–Ω—Å–∞–ª—Ç–∏–Ω–≥ ‚Äì –∫—Ä—É–ø–Ω–µ–π—à–∏–µ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –∫–ª—é—á–µ–≤—ã—Ö –æ—Ç—Ä–∞—Å–ª–µ–π —ç–∫–æ–Ω–æ–º–∏–∫–∏: –±–∞–Ω–∫–∏ –∏ —Ñ–∏–Ω–∞–Ω—Å–æ–≤—ã–µ –æ—Ä–≥–∞–Ω–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏, —Ç–æ–ø–ª–∏–≤–Ω–æ-—ç–Ω–µ—Ä–≥–µ—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ –∏ —Ç–æ—Ä–≥–æ–≤—ã–µ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ø—Ä–∏—è—Ç–∏—è.

    –°–µ–π—á–∞—Å –º—ã –∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏–≤–∞–µ–º—Å—è –∏ –±—É–¥–µ–º —Ä–∞–¥—ã –ø—Ä–∏–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –≤ –Ω–∞—à–µ–π –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–µ DevOps engineer –¥–ª—è —É—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏—è –≤ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–∏ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∞ –¥–ª—è –æ–¥–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∏–∑ –Ω–∞—à–∏—Ö –∑–∞–∫–∞–∑—á–∏–∫–æ–≤.

    –û–±—è–∑–∞–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏:

    • –ü–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω–∏–µ CI/CD –¥–ª—è –Ω–æ–≤—ã—Ö –º–∏–∫—Ä–æ—Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤;
    • –ê–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è pipeline ML;
    • –û–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –±–µ—Å–ø–µ—Ä–µ–±–æ–π–Ω–æ–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–æ–Ω–∞–≥—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤;
    • –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ —Å—Ä–µ–¥ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ –∏ —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è.

    –¢—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è:

    • –≠–∫—Å–ø–µ—Ä—Ç–Ω—ã–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è –û–° Linux;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–∑–≤—ë—Ä—Ç—ã–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ —ç–∫—Å–ø–ª—É–∞—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏ CI/CD;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—è–º–∏ –≤–∏—Ä—Ç—É–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–π–Ω–µ—Ä–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–æ–≤ –∂–∏–∑–Ω–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ü–∏–∫–ª–∞ –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏—Ö –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π –∏ –º–æ–¥–µ–ª–µ–π –º–∞—à–∏–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –Ω–∞ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∞—Ö —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏—Ö —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–π –Ω–µ –º–µ–Ω–µ–µ 2-—Ö –ª–µ—Ç;
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥–æ–≤ –∏ –æ–ø—ã—Ç –∏–Ω–¥—É—Å—Ç—Ä–∏–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏—Ö –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π –∏ –º–æ–¥–µ–ª–µ–π –º–∞—à–∏–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è, ModelOps;
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è Python –∏ —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç–æ–≤—ã—Ö —è–∑—ã–∫–æ–≤ –≤ —á–∞—Å—Ç–∏ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –≤ ModelOps –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–∞—Ö;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–∑–≤–µ—Ä—Ç—ã–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ —ç–∫—Å–ø–ª—É–∞—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏ JupyterHub;
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ SQL, –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –æ–¥–Ω–æ–π –∏–∑ —Ä–µ–ª—è—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –°–£–ë–î.

    –£—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è:

    • –ú—ã –∫—Ä—É–ø–Ω–∞—è, —Å—Ç–∞–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–∞—è IT –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è, —É –Ω–∞—Å –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç—ã;

    • –ì–∏–±–∫–∏–π –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥ –∫ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–µ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–∞, –æ—Ç—Å—É—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–∏–µ –∂–µ—Å—Ç–∫–∏—Ö —Ç—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–π –∫ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–µ –Ω–∞ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–µ;

    • –°–æ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–∏, –∫—Ä—É—Ç—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç—ã —Å –Ω—É–ª—è –∏ —É–Ω–∏–∫–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –¥–ª—è —Ä—ã–Ω–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç—ã;

    • –ü–æ–ª–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é "–±–µ–ª–æ–µ" –æ—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏ –ó–ü;

    • –ú—ã –∑–∞–±–æ—Ç–∏–º—Å—è –æ –∑–¥–æ—Ä–æ–≤—å–µ ‚Äì –î–ú–° –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ –∏—Å–ø—ã—Ç–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å—Ä–æ–∫–∞;

    • –£–¥–æ–±–Ω—ã–π –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã, —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–∏–π –¥–µ–Ω—å –Ω–∞—á–∏–Ω–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –≤ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–≤–∞–ª–µ —Å 09:00 ‚Äì 11:00;

    • –ï—Å—Ç—å –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å –≤ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–µ –∏–ª–∏ –Ω–∞ —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–∫–µ.


  23. Backend/DevOps –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä (Python) ("–ì—Ä—É–ø–ø–∞ –°–∞–º–æ–ª–µ—Ç", –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞) [ 2022-05-22 ]

    –ü—Ä–∏–≥–ª–∞—à–∞–µ–º –Ω–∞ –ø–æ–∑–∏—Ü–∏—é ‚Äì Backend/DevOps –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä

    –ü—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç: –∫—Ä—É—Ç–∞—è HR-–ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞ —Å "–Ω—É–ª—è"

    –°–µ–π—á–∞—Å –º—ã —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞—ë–º —Ü–∏—Ñ—Ä–æ–≤—É—é –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º—É, –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—É—é –Ω–∞ CJM –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑–µ –ø—É—Ç–∏ —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏, —Ä—É–∫–æ–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª–µ–π, –≤–Ω–µ—à–Ω–∏—Ö –∫–∞–Ω–¥–∏–¥–∞—Ç–æ–≤ –∏ –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–π, –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É—è –∏–º–µ—é—â–∏–π—Å—è –≤ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–µ –±–æ–ª—å—à–æ–π –æ–ø—ã—Ç –ø–æ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–µ —Å –º–µ–∂–¥—É–Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–Ω—ã–º–∏ –∏ —Ä–æ—Å—Å–∏–π—Å–∫–∏–º–∏ —Ü–∏—Ñ—Ä–æ–≤—ã–º–∏ HR-–ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞–º–∏ –∏ –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω—è—è –ª—É—á—à–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫–∏ –∫ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–µ —Ü–∏—Ñ—Ä–æ–≤—ã—Ö —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–π

    –í–∞—à–∞ –∑–æ–Ω–∞ –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏:

    • –°–æ–≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–Ω–æ —Å –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–æ–π —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä—É –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–∞, –≤–∫–ª—é—á–∞—è –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä—Ñ–µ–π—Å—ã, –≤–µ–±-—Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å—ã, –ø—Ä–æ–º–µ–∂—É—Ç–æ—á–Ω–æ–µ –ü–û –∏ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–µ—Ä–∞
    • –î–µ–ø–ª–æ–∏—Ç—å –∏ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å–º–µ–∂–Ω–æ–µ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–Ω–æ–µ –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ: —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã —Ç—Ä–µ–∫–∏–Ω–≥–∞ –æ—à–∏–±–æ–∫, –ª–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è, –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞ –∏ —Ç.–¥
    • –ü–∏—Å–∞—Ç—å –≥—Ä–∞–º–æ—Ç–Ω—ã–π, —Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π –∏ –¥–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π –∫–æ–¥, –≤–∫–ª—é—á–∞—è unit —Ç–µ—Å—Ç—ã
    • –£—á–∞—Å—Ç–≤–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –≤ code review
    • –ê–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ –≤–∫–ª—é—á–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –≤ –æ–±—Å—É–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏—è –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω—è–µ–º—ã—Ö —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–π –∏ —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–π, –∏—Å–∫–∞—Ç—å –ø—É—Ç–∏ —É–ª—É—á—à–µ–Ω–∏—è –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–∞
    • –£—á–∞—Å—Ç–≤–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –≤ –ø–ª–∞–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–∏, –æ—Ü–µ–Ω–∫–µ –∏ –Ω–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á
    • –£–ª—É—á—à–∞—Ç—å —Å—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤—É—é—â–∏–µ –∏ –∏—Å–∫–∞—Ç—å –Ω–æ–≤—ã–µ –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä–Ω—ã–µ —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è –¥–ª—è –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–æ–≤ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏

    –ù–∞—à–∏ –ø–æ–∂–µ–ª–∞–Ω–∏—è:

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –ø—Ä–æ–º—ã—à–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ –Ω–∞ Python, –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Å Django Framework –æ—Ç 2-—Ö –ª–µ—Ç –æ–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ
    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–æ–≤ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã python –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π –≤ production
    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–æ–≤ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –ë–î –≤ production, –∞ —Ç–∞–∫ –∂–µ —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–æ–≤ –æ–ø—Ç–∏–º–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∏—Ö —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–∏–ª–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ –æ–ø—Ç–∏–º–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ python –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–º–∏ –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞ –∏ –ª–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å docker/k8s/helm –æ–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–Ω
    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–æ–≤ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ –ü–û
    • –£–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ –±—ã—Å—Ç—Ä–æ –æ—Å–≤–æ–∏—Ç—å –Ω–æ–≤—É—é —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—é, –ø—Ä–∏ –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç–∏
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å CI/CD —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–º–∏ (Gitlab CI) –æ–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–Ω

    –ú—ã –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ–º:

    • –û—Ñ–∏—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ —Ç—Ä—É–¥–æ—É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤–æ –∏ —Å–æ–±–ª—é–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ –¢–ö –†–§
    • –ì—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å 9:00 –¥–æ 18:00, –ø—è—Ç–Ω–∏—Ü–∞ ‚Äì —Å–æ–∫—Ä–∞—â–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π –¥–µ–Ω—å
    • –£–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –∏–ª–∏ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å –ë–¶ –ö—É–Ω—Ü–µ–≤–æ –ü–ª–∞–∑–∞, –º. –ú–æ–ª–æ–¥–µ–∂–Ω–∞—è (–∫—Å—Ç–∞—Ç–∏, –Ω–∞—à –æ—Ñ–∏—Å –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∏–ª –ø—Ä–µ–º–∏—é ¬´–¢—Ä–∞–Ω—Å—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏—è –≥–æ–¥–∞¬ª –≤ 2021–≥.)
    • –†–∞—Å—à–∏—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π –ø–∞–∫–µ—Ç –î–ú–° –∏ —Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ö–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –æ—Ç –Ω–µ—Å—á–∞—Å—Ç–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–ª—É—á–∞–µ–≤ —Å –ø–µ—Ä–≤–æ–≥–æ –º–µ—Å—è—Ü–∞ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã, –ª—å–≥–æ—Ç–Ω–æ–µ –î–ú–° –¥–ª—è –±–ª–∏–∑–∫–∏—Ö —Ä–æ–¥—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤, —Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ö–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏–º—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞ –∏ –ø—Ä.
    • –ö–æ–º–ø–µ–Ω—Å–∞—Ü–∏—è –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ–π —Å–≤—è–∑–∏ (–∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–∞—è —Å–∏–º-–∫–∞—Ä—Ç–∞) –¥–ª—è —Ç–µ—Ö, –∫–æ–º—É –Ω—É–∂–Ω–æ –≤—Å–µ–≥–¥–∞ –±—ã—Ç—å –Ω–∞ —Å–≤—è–∑–∏
    • –†–æ—Å—Ç –∏ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ –≤ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏: —Ä–µ–≥—É–ª—è—Ä–Ω–∞—è –æ–±—Ä–∞—Ç–Ω–∞—è —Å–≤—è–∑—å –∫–∞–∂–¥–æ–º—É —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫—É, –æ–±—É—á–∞—é—â–∏–µ –º–µ—Ä–æ–ø—Ä–∏—è—Ç–∏—è –∏ —à–∏—Ä–æ–∫–∏–π –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø –∫ –º–∞—Ç–µ—Ä–∏–∞–ª–∞–º, –≤ —Ç–æ–º —á–∏—Å–ª–µ –≤–µ–¥—É—â–∏—Ö –æ–±—Ä–∞–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º
    • –°–∫–∏–¥–∫–∏ –¥–ª—è —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤ –Ω–∞ –Ω–µ–¥–≤–∏–∂–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç—å –≥—Ä—É–ø–ø—ã ‚Äú–°–∞–º–æ–ª–µ—Ç‚Äù, –∏–Ω–¥–∏–≤–∏–¥—É–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ —É—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è –ø–æ —Ä–∞—Å—Å—Ä–æ—á–∫–µ


  24. Devops Engineer (—É–¥–∞–ª—ë–Ω–Ω–æ) –ì–æ–ª–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∞ ("–±–∏–ª–∞–π–Ω", –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞) [ 2022-05-22 ]

    ¬´–ë–∏–ª–∞–π–Ω¬ª —Å–µ–π—á–∞—Å ‚Äì –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏–∑–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–π. –í 2020 –º—ã –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ–ª–∏ –º–∞—Å—à—Ç–∞–±–Ω—É—é —Ä–µ—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—é –∏ –æ–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–∏–ª–∏ –¥–ª—è —Å–µ–±—è —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–µ—Ç—ã:

    • –¢–µ–ª–µ–∫–æ–º –∏ —Å–≤—è–∑—å - –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–∞ –±–∏–∑–Ω–µ—Å–∞, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—É—é –º—ã –ø–ª–∞–Ω–∏—Ä—É–µ–º –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å–∞–º–∏.
    • –†–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ –∫–ª—é—á–µ–≤—ã—Ö –ò–¢-–∫–æ–º–ø–µ—Ç–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–π –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏. –ú—ã –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ–ª–∏ –∏–Ω—Å–æ—Ä—Å —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã —Å–∞–º–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ –æ—Ç–≤–µ—á–∞—Ç—å –∑–∞ —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∏—Ä—É–µ–º.
    • –ö–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç –≤ –ø—Ä–∏–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–µ—Ç–µ. –í—Å–µ, —á—Ç–æ –º—ã –¥–µ–ª–∞–µ–º, –º—ã –¥–µ–ª–∞–µ–º –¥–ª—è –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞ –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–µ–≥–æ (—Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏, –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–≥–∏) –∏–ª–∏ –≤–Ω–µ—à–Ω–µ–≥–æ (–∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π –ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ—Ç—Å—è –ë–∏–ª–∞–π–Ω)
    • –ü—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤—ã–π –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥ –∏ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ –ø–æ Agile. –ö–∞–∂–¥—ã–π —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫ ‚Äì –≤–ª–∞–¥–µ–ª–µ—Ü —Å–≤–æ–µ–≥–æ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–∞, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π –æ—Ç–≤–µ—á–∞–µ—Ç –∑–∞ –≤—Å–µ –µ–≥–æ —á–∞—Å—Ç–∏, –Ω–µ –≤–∞–∂–Ω—ã—Ö —á–∞—Å—Ç–µ–π –Ω–µ—Ç.

    –ú—ã —Å—Ç—Ä–æ–∏–º —Ü–∏—Ñ—Ä–æ–≤—É—é data-driven –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—é, –∏ —Ç—ã –º–æ–∂–µ—à—å –Ω–∞–º –≤ —ç—Ç–æ–º –ø–æ–º–æ—á—å.

    –£—Ä–æ–≤–µ–Ω—å –∑–∞—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–Ω–æ–π –ø–ª–∞—Ç—ã –æ–±—Å—É–∂–¥–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –ø–æ —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç–∞–º —Å–æ–±–µ—Å–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è.

    –û—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–∞—è —Ä–æ–ª—å Devops Engineer:

    • –¢–µ—Å–Ω–æ–µ –≤–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏–µ —Å –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤—ã–º–∏ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞–º–∏ –≤ —Ä–∞–º–∫–∞—Ö –∏—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–æ–≤;
    • –†–∞–∑–≤–µ—Ä—Ç—ã–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤—ã—Ö –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ —Å –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å—é –∫–∞–∫ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤—ã—Ö –¥–µ–ø–ª–æ–π–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ –Ω–∞ helm, ansible —Ç–∞–∫ –∏ –Ω–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å–æ–±—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö;
    • –†–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ —Å Gitlab-CI, –Ω–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø–∞–π–ø–ª–∞–π–Ω–æ–≤;
    • –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤—ã—Ö –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤;
    • –í–µ–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ –¥–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏.

    –ú—ã —Ä–∞—Å—Å—á–∏—Ç—ã–≤–∞–µ–º, —á—Ç–æ —É —Ç–µ–±—è –µ—Å—Ç—å –æ–ø—ã—Ç –∏ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è –¥–ª—è —ç—Ç–æ–π –ø–æ–∑–∏—Ü–∏–∏:

    • –£–≤–µ—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ linux –Ω–∞ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç–æ—Ä–∞, –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ bash;
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ Kubernetes, –æ–ø—ã—Ç —ç–∫—Å–ø–ª—É–∞—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –≤ –ø—Ä–æ–º—ã—à–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π —Å—Ä–µ–¥–µ;
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ –Ω–∞ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ —á—Ç–µ–Ω–∏—è —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–π –¥–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏;
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ Helm, Ansible, Gitlab-CI, Nexus (Terraform –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–ª—é—Å–æ–º).


  25. –†–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫ MS Dynamics CRM ("–ò–Ω–≥–æ—Å—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ö", –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞) [ 2022-05-22 ]
    ...–≥–æ –¥–Ω—è, –∞ —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã; –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Å–æ–≤...

    –í –Ω–æ–≤—ã–π –∞–º–±–∏—Ü–∏–æ–∑–Ω—ã–π –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç –≤–Ω–µ–¥—Ä–µ–Ω–∏—è Microsoft Dynamics CRM (9.0 on-premise) –¥–ª—è –æ–±—Å–ª—É–∂–∏–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è —é—Ä–∏–¥–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏—Ö –ª–∏—Ü —Å –±–æ–ª—å—à–∏–º –ø–æ—Ç–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∞–ª–æ–º —Ä–æ—Å—Ç–∞ –∏—â–µ–º –†–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–∞ MS Dynamics CRM

    –¢—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è:

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ MS Dynamics CRM –Ω–∞ –∞–Ω–∞–ª–æ–≥–∏—á–Ω—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∞—Ö –æ—Ç 3 –ª–µ—Ç;
    • .NET 4.5+, .NET Core 3.1+, WebApi, SOAP, JQuery, React, HTML, CSS;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –ë–î, —Ö–æ—Ä–æ—à–∏–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è TSQL;
    • –ì–ª—É–±–æ–∫–∏–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ –æ–ø—ã—Ç –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—ã—Ö –ø–∞—Ä–∞–¥–∏–≥–º –∏ —à–∞–±–ª–æ–Ω–æ–≤ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π –∏ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º;
    • –ù–∞–≤—ã–∫–∏ –∏ –æ–ø—ã—Ç –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä–Ω—ã—Ö —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–π;
    • –ù–∞–≤—ã–∫–∏ –∏ –æ–ø—ã—Ç –Ω–∞—Å—Ç–∞–≤–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞;
    • –ì–ª—É–±–æ–∫–∏–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–Ω–æ–π –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∏–∏, –∂–∏–∑–Ω–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ü–∏–∫–ª –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–Ω–æ–≥–æ –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏—è, —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è —Ç—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è–º–∏;
    • –ë–æ–ª—å—à–æ–π –æ–ø—ã—Ç –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è –ø—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ (FT, UT, CodeReview), –∂–µ–ª–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ TDD;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç–∞ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –≤ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–µ –ø–æ –≥–∏–±–∫–∏–º –º–µ—Ç–æ–¥–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—è–º (Scrum, XP);
    • –í–Ω–µ–¥—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å—Ç–∞–Ω–¥–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫ TFS, GIT, ServiceNow, –ø—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫–∏ DevOps (CI/CD);
    • –û—Å–Ω–æ–≤—ã —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –ü–û, –≤–∏–¥—ã —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è;
    –û–±—è–∑–∞–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏:
    • –†–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ CRM –¥–ª—è –Æ–õ
    –£—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è:
    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å–≤–æ–∏ –∏–¥–µ–∏ –≤ –∫—Ä—É–ø–Ω—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∞—Ö –≤ —Å—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ —Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ö–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è;
    • –°–∏–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞ –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª–æ–≤, –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤—ã—Ö –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∞—Ç—å –≤–∞—à–∏ –∏–Ω–∏—Ü–∏–∞—Ç–∏–≤—ã;
    • –ó–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ –æ –∑–¥–æ—Ä–æ–≤—å–µ: –î–ú–° —Å—Ä–∞–∑—É –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ –∏—Å–ø—ã—Ç–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å—Ä–æ–∫–∞, —Ä–∞—Å—à–∏—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–∞—è –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∞ –î–ú–° —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ 6 –º–µ—Å—è—Ü–µ–≤ –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Ö–æ–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏—Å–ø—ã—Ç–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å—Ä–æ–∫–∞;
    • –°–æ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π –∏ —É–¥–æ–±–Ω—ã–π –æ—Ñ–∏—Å –≤ 7 –º–∏–Ω—É—Ç–∞—Ö —Ö–æ–¥—å–±—ã –æ—Ç –º. —É–ª. 1905 –≥–æ–¥–∞;
    • –ì–∏–±–∫–æ–µ –Ω–∞—á–∞–ª–æ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–µ–≥–æ –¥–Ω—è, –∞ —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã;
    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Å–æ–≤–µ—Ä—à–µ–Ω—Å—Ç–≤–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å–µ–±—è –≤ –æ–¥–Ω–æ–º –∏–∑ –ª—É—á—à–∏—Ö –ö–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã—Ö —É–Ω–∏–≤–µ—Ä—Å–∏—Ç–µ—Ç–æ–≤, –±–µ—Å–ø–ª–∞—Ç–Ω—ã–π –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–π –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø –∫ —ç–ª–µ–∫—Ç—Ä–æ–Ω–Ω–æ–π –±–∏–±–ª–∏–æ—Ç–µ–∫–µ ¬´–ê–ª—å–ø–∏–Ω–∞¬ª;
    • –£–Ω–∏–∫–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏ —Å–∫–∏–¥–∫–∏ –æ—Ç –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω—ë—Ä–æ–≤;
    • –ü—Ä–æ–∑—Ä–∞—á–Ω–∞—è —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞ –±–æ–Ω—É—Å–æ–≤ –∏ –ø—Ä–µ–º–∏–π, –¥–æ—Å—Ç–æ–π–Ω–∞—è –∑–∞—Ä–ø–ª–∞—Ç–∞ ‚Äî —Ä–∞–∑–º–µ—Ä –æ–±—Å—É–¥–∏–º –Ω–∞ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–≤—å—é.


  26. Java —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫ (middle+) ("–±–∏–ª–∞–π–Ω", –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞) [ 2022-05-22 ]
    ...—Ñ–∏–∫ –∏ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ ‚Äî –ø–ª–∞–Ω–∏—Ä—É–π —Å–≤–æ–µ –≤—Ä–µ–º—è —Å–∞...

    –ù–∞—à –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω –Ω–∞ –æ—Ü–µ–Ω–∫—É –∏ —É–≤–µ–ª–∏—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ —ç—Ñ—Ñ–µ–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Ä–µ—Å—É—Ä—Å–æ–≤ call-center. –í—ã—Å–æ–∫–æ–Ω–∞–≥—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–Ω–∞—è —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞, –ø–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—è—é—â–∞—è –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –º–∏–ª–ª–∏–æ–Ω–æ–≤ –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–π, –µ–∂–µ–º–µ—Å—è—á–Ω–æ –≤ —Ü–µ–ª—è—Ö –ø—Ä–∏–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞

    –ë–∏–ª–∞–π–Ω –ø—Ä–∏–∑–Ω–∞–Ω —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–æ–¥–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–º ‚Ññ1 –≤ —Ç–µ–ª–µ–∫–æ–º-–æ—Ç—Ä–∞—Å–ª–∏ –†–æ—Å—Å–∏–∏. –ò —Å–µ–π—á–∞—Å —É —Ç–µ–±—è –µ—Å—Ç—å –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø—Ä–∏—Å–æ–µ–¥–∏–Ω–∏—Ç—å—Å—è –∫ –ª—É—á—à–µ–π –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–µ –≤ –∫–∞—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ BackEnd —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–∞.

    –ö–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞

    –ú—ã —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∏—Ä—É–µ–º –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤—ã–µ agile-–∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã, –≤ —Å–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤ –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã—Ö –≤—Ö–æ–¥—è—Ç: –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏—Ç–∏–∫–∏, —Ñ—Ä–æ–Ω—Ç/back —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–∏, QA, –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä –∏ DevOps.


    –ò—Ç–∞–∫, —Ç–µ–±–µ –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–æ–∏—Ç:

    • –û–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Ç—Ä–∞–Ω—Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç–∞ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö SOAP –º–µ–∂–¥—É –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–∏–º–∏ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–º–∏ CCBO, IVR, DMP;
    • Backend —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–∞ IVR-–°–µ–≥–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ç–æ—Ä;
    • –ù–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–æ–¥–∞, —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ –±–∞–∑–æ–≤–æ–π –ª–æ–≥–∏–∫–∏ –∏ –∞–ª–≥–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–º–æ–≤ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–∞;
    • –î–æ—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å –º–æ–¥—É–ª–∏ –æ—Å—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–ª—è—é—â–∏–µ –ø–æ—Ç–æ–∫–æ–≤—É—é –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫—É –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö (BigData);
    • –†–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ API.

    –ú—ã –±—É–¥–µ–º —Ä–∞–¥—ã —Ä–∞—Å—Å–º–æ—Ç—Ä–µ—Ç—å —Ç–≤–æ—é –∫–∞–Ω–¥–∏–¥–∞—Ç—É—Ä—É, –µ—Å–ª–∏ —É —Ç–µ–±—è –µ—Å—Ç—å:

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã Java –≤ —Ç–µ–ª–µ–∫–æ–º–º—É–Ω–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∞—Ö –æ—Ç 2-—Ö –ª–µ—Ç;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∫–æ–º–º–µ—Ä—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–π —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ –Ω–∞ JPA;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Docker, Kubernetes, PostgreSQL;
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –±—Ä–æ–∫–µ—Ä–∞ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π Kafka;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ —Å spring framework;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Nifi.

    –ë—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–ª—é—Å–æ–º:

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å ELK;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã c ClickHouse, PostgreSQL, H2.

    –ß—Ç–æ –º—ã –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ–º:

    • –ù–µ–ø–æ—Å—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–µ —É—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏–µ –≤ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–µ —É–Ω–∏–∫–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤;
    • –†–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ –≤ —Å–æ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π –≥–∏–±–∫–æ–π —Å—Ä–µ–¥–µ, –≥–¥–µ –µ—Å—Ç—å –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Å–∞–º–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ç—å —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è;
    • –î—Ä—É–∂–µ—Å–∫–∞—è –æ—Ç–∫—Ä—ã—Ç–∞—è –∞—Ç–º–æ—Å—Ñ–µ—Ä–∞, –≥–¥–µ –ø—Ä–∏–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤—É–µ—Ç—Å—è –∏–Ω–∏—Ü–∏–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –∏ –ø–æ–æ—â—Ä—è–µ—Ç—Å—è –Ω–µ—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–¥–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω—ã–π –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥;
    • –†–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ –Ω–æ–≤—ã–µ –∏ —Å–ª–æ–∂–Ω—ã–µ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏;
    • –ü–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–Ω–æ–µ —Å–∞–º–æ—Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ –∏ –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ;
    • Beefree ‚Äî –≥–∏–±–∫–∏–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–∏–π –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫ –∏ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ ‚Äî –ø–ª–∞–Ω–∏—Ä—É–π —Å–≤–æ–µ –≤—Ä–µ–º—è —Å–∞–º;
    • –ü–æ–ª–∏—Å –¥–æ–±—Ä–æ–≤–æ–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ –º–µ–¥–∏—Ü–∏–Ω—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ —Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ö–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è, –æ–±—Å–ª—É–∂–∏–≤–∞–µ–º—ã–π –≤ –ª—É—á—à–∏—Ö –∫–ª–∏–Ω–∏–∫–∞—Ö –≥–æ—Ä–æ–¥–∞;
    • C–ª—É–∂–µ–±–Ω—É—é —Å–æ—Ç–æ–≤—É—é —Å–≤—è–∑—å.

    –í –ë–∏–ª–∞–π–Ω –º—ã —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏–≤–∞–µ–º –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–≤–∞–µ–º –∑–¥–æ—Ä–æ–≤—É—é –∏ –±–µ–∑–æ–ø–∞—Å–Ω—É—é —Ä–∞–±–æ—á—É—é —Å—Ä–µ–¥—É. –ö–∞–∂–¥—ã–π —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫ —Å–æ–±–ª—é–¥–∞–µ—Ç –ö–æ–¥–µ–∫—Å –ø–æ–≤–µ–¥–µ–Ω–∏—è, –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª–∞ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –∏ –ø—Ä–∏–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–≤–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–æ–≤ –¥–µ–ª–æ–≤–æ–π —ç—Ç–∏–∫–∏. –ú—ã –ø–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–∞–µ–º —á–µ—Å—Ç–Ω–æ –∏ —ç—Ç–∏—á–Ω–æ –∫–∞–∫ –ø–æ –æ—Ç–Ω–æ—à–µ–Ω–∏—é –∫ –¥—Ä—É–≥ –¥—Ä—É–≥—É, —Ç–∞–∫ –∏ –∫ –Ω–∞—à–∏–º –≤–Ω–µ—à–Ω–∏–º –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω–µ—Ä–∞–º.


  27. DevOps Engineer ("inDriver", –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞) [ 2022-05-22 ]
    ...–∞ –≤ –≥–∏–±—Ä–∏–¥–Ω–æ–º —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç–µ (–æ—Ñ–∏—Å+—É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ) –∏–ª–∏ –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ. ...

    inDriver ‚Äî –º–µ–∂–¥—É–Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–Ω—ã–π —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å –ø–∞—Å—Å–∞–∂–∏—Ä—Å–∫–∏—Ö –ø–µ—Ä–µ–≤–æ–∑–æ–∫. –ú—ã —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–µ–º –≥–ª–æ–±–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–æ—Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—á–Ω—ã–π –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π –º–µ–Ω—è–µ—Ç –∂–∏–∑–Ω—å –º–∏–ª–ª–∏–æ–Ω–æ–≤ –ª—é–¥–µ–π –∫ –ª—É—á—à–µ–º—É. –í—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º –≤ —Ç–æ–ø-3 –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤ –¥–ª—è –∑–∞–∫–∞–∑–∞ –ø–æ–µ–∑–¥–æ–∫ –≤ –º–∏—Ä–µ ‚Äî 100 –º–ª–Ω. —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–æ–∫, 1 –º–ª—Ä–¥. —Å–¥–µ–ª–æ–∫, 600+ –≥–æ—Ä–æ–¥–æ–≤ –≤ 42 —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–∞—Ö –º–∏—Ä–∞.

    –°–µ–π—á–∞—Å –º—ã –Ω–∞—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º—Å—è –≤ –ø–æ–∏—Å–∫–µ DevOps –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞.

    –ù–∞—à —Å—Ç–µ–∫:

    • –ú–∏–∫—Ä–æ—Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–Ω–∞—è –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä–∞, —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ –Ω–∞ Go;
    • DevOps –∏ SRE –ø—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫–∏;
    • Ansible, Kubernetes, Helm, Kafka, NATS, TeamCity, Redis, MySQL, ClickHouse, ELK stack, Prometheus, Grafana, HashiCorp Consul, Vault, Jaeger, HAProxy, Nginx.

    –ß–µ–º —Ç—ã –±—É–¥–µ—à—å –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ç—å—Å—è:

    • —É—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏–µ –≤ –∂–∏–∑–Ω–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–º —Ü–∏–∫–ª–µ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–æ–≤ –Ω–∞ –≤—Å–µ—Ö —ç—Ç–∞–ø–∞—Ö, –≤–∫–ª—é—á–∞—è –¥–∏–∑–∞–π–Ω –∏ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫—É —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤, –ø–ª–∞–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–µ—Å—É—Ä—Å–æ–≤ –∏ –æ–±—Å–ª—É–∂–∏–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ;
    • –æ–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏ —Å–æ–±–ª—é–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ SLI, SLO, SLA –∏ –±—é–¥–∂–µ—Ç–∞ –æ—à–∏–±–æ–∫;
    • —É—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏–µ –≤ —É—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–∏ –∏ —Ä–∞—Å—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –ø—Ä–∏—á–∏–Ω —Å–±–æ–µ–≤, –ø–æ—Å—Ç–º–æ—Ä—Ç–µ–º—ã;
    • —É–ª—É—á—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–æ–≤ —Å–≤—è–∑–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å –æ–±—Å–ª—É–∂–∏–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ–º —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º (–æ—Ç–∫–∞–∑–æ—É—Å—Ç–æ–π—á–∏–≤–æ—Å—Ç—å, –º–∞—Å—à—Ç–∞–±–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ, —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ –≤ —Ä–µ–∂–∏–º–µ –≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–æ–π –Ω–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏ –∏ —Ç.–ø.);
    • –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–æ–≤ —Å–±–æ—Ä–∫–∏, —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ –¥–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–∫–∏ –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π;
    • –≤–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏–µ —Å –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞–º–∏ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ –∏ —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –≤ —á–∞—Å—Ç–∏ –ø–æ–¥–≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–∫–∏, –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–∞ –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∏ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤.

    –ß—Ç–æ –º—ã –æ—Ç —Ç–µ–±—è –∂–¥–µ–º:

    • —Ö–æ—Ä–æ—à–µ–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏ –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Docker;
    • –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏ –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–∞–º–∏ Kubernetes;
    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç –ø–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω–∏—è CI/CD Pipelines;
    • –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ, –æ–ø—ã—Ç –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è ELK/EFK stack, Prometheus, Grafana, HashiCorp Consul/Vault, TeamCity, Helm, Redis –∏ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏—Ö Cloud-Native —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–π;
    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è Ansible –∏ –Ω–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏—è —Ä–æ–ª–µ–π/–ø–ª–µ–π–±—É–∫–æ–≤;

    –ë—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–ª—é—Å–æ–º:

    • –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –æ–¥–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∏–∑ —è–∑—ã–∫–æ–≤ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è (Python, Go);
    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∏ –≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–æ–Ω–∞–≥—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤;

    –ú—ã –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ–º:

    • —Å—Ç–∞–±–∏–ª—å–Ω—É—é –∑–∞—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–Ω—É—é –ø–ª–∞—Ç—É, —Å–æ–±–ª—é–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ –¢–ö –†–§, –î–ú–° —Å–æ —Å—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–µ–π;
    • –Ω–µ–æ–≥—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—á–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∏ –∫–∞—Ä—å–µ—Ä–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ä–æ—Å—Ç–∞;
    • —á–∞—Å—Ç–∏—á–Ω–æ –∏–ª–∏ –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é –æ–ø–ª–∞—á–∏–≤–∞–µ–º—ã–µ –¥–æ–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –æ–±—É—á–∞—é—â–∏–µ –∫—É—Ä—Å—ã, –≤ —Ç–æ–º —á–∏—Å–ª–µ —è–∑—ã–∫–æ–≤—ã–µ;
    • –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—å —á–∞—Å—Ç—å—é –º–µ–∂–¥—É–Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–Ω–æ–π –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª–æ–≤ –∏ –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ —Ö–æ—Ä–æ—à–∏—Ö –ª—é–¥–µ–π, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –≤—Å–µ –≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–µ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞—é—Ç –æ–¥–Ω—É –∏–∑ —Å–∞–º—ã—Ö –∫—Ä—É—Ç—ã—Ö –∏—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–π —É—Å–ø–µ—Ö–∞ –≤ –º–∏—Ä–æ–≤–æ–π IT-–∏–Ω–¥—É—Å—Ç—Ä–∏–∏;
    • —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ –≤ –≥–∏–±—Ä–∏–¥–Ω–æ–º —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç–µ (–æ—Ñ–∏—Å+—É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ) –∏–ª–∏ –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ.

    –ù–∞—à–∏ —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–∏ - —Å–∞–º–æ–µ —Ü–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–µ, —á—Ç–æ —É –Ω–∞—Å –µ—Å—Ç—å. –ú—ã –∑–∞–±–æ—Ç–∏–º—Å—è –æ —Ç–æ–º, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–Ω–æ–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω—Å—Ç–≤–æ –±—ã–ª–æ –º–∞–∫—Å–∏–º–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ –∫–æ–º—Ñ–æ—Ä—Ç–Ω—ã–º –¥–ª—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –∏ –æ—Ç–¥—ã—Ö–∞. –í –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–µ –µ—Å—Ç—å —É—é—Ç–Ω–∞—è –∫—É—Ö–Ω—è, –∏–≥—Ä–æ–≤–∞—è –∫–æ–º–Ω–∞—Ç–∞ –∏ –∑–æ–Ω—ã –¥–ª—è –æ—Ç–¥—ã—Ö–∞. –ú—ã –ª—é–±–∏–º —Ä–∞–∑–ª–∏—á–Ω—ã–µ –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–µ –º–µ—Ä–æ–ø—Ä–∏—è—Ç–∏—è –∏ —Ç–µ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ –¥–Ω–∏, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã –Ω–∞—à–∞ –∂–∏–∑–Ω—å –±—ã–ª–∞ –µ—â–µ –±–æ–ª–µ–µ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–Ω–æ–π –∏ –Ω–∞—Å—ã—â–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π.


  28. Head of Support team (remote) ("Tibbo", –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞) [ 2022-05-22 ]
    ...e management, industrial and building automation, remote monitoring and service, physical access control, ...

    We are Tibbo Systems!

    Tibbo Systems - international company leading in hardware and software solutions for the Internet of Things (IoT), IT infrastructure management, industrial and building automation, remote monitoring and service, physical access control, and data center management.

    Our Head of Support Team is a business-oriented person who understands how to help effectively our clients and partners to create and manage their services, and how we can build a fast-growing international business.

    We are looking for an experienced Head of Support Team to join our team!

    We welcome a person who is not just interested in ‚Äúquickly solving tickets" but for a partner who believes in our product, and in its future.

    Responsibilities:

    • Ensure tech support for our cloud web services and IoT platform Tibbo AggreGate corporate clients.

    • Organize and control a team of tech support specialists/help desk technicians.

    • Prioritize IT-related problems as they come in to Help Desk and escalate when necessary, assign problems/tasks to tech support specialists.

    • Budgeting: preparing & controlling (P&L).

    • KPI tracking: RPE, MPE, SLA.

    • Develop, implement, and continuously improve technical documentation, manuals, contracts, reports, knowledge data in order to ensure collaboration between the Technical support team, and Delivery, Sales, R&D, Marketing divisions.

    • People management: hiring, onboarding, professional development; workload and efficiency; motivation and retention; performance review; admin issues (holidays, days-off, sick leaves, etc).

    • Product trainer for colleagues and clients.

    • Promote and develop our PROFESSIONAL COMMUNITY

    Requirements:

    • Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Computer Networking, and Hardware or IT related field.

    • 3 years + as a Leader of Technical Support Team or relevant position in the Software Engineering Department serving corporate clients: B2B, big IT infrastructure, and highload cloud services.

    • Ability to diagnose hardware and troubleshoot technical issues.

    • Management skills: goal setting, decision making, planning, delegation, and control, feedback and motivation.

    • Strong analytical skills.

    • Ability to prioritize and manage tasks, excellent time management skills.

    • Exceptional customer service skills.

    • Outstanding communication skills, stress management.

    • Team player, helpful, and problem-solver.

    • Autonomous, pro-active.

    • Jira Service Desk: setting up and administration.

    • Excellent oral and written Russian / English.

    Would be a plus:

    • Use of ITIL/ITSM application.

    • Professional certifications such as Linux, Cisco or Unix will be preferred.

    • Strong technical knowledge in networking systems: Windows and Linux OS administration, Apache, Nginx, MySQL/PostgreSQL and Cassandra databases, networks, troubleshooting, software development methodologies and DevOps, software development lifecycle.

    • Experience in organizing and supervising the 24h technical support team.

    • Information security: experience would be a plus.

    • Bash scripts, Powershell, OPC, ODBC, Modbus, HTTP, SNMP, WMI, JasperReports reports, HTML/JS/CSS/jQuery/TypeScript.

    • Basics of programming (OOP, data structures, algorithms, basics of database design) and diagnostics of Java applications.

    • Product trainer (in class and online), able to share knowledge with others.

    • Experience with a remote team, within an international company.

    • AggreGate platform, SQL, JQL.

    • Knowledge of industry automation and automated process control systems.

    We offer:

    • Remote work.

    • Employment contract (RF).

    • Paid sick leaves and vacations (PLUS 4 paid days-off).

    • Professional development and career growth.

    • Young, friendly, smart team.


  29. DevOps –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä ("Red Panda Labs", –°–∞–Ω–∫—Ç-–ü–µ—Ç–µ—Ä–±—É—Ä–≥) [ 2022-05-22 ]
    ...±—Ä–∏–¥–Ω—ã–π —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã (–æ—Ñ–∏—Å+—É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–∫–∞), 100% —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–∫–∞. –õ—å–≥–æ—Ç–Ω—ã–µ —...

    –ú—ã ‚Äî –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞ Red Panda Labs, –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞–µ–º—Å—è —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–æ–π –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π –¥–ª—è –∑–Ω–∞–∫–æ–º—Å—Ç–≤, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –¥–∞—Ä—è—Ç —è—Ä–∫–∏–µ —ç–º–æ—Ü–∏–∏ –ª—é–¥—è–º. –ú–∏–ª–ª–∏–æ–Ω –Ω–∞—à–∏—Ö –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–π –æ–±—â–∞—é—Ç—Å—è, –Ω–∞—Ö–æ–¥—è—Ç –¥—Ä—É–∑–µ–π –∏ –ª—é–±–æ–≤—å –∫–∞–∂–¥—ã–π –¥–µ–Ω—å –ø–æ –≤—Å–µ–º—É –º–∏—Ä—É.

    –°–µ–π—á–∞—Å –º—ã –∏—â–µ–º –≤ –Ω–∞—à—É —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫—É—é –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—É —Å–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ DevOps –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞.

    –û–¥–Ω–∞ –∏–∑ –∫–ª—é—á–µ–≤—ã—Ö —Ü–µ–ª–µ–π –Ω–∞ –±–ª–∏–∂–∞–π—à–µ–µ –≤—Ä–µ–º—è - —ç—Ç–æ —É—Å–ø–µ—à–Ω—ã–π –ø–µ—Ä–µ–≤–æ–¥ –Ω–∞—à–∏—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–æ–≤ –≤ Kubernetes.

    –ö–æ–≥–æ –º—ã –∏—â–µ–º:

    • 3+ –≥–æ–¥–∞ –æ–ø—ã—Ç–∞ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã DevOps –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–æ–º

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∏ –≥–ª—É–±–æ–∫–æ–µ –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω–∏—è –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–æ–≤ CI/CD

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Kubernetes

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Docker

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–∞–º–∏ AWS

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Terraform

    • –•–æ—Ä–æ—à–µ–µ –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã linux –∏ —Å–µ—Ç–∏.

    –ó–∞–¥–∞—á–∏:

    • –û–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –±–µ—Å–ø–µ—Ä–µ–±–æ–π–Ω—É—é —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—É –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã –∏ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤

    • –ü–ª–∞–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏ —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–æ–≤—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å –º–∞—Å—à—Ç–∞–±–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–æ–≤ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏

    • –†–∞–∑–≤–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å CI/CD

    • –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏

    • –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ –∏ –Ω–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ —É—Ç–∏–ª–∏—Ç –¥–ª—è –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏

    • –î—Ä—É–≥–∏–µ —Ç–µ–∫—É—â–∏–µ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏ DevOps

    –£—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è:

    • –°–ª–æ–∂–Ω—ã–µ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏ –∏ –±–æ–ª—å—à–∏–µ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –¥–ª—è —Ä–æ—Å—Ç–∞ –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏.

    • –û–±—É—á–∞—é—â–∏–µ —Å–µ–º–∏–Ω–∞—Ä—ã –∏ —Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–Ω–≥–∏, –ª–µ–∫—Ü–∏–∏ –∏ –ø–æ—Å–µ—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–π.

    • –°–æ–±–ª—é–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–æ—Ä–º –¢–ö –†–§ (–≤ —Ç–æ–º —á–∏—Å–ª–µ –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é –±–µ–ª–∞—è –∑–∞—Ä–ø–ª–∞—Ç–∞).

    • –†–∞–∑–ª–∏—á–Ω—ã–µ –≤–∞—Ä–∏–∞–Ω—Ç—ã –æ—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è (–ò–ü, —Ç—Ä—É–¥–æ–≤–æ–π –¥–æ–≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä, –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—Ä–∞–∫—Ç —Å –∏–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–π –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–µ–π)

    • –í–æ—Å—å–º–∏—á–∞—Å–æ–≤–æ–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–∏–π –¥–µ–Ω—å —Å –≥–∏–±–∫–∏–º –Ω–∞—á–∞–ª–æ–º, –≥–∏–±—Ä–∏–¥–Ω—ã–π —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã (–æ—Ñ–∏—Å+—É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–∫–∞), 100% —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–∫–∞.

    • –õ—å–≥–æ—Ç–Ω—ã–µ —É—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è –ø–æ –î–ú–°.

    • –ü—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∞ —Ä–µ–ª–æ–∫–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –¥–ª—è –∫–∞–Ω–¥–∏–¥–∞—Ç–æ–≤ –∏–∑ —Ä–µ–≥–∏–æ–Ω–æ–≤.

    • –û—Ñ–∏—Å –≤ –¥–µ—Å—è—Ç–∏ –º–∏–Ω—É—Ç–∞—Ö —Ö–æ–¥—å–±—ã –æ—Ç –º–µ—Ç—Ä–æ ¬´–ì–æ—Ä—å–∫–æ–≤—Å–∫–∞—è¬ª.

    • –í—Å–µ–≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω—ã–µ –∑–∞–∫—É—Å–∫–∏, —Ñ—Ä—É–∫—Ç—ã, –æ–≤–æ—â–∏ –∏ –Ω–∞–ø–∏—Ç–∫–∏ –±–µ–∑ –æ–≥—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—á–µ–Ω–∏–π.

    –ú—ã –¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ –∑–∞–±–æ—Ç–∏–º—Å—è –æ –∫–∞–∂–¥–æ–º —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–µ –∏ –¥–µ–ª–∞–µ–º –≤—Å–µ, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã –≤—ã –æ—â—É—â–∞–ª–∏ —Å–µ–±—è –º–∞–∫—Å–∏–º–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ –∫–æ–º—Ñ–æ—Ä—Ç–Ω–æ, —Ä–µ—à–∞—è —Å–≤–æ–∏ –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏.


  30. Java —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫ ("–ò–Ω—Ç–∞–±–∏—è", –ù–æ–≤–æ—Å–∏–±–∏—Ä—Å–∫) [ 2022-05-22 ]
    ...º–µ—Å—Ç—É –∂–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å—Å—Ç–≤–∞. –í —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç–µ —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Ç—ã –º–æ–∂–µ—à—å —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—å —...

    –ú—ã - –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è –ò–Ω—Ç–∞–±–∏—è, –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞–µ–º—Å—è —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–æ–π –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º —Å 2016 –≥–æ–¥–∞.

    –í–µ—Å–æ–º–∞—è —á–∞—Å—Ç—å –Ω–∞—à–µ–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã ‚Äì —Ç—Ä–∞–Ω—Å—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏—è –±–∏–∑–Ω–µ—Å-—Ç—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–π –≤ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–Ω—ã–π –∫–æ–¥. –ù–æ –∑–∞ —à–∏—Ä–º–æ–π —Å–∫—Ä—ã–≤–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –≥–æ—Ä–∞–∑–¥–æ –±–æ–ª—å—à–µ: –º—ã —Å –≥–æ–ª–æ–≤–æ–π –ø–æ–≥—Ä—É–∂–∞–µ–º—Å—è –≤ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–º–µ—Ç–Ω—ã–µ –æ–±–ª–∞—Å—Ç–∏, —É—á–∏–º—Å—è –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ç—å –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—ã–µ –±–∏–∑–Ω–µ—Å-–ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å—ã, –æ–±—â–∞–µ–º—Å—è —Å —Ä–µ–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–º–∏ –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—è–º–∏ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º. –í—Å–µ —ç—Ç–æ –ø–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—è–µ—Ç –Ω–∞–º —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–≤–∞—Ç—å —ç—Ñ—Ñ–µ–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–µ –∏ –∫–∞—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è.

    –ù–∞—à–∏ –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω–µ—Ä—ã - –ª–∏–¥–µ—Ä—ã —Å–≤–æ–∏—Ö –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–π –Ω–∞ –æ—Ç–µ—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–º –∏ –∏–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–º —Ä—ã–Ω–∫–∞—Ö. –≠—Ç–æ —Ñ–∏–Ω–∞–Ω—Å–æ–≤—ã–π —Å–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä, –ª–æ–≥–∏—Å—Ç–∏–∫–∞, –∑–¥—Ä–∞–≤–æ–æ—Ö—Ä–∞–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ, –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–µ —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è, –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–Ω–µ—Ç –≤–µ—â–µ–π –∏ –º–Ω–æ–≥–æ–µ –¥—Ä—É–≥–æ–µ.

    –ú—ã —Å—Ç—Ä–µ–º–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ —Ä–∞—Å—Ç–µ–º, –∏ –∑–∞–∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–æ–≤–∞–Ω—ã –≤ –ø—Ä–∏–≤–ª–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏–∏ –Ω–æ–≤—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª–æ–≤. –í –ª—é–¥—è—Ö —É–≤–ª–µ—á–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö, —É—Å–ø–µ—à–Ω–æ –±–∞–ª–∞–Ω—Å–∏—Ä—É—é—â–∏—Ö –º–µ–∂–¥—É —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç–æ–º –∏ –∫–∞—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ–º –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–∞, –∞ —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª—è—é—â–∏—Ö —Ü–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏.

    –°–µ–π—á–∞—Å –º—ã –Ω–∞—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º—Å—è –≤ –ø–æ–∏—Å–∫–µ Java —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–∞ –¥–ª—è —É—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏—è –≤ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∞ –Ω–∞ —É—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è—Ö –≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π –∑–∞–Ω—è—Ç–æ—Å—Ç–∏.

    –ß–µ–º –∏–º–µ–Ω–Ω–æ —Ç–µ–±–µ –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–æ–∏—Ç –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ç—å—Å—è?

    • —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å –≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–æ–Ω–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–æ—á–Ω—ã–µ, –æ—Ç–∫–∞–∑–æ—É—Å—Ç–æ–π—á–∏–≤—ã–µ (24x7) –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–Ω—ã–µ –∏ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã –¥–ª—è —Å—Ä–µ–¥–Ω–µ–≥–æ –∏ –∫—Ä—É–ø–Ω–æ–≥–æ –±–∏–∑–Ω–µ—Å–∞;
    • –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏ –¥–æ—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤—É—é—â–∏–µ –º–æ–¥—É–ª–∏ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã;
    • –ø–∏—Å–∞—Ç—å –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –∏ —é–Ω–∏—Ç-—Ç–µ—Å—Ç—ã, –æ—Å—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–ª—è—Ç—å –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—Ä–æ–ª—å –∫–∞—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞.

    –ü–æ–≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä–∏–º –æ –Ω–∞—à–∏—Ö –æ–∂–∏–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è—Ö?

    • –∏–º–µ–µ—à—å –æ–ø—ã—Ç –∫–æ–º–º–µ—Ä—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–π —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ –Ω–∞ Java –æ—Ç 2 –ª–µ—Ç;
    • —Ä–∞–∑–±–∏—Ä–∞–µ—à—å—Å—è —Å–æ —Å—Ç–µ–∫–æ–º Spring/Spring boot (Spring Core, Spring-Data, Spring MVC, Spring Security);
    • –æ—Ç–ª–∏—á–Ω–æ –≤–ª–∞–¥–µ–µ—à—å JPA/Hibernate –∏–ª–∏ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏–º–∏ ORM —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—è–º–∏;
    • —Å –≤–µ–±-—Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–∞–º–∏ —á—É–≤—Å—Ç–≤—É–µ—à—å —Å–µ–±—è —Å–≤–æ–±–æ–¥–Ω–æ (JAX-RS, JAX-WS);
    • –∏–º–µ–µ—à—å –±–æ–µ–≤—ã–µ –Ω–∞–≤—ã–∫–∏ –æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å —Ä–µ–ª—è—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–º–∏ –°–£–ë–î: MySQL, Postgres, Oracle.

    –í–µ—Å–æ–º—ã–º –ø–ª—é—Å–æ–º –±—É–¥–µ—Ç:

    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—è–º–∏/–∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º–∏ Vaadin, CUBA;
    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–Ω—ã—Ö –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π —Å—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–≤–∞–º–∏ DevOps –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤: Vagrant, Docker, Puppet, Ansible;
    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å JS —Ñ—Ä–µ–π–º–≤–æ—Ä–∫–∞–º–∏: AngularJS/Angular, React –∏ —Ç.–¥.;
    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç —É—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏—è –≤ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–µ –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–Ω—ã—Ö, –≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–æ–Ω–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–æ—á–Ω—ã—Ö, –æ—Ç–∫–∞–∑–æ—É—Å—Ç–æ–π—á–∏–≤—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º;
    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ–¥–µ–Ω–∏—è –Ω–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–æ—á–Ω—ã—Ö —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–æ–≤, –æ–ø—Ç–∏–º–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π;
    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–æ–π –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—Ä–æ–ª—è –≤–µ—Ä—Å–∏–π: Git, Mercurial;
    • –Ω–∞–≤—ã–∫–∏ –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è/—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Linux —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–º–∏.

    –£–∑–Ω–∞–µ—à—å –≤ –æ–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–∏ —Å–µ–±—è? –¢–æ–≥–¥–∞ —Å–º–µ–ª–æ –æ—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª—è–π –æ—Ç–∫–ª–∏–∫ –∏–ª–∏ —Å–≤—è–∑—ã–≤–∞–π—Å—è —Å –Ω–∞–º–∏ –ª—é–±—ã–º —É–¥–æ–±–Ω—ã–º –¥–ª—è —Ç–µ–±—è —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–æ–º.

    –ê –º—ã –≤ —Å–≤–æ—é –æ—á–µ—Ä–µ–¥—å –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–∏–º —É—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è –¥–ª—è –∫–æ–º—Ñ–æ—Ä—Ç–Ω–æ–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã:

    • –º—ã –Ω–µ –ø—Ä–∏–≤—è–∑–∞–Ω—ã –∫ —Ç–≤–æ–µ–º—É –º–µ—Å—Ç—É –∂–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å—Å—Ç–≤–∞. –í —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç–µ —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Ç—ã –º–æ–∂–µ—à—å —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—å —á–∞—Å—Ç—å—é –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã, –Ω–∞—Ö–æ–¥—è—Å—å –≤ –ª—é–±–æ–π —Ç–æ—á–∫–µ –º–∏—Ä–∞;
    • –º—ã —Å —É–≤–∞–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º –æ—Ç–Ω–æ—Å–∏–º—Å—è –∫ —Ç–≤–æ–µ–º—É —Ä–µ–∂–∏–º—É –¥–Ω—è. –ñ–∞–≤–æ—Ä–æ–Ω–æ–∫ —Ç—ã –∏–ª–∏ —Å–æ–≤–∞, –≤—ã–±–∏—Ä–∞–π –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥—è—â–µ–µ –≤—Ä–µ–º—è –¥–ª—è –Ω–∞—á–∞–ª–∞ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã;‚Ää
    • —É –Ω–∞—Å –æ–ø—ã—Ç –∏–¥–µ—Ç –≤ –Ω–æ–≥—É —Å –¥—Ä–∞–π–≤–æ–º –∏ –≥–∏–±–∫–æ—Å—Ç—å—é. –°—Ç—Ä–æ–π —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã, —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—é—â–∏–µ –≤ –º–∞—Å—à—Ç–∞–±–∞—Ö —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω—ã, –ø–æ–¥ —Ä—É–∫–æ–≤–æ–¥—Å—Ç–≤–æ–º –æ–ø—ã—Ç–Ω—ã—Ö –Ω–∞—Å—Ç–∞–≤–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤;
    • –∏ —Å–∞–º–æ–µ –≥–ª–∞–≤–Ω–æ–µ - –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∞–π —Å–ø—Ä–∞–≤–µ–¥–ª–∏–≤–æ-–≤—ã—Å–æ–∫—É—é –±–µ–ª—É—é –∑–∞—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–Ω—É—é –ø–ª–∞—Ç—É.

    P.S. –¥–∞–∂–µ –µ—Å–ª–∏ —Ç—ã —Å—á–∏—Ç–∞–µ—à—å, —á—Ç–æ —Ç–≤–æ–µ–≥–æ –æ–ø—ã—Ç–∞ –Ω–µ–¥–æ—Å—Ç–∞—Ç–æ—á–Ω–æ, –Ω–µ —Å—Ç–µ—Å–Ω—è–π—Å—è –æ—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª—è—Ç—å –Ω–∞–º —Å–≤–æ–µ —Ä–µ–∑—é–º–µ. –ú—ã –µ–≥–æ –≤–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ —Ä–∞—Å—Å–º–æ—Ç—Ä–∏–º –∏, –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ, –Ω–∞–π–¥–µ–º –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥—è—â—É—é –ø–æ–∑–∏—Ü–∏—é. –î–æ –≤—Å—Ç—Ä–µ—á–∏ –≤ –ò–Ω—Ç–∞–±–∏–∏!


  31. Senior QA engineer (remote) ("–ú–¢–°", –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞) [ 2022-05-22 ]

    –ú–¢–° ‚Äì –æ–¥–Ω–∞ –∏–∑ –∫—Ä—É–ø–Ω–µ–π—à–∏—Ö —Ä–æ—Å—Å–∏–π—Å–∫–∏—Ö —ç–∫–æ—Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º. –ù–∞ –±–∞–∑–µ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ç–µ–ª–µ–∫–æ–º-–±–∏–∑–Ω–µ—Å–∞ –º—ã —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–µ–º —Ü–∏—Ñ—Ä–æ–≤—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç—ã –∏ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å—ã –≤–æ –º–Ω–æ–≥–∏—Ö –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è—Ö ‚Äì –æ—Ç –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–Ω–µ—Ç–∞ –≤–µ—â–µ–π, –∏—Å–∫—É—Å—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–ª–ª–µ–∫—Ç–∞ –∏ –±–æ–ª—å—à–∏—Ö –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –¥–æ —Ü–∏—Ñ—Ä–æ–≤–æ–π –º–µ–¥–∏—Ü–∏–Ω—ã –∏ –∫–∏–±–µ—Ä—Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç–∞.

    –í –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—É –ë–ª–æ–∫–∞ –ø–æ –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–º —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—è–º –º—ã –∏—â–µ–º –í–µ–¥—É—â–µ–≥–æ QA-–∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞.

    –ö–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞ QA –ú–¢–° –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–∏–≤–∞–µ—Ç –∫–∞—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤ —Å–æ–±—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ —Ä–µ—à–∞—é—Ç –æ–ø–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –∏ –±–∏–∑–Ω–µ—Å-–∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏ –≤ —Ç–µ–ª–µ–∫–æ–º–º—É–Ω–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–æ–º —Å–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–µ.

    –í –ú–¢–° –í—ã –Ω–∞–π–¥—ë—Ç–µ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç –Ω–∞ –ª—é–±–æ–π –≤–∫—É—Å!

    –ß—Ç–æ –Ω—É–∂–Ω–æ –¥–µ–ª–∞—Ç—å:

    • –í—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω—è—Ç—å —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–Ω–æ–µ –∏ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–æ–µ —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤
    • –¢–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å —Ç—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è, –ø–æ–¥–≥–æ—Ç–∞–≤–ª–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å —Ç–µ—Å—Ç-–ø–ª–∞–Ω—ã, —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å —Ç–µ—Å—Ç-–∫–µ–π—Å—ã
    • –ê–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ –≤–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤–æ–π –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–æ–π ‚Äì —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–∏, –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä—ã, –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏—Ç–∏–∫–∏ ‚Äì —É—á–∞—Å—Ç–≤—É—è –≤–æ –≤—Å–µ—Ö —ç—Ç–∞–ø–∞—Ö –∂–∏–∑–Ω–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ü–∏–∫–ª–∞ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏
    • –£–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª—è—Ç—å –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–æ–π QA (2-5 —á–µ–ª.) ‚Äì —Å—Ç–∞–≤–∏—Ç—å –∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—Ä–æ–ª–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏ –ø–æ —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—é
    • –†–∞–∑–≤–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏ —É–ª—É—á—à–∞—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å—ã –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–∞—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞

    –û—Ç —Ç–µ–±—è –º—ã –∂–¥–µ–º:

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –≤ —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –æ—Ç 3-5 –ª–µ—Ç
    • –£–≤–µ—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è –º–µ—Ç–æ–¥–∏–∫ —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ —Ç–µ—Å—Ç-–¥–∏–∑–∞–π–Ω–∞, –æ–ø—ã—Ç –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏—Ö –Ω–∞ –ø—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫–µ
    • –•–æ—Ä–æ—à–∏–µ –∫–æ–º–º—É–Ω–∏–∫–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–µ –Ω–∞–≤—ã–∫–∏
    • –†–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç—ã–π –Ω–∞–≤—ã–∫ —Ç–µ—Å—Ç-–∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏—Ç–∏–∫–∏, —É–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ –æ—Ü–µ–Ω–∏—Ç—å –∑–∞—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç—ã –Ω–∞ —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏ –ø–æ–∫—Ä—ã—Ç–∏–µ —Ç—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–π —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∞–º–∏
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –±–∞–∑–∞–º–∏ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö, –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è SQL (CRUD, Join)
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è back-end —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º –∏ –≤–µ–±-—Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤ (REST/SOAP)

    –ë—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–ª—é—Å–æ–º:

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –≤ –∫—Ä—É–ø–Ω—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∞—Ö –ø–æ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–µ
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –∏–ª–∏ –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∏ –æ—Ç—Ä–∞—Å–ª–∏ —Ç–µ–ª–µ–∫–æ–º
    • –ù–∞–≤—ã–∫–∏ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –∏—Ö –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω—è—Ç—å
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –Ω–∞—Å—Ç–∞–≤–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞ –∏ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–æ–π

    –ö–∞–∫–∏–µ –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç—ã –º—ã –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ–º –≤ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–µ:

    TFS, JIRA, PL/SQL Developer, SoapUI, Postman, Selenium, Jenkins, TeamCity, Azure DevOps, Intellij IDEA, MS Test Manager, JMeter, Putty, Kibana, Jaeger, RabbitMQ

    –ß—Ç–æ –º—ã –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ–º:

    • –ö–æ–Ω–∫—É—Ä–µ–Ω—Ç–Ω–∞—è, —Å—Ç–∞–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –∑–∞—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–Ω–∞—è –ø–ª–∞—Ç–∞ –¥–≤–∞ —Ä–∞–∑–∞ –≤ –º–µ—Å—è—Ü + –ø–æ–ª—É–≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—ã–µ –ø—Ä–µ–º–∏–∏.
    • –†–∞—Å—à–∏—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Å–æ—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –ø–∞–∫–µ—Ç (–î–ú–° —Å–æ —Å—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–µ–π, —Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ö–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∂–∏–∑–Ω–∏, —Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ö–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏ –ø–æ–µ–∑–¥–∫–∞—Ö –∑–∞ —Ä—É–±–µ–∂, –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–∞—è —Å–æ—Ç–æ–≤–∞—è —Å–≤—è–∑—å —Å –±–µ–∑–ª–∏–º–∏—Ç–Ω—ã–º –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–Ω–µ—Ç–æ–º –∏ –º–Ω–æ–≥–æ–µ –¥—Ä—É–≥–æ–µ).
    • –õ—å–≥–æ—Ç–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º—ã –∫—Ä–µ–¥–∏—Ç–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è, –î–ú–° –¥–ª—è —Ä–æ–¥—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤, —Å–∫–∏–¥–∫–∏ –Ω–∞ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å—ã –ú–¢–° –¥–ª—è —Å–µ–±—è –∏ –¥—Ä—É–∑–µ–π
    • –ö–æ–º—Ñ–æ—Ä—Ç–∞–±–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –æ—Ñ–∏—Å –≤ —Ü–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä–µ –≥–æ—Ä–æ–¥–∞ —Å –∫–æ—Ñ–µ, —Å–Ω—ç–∫–∞–º–∏ –∏ —Ñ—Ä—É–∫—Ç–∞–º–∏
    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å –≤–Ω–µ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–∞
    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–æ–∫ –ø–æ –†–§ –∏ –±–ª–∏–∂–Ω–µ–º—É –∑–∞—Ä—É–±–µ–∂—å—é.


  32. Devops –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä (–û–±—â–∏–µ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å—ã) ("–¢1 –ö–æ–Ω—Å–∞–ª—Ç–∏–Ω–≥", –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞) [ 2022-05-22 ]

    –¢1 –ö–æ–Ω—Å–∞–ª—Ç–∏–Ω–≥ ‚Äì —Ä–æ—Å—Å–∏–π—Å–∫–∞—è –ò–¢-–∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è, —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏–∑–∏—Ä—É–µ—Ç—Å—è –Ω–∞ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–º –∫–æ–Ω—Å–∞–ª—Ç–∏–Ω–≥–µ –∏ –≤–Ω–µ–¥—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–∏ –±–∏–∑–Ω–µ—Å-–ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π, –æ—Ö–≤–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞—é—â–∏—Ö –≤—Å–µ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–∏ —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å–æ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–º –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ø—Ä–∏—è—Ç–∏–µ–º, –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ—Ç –ø–æ–ª–Ω—ã–π –∫–æ–º–ø–ª–µ–∫—Å —É—Å–ª—É–≥ –¥–ª—è —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ —Ü–∏—Ñ—Ä–æ–≤–æ–π —Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç–µ–≥–∏–∏ –∏ –ø–æ–≤—ã—à–µ–Ω–∏—è –æ–ø–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–æ–π —ç—Ñ—Ñ–µ–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ø—Ä–∏—è—Ç–∏—è. –ü—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–∞—è —ç–∫—Å–ø–µ—Ä—Ç–∏–∑–∞ –¢1 –ö–æ–Ω—Å–∞–ª—Ç–∏–Ω–≥ –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∞ —Ü–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä–∞–º–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–µ—Ç–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–π CRM, ERP, 1–°, –¶–∏—Ñ—Ä–æ–≤—ã–µ —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è.

    –û –Ω–∞—à–µ–º –¥–µ–ø–∞—Ä—Ç–∞–º–µ–Ω—Ç–µ –¶–∏—Ñ—Ä–æ–≤—ã–µ —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è - –º—ã –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞ —É–≤–ª–µ—á–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –ª—é–¥–µ–π. 250+ —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏—Å—Ç–æ–≤ —Å —É–Ω–∏–∫–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–º –±—ç–∫–≥—Ä–∞—É–Ω–¥–æ–º, —Å–æ–±—Ä–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–º –≤ –∫—Ä—É–ø–Ω–µ–π—à–∏—Ö —Ä–æ—Å—Å–∏–π—Å–∫–∏—Ö –∏ –º–µ–∂–¥—É–Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–Ω—ã—Ö IT –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∞—Ö. –≠–∫—Å–ø–µ—Ä—Ç–æ–≤, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞—é—Ç —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å—ã, —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–Ω—ã–µ –º–µ–Ω—è—Ç—å –∏–Ω–¥—É—Å—Ç—Ä–∏–∏. –õ—é–¥–µ–π, —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–Ω—ã—Ö –≥–∞—Ä–º–æ–Ω–∏—á–Ω–æ —Å–æ—á–µ—Ç–∞—Ç—å –∫–∞—Ä—å–µ—Ä—É, —É–≤–ª–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏ –º–µ—á—Ç—ã. –î–ª—è –Ω–∞—Å –≤–∞–∂–Ω–æ –±—ã—Ç—å –≤–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–º–∏, —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–≤–∞—Ç—å –Ω—É–∂–Ω—ã–µ –∏ –ø–æ–ª–µ–∑–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç—ã.

    –û –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–µ: "–û–±—â–∏–µ –°–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å—ã" - –º–æ–ª–æ–¥–∞—è –¥–∏–Ω–∞–º–∏—á–Ω–∞—è –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞ –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–∏ –æ–¥–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∏–∑ –∫—Ä—É–ø–Ω–æ–≥–æ –±–∞–Ω–∫–∞ TOP 3, –≤–µ—Ä—è—â–∞—è –≤ Scrum –∏ –∫–ª–∞—Å—Å–Ω—ã–µ –∫–∞—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç—ã. –í —Å–≤—è–∑–∏ —Å –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–æ–º –Ω–æ–≤—ã—Ö –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–π –º—ã —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∏—Ä—É–µ–º –Ω–æ–≤—ã–µ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã –¥–ª—è –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∫—Ä–µ–¥–∏—Ç–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è —é—Ä. –ª–∏—Ü. –ú—ã —É–∂–µ –ø–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–∏–ª–∏ –∫—Ä–µ–¥–∏—Ç–Ω—ã–π –∫–æ–Ω–≤–µ–µ—Ä Digital Credit –¥–ª—è –∫—Ä—É–ø–Ω–æ–≥–æ –±–∏–∑–Ω–µ—Å–∞ (–ì–∞–∑–ø—Ä–æ–º, HeadHunter, –†–ñ–î –∏—Ç–¥.) –¢–µ–ø–µ—Ä—å –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É—è –µ–≥–æ –∫–∞–∫ –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º—É, —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞–µ–º –∫—Ä–µ–¥–∏—Ç–Ω—ã–π –∫–æ–Ω–≤–µ–µ—Ä –¥–ª—è –º–∞–ª–æ–≥–æ –∏ —Å—Ä–µ–¥–Ω–µ–≥–æ –±–∏–∑–Ω–µ—Å–∞.

    –°—Ç–µ–∫ –Ω–∞ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–µ:Java 8-11, Docker, Kubernetes (OpenShift), Spring Security, Spring Data, Spring Boot, REST, SOAP, MQ, React, Redux, TypeScript, Git, Jira, Confluence.

    –ß–µ–º –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–æ–∏—Ç –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ç—å—Å—è:

    • –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–æ–π –∏ –≤–Ω–µ–¥—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º CI/CD –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–æ–≤ –≤ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞—Ö;
    • –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–æ–π Kubernetes;
    • –ù–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ–º Helm Chart;
    • –ê–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–µ–π –≤—Å–µ—Ö —Ä—É—á–Ω—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–æ–≤;
    –ß—Ç–æ –º—ã –æ–∂–∏–¥–∞–µ–º —É–≤–∏–¥–µ—Ç—å –æ—Ç –∫–∞–Ω–¥–∏–¥–∞—Ç–∞:
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –û–° Linux;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Docker;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å OpenShift;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç–æ–≤ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –≤—ã—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–∏–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è CI/CD –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–æ–≤;

    –ë—É–¥–µ—Ç –∑–¥–æ—Ä–æ–≤–æ –µ—Å–ª–∏ —É —Ç–µ–±—è –µ—Å—Ç—å:

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –Ω–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏—è –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –Ω–∞ —è–∑—ã–∫–µ Golang / Python;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å PostgreSQL, Redis, MongoDB;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Kafka, RabbitMQ;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Minio.

    –¢1 –ö–æ–Ω—Å–∞–ª—Ç–∏–Ω–≥ —Å—Ç—Ä–µ–º–∏—Ç—Å—è —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞—Ç—å –∫–æ–º—Ñ–æ—Ä—Ç–Ω—ã–µ —É—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –¥–ª—è –∫–∞–∂–¥–æ–≥–æ —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–∞, –ø–æ—ç—Ç–æ–º—É –º—ã –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ–º:

    • –†–∞–±–æ—Ç—É –≤ –∫—Ä—É–ø–Ω–æ–π, —Å—Ç–∞–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ–π IT –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏ - —É –Ω–∞—Å –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç—ã, –≤—Å–µ ¬´—Å –Ω—É–ª—è¬ª –∏ –Ω–∏–∫–∞–∫–æ–≥–æ Legacy;
    • ¬´–ë–µ–ª—É—é¬ª –∑–∞—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–Ω—É—é –ø–ª–∞—Ç—É;
    • –û—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –≤ —à—Ç–∞—Ç –ø–æ –¢–ö –†–§ —Å –ø–µ—Ä–≤–æ–≥–æ –¥–Ω—è;
    • –î–ú–° —Å–æ —Å—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–µ–π (–ø–æ—Å–ª–µ –∏—Å–ø—ã—Ç–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å—Ä–æ–∫–∞);
    • –£–¥–æ–±–Ω—ã–π –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –∏ –≥–∏–±–∫–æ–µ –Ω–∞—á–∞–ª–æ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–µ–≥–æ –¥–Ω—è;
    • –û–ø–ª–∞—á–∏–≤–∞–µ–º–æ–µ –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å–≤–æ–∏—Ö —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤ –∑–∞ —Å—á—ë—Ç –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏;
    • –ö–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–µ —Å–∫–∏–¥–∫–∏ –Ω–∞ –∑–∞–Ω—è—Ç–∏—è —Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç–æ–º –≤ —Å–µ—Ç—å —Ñ–∏—Ç–Ω–µ—Å –∫–ª—É–±–æ–≤ –ø—Ä–µ–º–∏—É–º –∫–ª–∞—Å—Å–∞ World Class –∏ –Ω–∞ —Ñ–∏—Ç–Ω–µ—Å-–∞–±–æ–Ω–µ–º–µ–Ω—Ç—ã Fitmost;
    • –ö–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–µ —Å–∫–∏–¥–∫–∏ –≤ —à–∫–æ–ª—É –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ —è–∑—ã–∫–∞ Skyeng;
    • –ö–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–µ —Å–∫–∏–¥–∫–∏ –Ω–∞ online-–æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –æ—Ç Skillbox;
    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –≤—Å—Ç—É–ø–∏—Ç—å –≤ —Å–æ–±—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—É—é –±–∞—Å–∫–µ—Ç–±–æ–ª—å–Ω—É—é –∏ –≤–æ–ª–µ–π–±–æ–ª—å–Ω—É—é –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—É;
    • –£–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π, –∫–æ–º–±–∏–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π –∏–ª–∏ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–Ω—ã–π —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã.


  33. Senior Backend Engineer (NodeJS) ("–ò–Ω—Å–ø–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–æ –ë–µ–ª", –ú–∏–Ω—Å–∫) [ 2022-05-22 ]
    ...ation (Paid-time Off) Work From Anywhere (working remotely or from the Inspectorio Minsk office) Health in...

    About Us

    Inspectorio's cloud-based SaaS solution helps brands, retailers, manufacturers, and suppliers manage risk through digitalized quality and compliance programs. Inspectorio aims to build an interconnected, sustainable, and transparent supply chain. Today, Inspectorio is used by over 15,000+ people across the globe, including some of the largest brands and retailers in the world. Inspectorio gives brands, retailers, and suppliers the tools to predict areas of high risk and automate risk-based interventions across the supply chain.

    Inspectorio Products Allow Customers:
    ¬∑ Digitize, standardize, and automate quality and compliance activities
    ¬∑ Optimize supplier performance management operations
    ¬∑ Implement continuous improvement programs
    ¬∑ Allocate resources for performance optimization

    Our Products
    Inspectorio SIGHT
    SIGHT allows retailers, brands, suppliers, factories, and 3rd parties to manage all their quality activities in a single platform, with a strong focus on advanced analytics AI & Machine Learning. SIGHT focused at the product level, that is, a t-shirt or jeans. RISE concentrated at the facility level, or the factory/manufacturing facility itself, where that t-shirt and jeans were made.

    Inspectorio RISE
    RISE is a single platform to audit procedures and verification for compliance from the large retailers such as Target, Walmart, and Tesco to the specific factories they are operating with.

    What is RISE?
    Retailers create customized standards or apply international standards like environmental compliance and social labor law that factories must comply with. The primary purpose of our product is to provide large retailers with a flexible, configurable tool so that they can create their own sets of standards.

    The next stage in the RISE evolution focuses on AI & Machine Learning for predictive insights and dynamic risk-based interventions.

    Job Summary

    We strongly value engineering excellence and build our team accordingly. We‚Äôre looking for a skilled and autonomous Senior Engineer capable of providing end-to-end feature implementation with a balance between code quality and time. You will be working with other multi-cultural teams across the globe (Product Owners, Designers, DevOps).

    Our Technologies: Node.js, Express.js, Apollo, Postgres, Redis, Knex, Puppeteer

    Our Tools: ESLint, Prettier, Husky, Webpack, Docker/Docker-compose, GitlabCI, Jest+Enzyme.

    What you'll do

    • DB schema design, enhancements, performance improvements
    • Design, develop, and optimize backend-based services
    • Unit and API tests implementation
    • Code review
    • Application monitoring and logs validation
    • Documentation creation and maintaining
    • Manage service releases
    • Contribute to the general engineering culture
    • Integration with a Front-end is a plus.

    Must have

    • Working experience with NodeJS and PostgreSQL (or equivalent RDBMS)
    • Experience with tests implementation
    • In-depth knowledge of building a high-performance, decoupled, testable, maintainable application
    • Ensure code quality and performance optimization
    • Knows something about CI/CD, Release Strategies, Code Review
    • Able to understand, design, and write technical documentation
    • Familiar with Scrum or other Agile methodologies
    • Good spoken and written English

    Nice to have

    • Experience with Express.js is a plus
    • Experience with Apollo or GraphQL is a plus
    • Experience with React is a plus
    • Experience with GCP (or similar cloud providers) is a plus

    Benefits

    • Unlimited Annual Leave / Vacation (Paid-time Off)
    • Work From Anywhere (working remotely or from the Inspectorio Minsk office)
    • Health insurance
    • Sponsorship for Professional Development
    • Sponsorship for personal Wellbeing activities (hobbies, physical/mental health, art)
    • Gifts/Shopping Vouchers for important events (work anniversary, birthday, childbirth, marriage, New year)
    • Yearly bonus and salary review based on performance evaluation.


  34. Middle Devops ("7RedLines", –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞) map[currency:RUR from:190000 gross:false to:190000] [ 2022-05-22 ]

    –£–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–∞—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞

    –¢—Ä–µ–±—É–µ–º—ã–π –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã: –æ—Ç 3-—Ö –ª–µ—Ç

    –ü–æ–ª–Ω–∞—è –∑–∞–Ω—è—Ç–æ—Å—Ç—å, –ø–æ–ª–Ω—ã–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–∏–π –¥–µ–Ω—å

    –í –í–∞—à–∏ –æ–±—è–∑–∞–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –≤—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç—å:

    - –£—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∞, –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–æ—Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–Ω–æ–º —Å–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–∏–∏ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤ –∏ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º –≤ —Ä—É—á–Ω–æ–º –∏ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–º —Ä–µ–∂–∏–º–µ;

    - –ù–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç–æ–≤ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏, –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞, –∫–æ–Ω—Å—É–ª—å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–æ–≤, –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ CI/CD.

    –¢—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è:

    –û–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ:

    - –£–≤–µ—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–µ –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ Linux;

    - –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å–µ—Ç–µ–π, –æ–ø—ã—Ç –±–∞–ª–∞–Ω—Å–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∫–∏ –Ω–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏;

    - –£–≤–µ—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ Git;

    - –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ CI/CD-–ø–∞–π–ø–ª–∞–π–Ω–æ–≤ –Ω–∞ –±–∞–∑–µ GitLab –∏–ª–∏ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º;

    - –ò—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ Artifactory/Nexus;

    - –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ Bash;

    - –í–ª–∞–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ Ansible, Terraform;

    - –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å docker/docker-compose;

    - –û–ø—ã—Ç –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ —Å—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–≤ –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞ –Ω–∞ –±–∞–∑–µ Prometheus, Grafana;

    - –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å ELK;

    - –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã PostgreSQL, MySQL, Redis;

    - –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã Kafka, RabbitMQ;

    - –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –ø—Ä–æ–∫—Å–∏/—Ä–µ–≤–µ—Ä—Å-–ø—Ä–æ–∫—Å–∏ –∏ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ NGINX, HAproxy.

    –ñ–µ–ª–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ:

    - –û–ø—ã—Ç –ø–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω–∏—è –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã;

    - –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –∏ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–æ–≤ PostgreSQL - Patroni, MySql - Percona;

    - –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ä–∏–µ–º –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–π–Ω–µ—Ä–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ Kubernetes/OpenShift/Rancher/Helm;

    - –ò—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ HashiCorp Vault;

    - –≠–∫—Å–ø–ª—É–∞—Ç–∞—Ü–∏—è MiniO/Ceph;

    - –û–ø—ã—Ç –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ –ª–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –Ω–∞ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–µ Elastic Stack —Å –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å—é Sidecar-–∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–π–Ω–µ—Ä–æ–≤ –∏ log-–∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–≤;

    - –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–æ–≤ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –∏ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ –±–µ–∑–æ–ø–∞—Å–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å–æ–µ–¥–∏–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è (SSL/TLS/mTLS);

    - –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å JWT;

    - –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã c –ë–î Oracle, MongoDB.

    –ë—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–ª—é—Å–æ–º:

    - –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ Python;

    - –†–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ —Å Tarantool;

    - –¢—é–Ω–∏–Ω–≥ Kubernetes/OpenShift;

    - –¢—é–Ω–∏–Ω–≥ PostgreSQL, MySQL;

    - –û–ø—ã—Ç —ç–∫—Å–ø–ª—É–∞—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏: Clickhouse, Greenplum/Arenadata;

    - –¢—Ä–∞–±–ª—à—É—Ç–∏–Ω–≥ –ø—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º –≤ –º–∏–∫—Ä–æ-—Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–Ω–æ–π –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä–µ;

    - –ù–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ–¥–∞ –Ω–∞ Java / Python / Go.

    –£—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è:

    - –¢—Ä—É–¥–æ—É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤–æ –≤ —à—Ç–∞—Ç –Ω–∞ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –¢–ö –†–§;

    - –£–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–∞—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ –ø–æ –º–æ—Å–∫–æ–≤—Å–∫–æ–º—É –≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–∏, –ª—é–±–æ–π –≥–æ—Ä–æ–¥;

    - –£—Ä–æ–≤–µ–Ω—å –¥–æ—Ö–æ–¥–∞ –≤ —Å–æ–æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–∏–∏ —Å –Ω–∞–≤—ã–∫–∞–º–∏, –ø–æ —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç–∞–º –≤—Å—Ç—Ä–µ—á.


  35. Devops Engineer (OpenStack (—É–¥–∞–ª—ë–Ω–Ω–æ) ("–±–∏–ª–∞–π–Ω", –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞) [ 2022-05-22 ]

    ¬´–ë–∏–ª–∞–π–Ω¬ª —Å–µ–π—á–∞—Å ‚Äì –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏–∑–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–π. –í 2020 –º—ã –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ–ª–∏ –º–∞—Å—à—Ç–∞–±–Ω—É—é —Ä–µ—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—é –∏ –æ–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–∏–ª–∏ –¥–ª—è —Å–µ–±—è —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–µ—Ç—ã:

    • –¢–µ–ª–µ–∫–æ–º –∏ —Å–≤—è–∑—å - –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–∞ –±–∏–∑–Ω–µ—Å–∞, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—É—é –º—ã –ø–ª–∞–Ω–∏—Ä—É–µ–º –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å–∞–º–∏.
    • –†–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ –∫–ª—é—á–µ–≤—ã—Ö –ò–¢-–∫–æ–º–ø–µ—Ç–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–π –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏. –ú—ã –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ–ª–∏ –∏–Ω—Å–æ—Ä—Å —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã —Å–∞–º–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ –æ—Ç–≤–µ—á–∞—Ç—å –∑–∞ —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∏—Ä—É–µ–º.
    • –ö–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç –≤ –ø—Ä–∏–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–µ—Ç–µ. –í—Å–µ, —á—Ç–æ –º—ã –¥–µ–ª–∞–µ–º, –º—ã –¥–µ–ª–∞–µ–º –¥–ª—è –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞ –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–µ–≥–æ (—Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏, –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–≥–∏) –∏–ª–∏ –≤–Ω–µ—à–Ω–µ–≥–æ (–∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π –ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ—Ç—Å—è –ë–∏–ª–∞–π–Ω)
    • –ü—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤—ã–π –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥ –∏ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ –ø–æ Agile. –ö–∞–∂–¥—ã–π —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫ ‚Äì –≤–ª–∞–¥–µ–ª–µ—Ü —Å–≤–æ–µ–≥–æ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–∞, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π –æ—Ç–≤–µ—á–∞–µ—Ç –∑–∞ –≤—Å–µ –µ–≥–æ —á–∞—Å—Ç–∏, –Ω–µ –≤–∞–∂–Ω—ã—Ö —á–∞—Å—Ç–µ–π –Ω–µ—Ç.

    –ú—ã —Å—Ç—Ä–æ–∏–º —Ü–∏—Ñ—Ä–æ–≤—É—é data-driven –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—é, –∏ —Ç—ã –º–æ–∂–µ—à—å –Ω–∞–º –≤ —ç—Ç–æ–º –ø–æ–º–æ—á—å.

    –£—Ä–æ–≤–µ–Ω—å –∑–∞—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–Ω–æ–π –ø–ª–∞—Ç—ã –æ–±—Å—É–∂–¥–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –ø–æ —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç–∞–º —Å–æ–±–µ—Å–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è.

    –û—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–∞—è —Ä–æ–ª—å Devops Engineer:

    • –¢–µ—Å–Ω–æ–µ –≤–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏–µ —Å –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞–º–∏ –∏–∑ –¶–û–î, –≤–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏–µ –∏ —É—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏–µ –≤ –ø–ª–∞–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –∏ –æ–ø—Ç–∏–º–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ —Å–µ—Ç–µ–≤–æ–π –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã –¥–ª—è —Å–µ—Ä–≤–µ—Ä–æ–≤ —Å –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞–º–∏ —Å–µ—Ç–µ–≤—ã—Ö –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–æ–≤;
    • –°–æ–ø—Ä–æ–≤–æ–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ OpenStack –∏ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã OpenStack –Ω–∞ –±–∞–∑–µ –û–° —Å–µ–º–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∞ Debian –∏ RHEL;
    • –¢–æ–Ω–∫–∏–π —Ç—é–Ω–∏–Ω–≥ —è–¥—Ä–∞ Linux, –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä–Ω–æ–µ –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ cpu, –ø–∞–º—è—Ç–∏ –∏—Ç. –¥.
    • –ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –û–° –ø–æ–¥ —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã–µ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏ –≤–∏—Ä—Ç—É–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏;
    • –û–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ —É–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø–∏—Å–∞—Ç—å —Ä–æ–ª–∏ –∏ –ø–ª–µ–π–±—É–∫–∏ –¥–ª—è ansible, —Ä–∞–∑–º–µ—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ –≤ git;
    • –†–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ —Å –æ–±–æ—Ä—É–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ–º —Ä–∞–∑–ª–∏—á–Ω—ã—Ö –≤–µ–Ω–¥–æ—Ä–æ–≤ (HP, Huawei);
    • –ú–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥ –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã –∏ —Ä–µ–∞–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–∞ –∏–Ω—Ü–∏–¥–µ–Ω—Ç—ã;
    • –í–µ–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ –¥–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏, –∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ–µ —É—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏–µ –≤ best practices –≤ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç–µ OpenStack –∏ Linux.

    –ú—ã —Ä–∞—Å—Å—á–∏—Ç—ã–≤–∞–µ–º, —á—Ç–æ —É —Ç–µ–±—è –µ—Å—Ç—å –æ–ø—ã—Ç:

    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã —è–¥—Ä–∞ Linux –∏ –µ–≥–æ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤, —É–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ –æ–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª—è—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º—ã –∫–∞–∫ —Å –û–°, —Å–µ—Ç—å—é —Ç–∞–∫ –∏ —Å –∂–µ–ª–µ–∑–æ–º;
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∞–ø–ø–∞—Ä–∞—Ç–Ω–æ–π —á–∞—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–µ—Ä–Ω–æ–≥–æ –æ–±–æ—Ä—É–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è (HP, Huawei);
    • –£–≤–µ—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å—Ç–∞–Ω–¥–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ –¥–∏–∞–≥–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ —Å–æ—Ñ—Ç–∞ –≤ linux –∏ —É–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ –µ–≥–æ –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–ø—Ä–µ—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –¥–ª—è –ø—Ä–µ–¥–æ—Ç–≤—Ä–∞—â–µ–Ω–∏—è –ø—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º –∏ –∏—Ö –æ–ø–µ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ–≥–æ —É—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è, –¥–∏–∞–≥–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º –Ω–∞ —Ä–∞–Ω–Ω–∏—Ö —Å—Ç–∞–¥–∏—è—Ö;
    • –£–≤–µ—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è —Å–µ—Ç–µ–π;
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≥–∏–ø–µ—Ä–≤–∏–∑–æ—Ä–∞ kvm –∏ –µ–≥–æ –≤–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏—è —Å —è–¥—Ä–æ–º Linux;
    • –ê–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–∏–π —è–∑—ã–∫ –Ω–∞ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ —Å–≤–æ–±–æ–¥–Ω–æ–≥–æ —á—Ç–µ–Ω–∏—è –¥–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏.

    –ë—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–ª—é—Å–æ–º:

    –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è –æ Ceph.


  36. DevOps Tech Lead at Orca Security ("–û–Ω –ó—ç –°–ø–æ—Ç –î–µ–≤–µ–ª–æ–ø–º–µ–Ω—Ç", –ú–∏–Ω—Å–∫) [ 2022-05-22 ]
    ... courses - 2 times a week (at the pandemic time - remotely); Convenient location in the center of Minsk,...

    Company

    At Orca, we believe that in the right environment and with the right team, talent has no boundaries. This team spirit, together with our drive to always aim high (because the cloud is the limit), have quickly earned us unicorn status and turned us into a global cloud security innovation leader. So if you‚Äôre ready to join an amazing team of people who inspire each other every day, now is the time to find your place in our pod.

    About the role:

    We are growing and looking for a talented highly-motivated, multi-tasker, and demonstrated team-player to join us. If you are looking for a challenging, interesting, and a high pace evolving product this might be the position for you. We have an inspiring team of top talents building a new SaaS product that revolutionizes the way security is being done in the cloud, using the latest technologies. We believe in infrastructure as a code and with a security mind set and encourage out of the box thinking and creativity.

    Our DevOps team is a core team in our R&D, and key function in product development and delivery. In your role as a DevOps Tech Lead, you will plan, develop, monitor, and optimize the architecture of our company‚Äôs systems. You should excel in working with large-scale applications and frameworks and have outstanding communication and leadership skills.

    On a typical day you'll:

    • You will work with technologies such as Kubernetes, Dockers, Helm etc.

    • Lead the design and implement solutions to improve new and existing infrastructure

    • You will act as technical focal point for DevOps

    • Lead code reviews and code quality sessions

    • Build monitoring systems, monitor the system‚Äôs health, implementing self-healing systems

    • Build and support R&D development, and production environments

    • Design and implement robust CI/CD pipelines

    • Assess existing implementation procedures to ensure they comply with internal and external regulations.

    • Design architecture for scale and implement self healing for Production environments

    • Offer support by responding to system problems in a timely manner

    About you:

    • Minimum of 4+ years of experience in a similar role and experience working with AWS cloud

    • Knowledge and experience with Docker and containers orchestration - Kubernetes

    • Experience with Infrastructure as code, deployments done using descriptive languages such as Ansible & Terraform

    • Programming experience with Python/Software development

    • Advance scripting in Bash/other

    • Advance knowledge in GitOps, ArgoCD, Atlantis, Github runners/actions, SonarQube

    • Technical leadership experience in similar roles

    • Self-driven and eager to learn

    • Excellent organizational, analytical abilities and problem solving

    • Monitoring tools - Prometheus

    • Knowledge in various system-level topics - OS, networking, file system management

    • Good English written and verbal communication skills

    • Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or equivalent experience

    Benefits of working with us:

    • An inspiring work environment;

    • Paid vacation ‚Äî 25 calendar days, 100% sick leave payment;

    • 5 sick days per year;

    • Inflation-protected wages with regular revision of compensation conditions;

    • Medical insurance (after the end of the probationary period);

    • Parking space (upon request and availability);

    • English courses - 2 times a week (at the pandemic time - remotely);

    • Convenient location in the center of Minsk, 5-7 minutes from Ploshcha Peramohi and Yakuba Kolasa metro stations, at the address: st. Smolyachkova 14A;

    • Comfortable and well-equipped open-space with an organized home-style kitchen with fresh fruits, yogurts, a coffee machine, sweets, and biscuits;

    • Bright and memorable corporate life: corporate parties 2 times a year, gifts to employees in honor of life events, weekly pizza-fridays with board games.

    –ú—ã —É–¥–µ–ª—è–µ–º –æ—Å–æ–±–æ–µ –≤–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∫–∞—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤—É –Ω–∞—à–µ–≥–æ –∫–æ–¥–∞ –∏ –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω—è–µ–º—ã–º –ø—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫–∞–º. –î–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ü–∏—è, DDD, semantic versioning, —Ç–µ—Å—Ç—ã, CI/CD - –∫–ª—é—á–µ–≤—ã–µ –ø–∞—Ä–∞–º–µ—Ç—Ä—ã —É—Å–ø–µ—à–Ω–æ–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã.

    –ß–µ–º –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–æ–∏—Ç –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ç—å—Å—è:

    • –†–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å –≤ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–µ –∏ –º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—Ç—å —Å–≤–æ–∏—Ö –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–≥;

    • –£—á–∞—Å—Ç–≤–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –≤ –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑–µ —Ç—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–π, –æ—Ü–µ–Ω–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å—Ä–æ–∫–∏ –∏ —Å—Ç–∞–≤–∏—Ç—å –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏ –¥–ª—è —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–æ–≤;

    • –í—ã—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—É –∏ –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å—ã –≤ —Å–≤–æ–µ–º –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–∏;

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ highload'–æ–≤ –∏ —Ñ–∏–Ω–∞–Ω—Å–æ–≤—ã—Ö —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤;

    • REST API / Web Socket;

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ —Å –≤–Ω–µ—à–Ω–∏–º–∏ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–º–∏;

    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–æ–≤ –∞—Å–∏–Ω—Ö—Ä–æ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è;

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–º–∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–π–Ω–µ—Ä–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∏ –æ—Ä–∫–µ—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏: Docker –∏ Kubernetes;
