    ‚Äì –£–≤–µ—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –Ω–∞–≤—ã–∫–∏ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Ä–µ–ª—è—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–º–∏ –°–£–ë–î (–æ–ø—ã—Ç –æ–ø—Ç–∏–º–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ SQL –∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å–æ–≤, –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ PostgreSQL), –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–ª—é—Å–æ–º –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å MPP-–°–£–ë–î (Greenplum, Arenadata DB)
    ‚Äì –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã —Ö—Ä–∞–Ω–∏–ª–∏—â –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö, —Ç–∏–ø–æ–≤—ã—Ö –∞–ª–≥–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–º–æ–≤ –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –≤ —Ö—Ä–∞–Ω–∏–ª–∏—â–µ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö
    ‚Äì –•–æ—Ä–æ—à–µ–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ Python
    ‚Äì –ë–∞–∑–æ–≤—ã–µ –Ω–∞–≤—ã–∫–∏ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Git, Linux, Airflow

    –ú—ã –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ–º –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–Ω—É—é —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—É, –∞ –µ—â–µ:

    • –°–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞ –º–æ—Ç–∏–≤–∞—Ü–∏–∏: –æ–∫–ª–∞–¥ (–æ–±—Å—É–∂–¥–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –∏–Ω–¥–∏–≤–∏–¥—É–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ) + –∫–≤–∞—Ä—Ç–∞–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –ø—Ä–µ–º–∏—è;
    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–µ–Ω —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã;
    • –ö–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–∞—è –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∞ –ª–æ—è–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ + –ø—Ä–∏—è—Ç–Ω—ã–π cashback –æ—Ç –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω–µ—Ä–æ–≤ –ë–∞–Ω–∫–∞;
    • –≠–ª–µ–∫—Ç—Ä–æ–Ω–Ω–∞—è –±–∏–±–ª–∏–æ—Ç–µ–∫–∞ MyBook;
    • –î–ú–° (–≤–∫–ª—é—á–∞—è —Å—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ —É—Å–ª—É–≥–∏) –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ —Ñ–∞–∫—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ –ø—Ä–æ—Ö–æ–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏—Å–ø—ã—Ç–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å—Ä–æ–∫–∞;
    • –õ—å–≥–æ—Ç–Ω—ã–µ —É—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è –∫—Ä–µ–¥–∏—Ç–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è.


  449. –°–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–Ω—ã–π –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä (DevOps) ("SAPRUN", –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞) [ 2022-05-11 ]
    ...–æ—Ç—ã –∏ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ; –î–ú–° —Å–æ —Å—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–µ–π –ø–æ—...

    –ö–õ–Æ–ß–ï–í–´–ï –ó–ê–î–ê–ß–ò:
    • –£—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏–µ –≤ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–∏ MES-—Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º;
    • –†–∞–∑–≤–µ—Ä—Ç—ã–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ GNU/Linux (CentOS/RHEL - 7/8 –≤ –ø—Ä–∏–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–µ—Ç–µ);
    • –û–±—â–µ–µ –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å—Ç–µ–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–æ—Ç–æ–∫–æ–ª–æ–≤ TCP/IP, –º–∞—Ä—à—Ä—É—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏, —Ñ–∏–ª—å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏;
    • –†–∞–∑–≤–µ—Ä—Ç—ã–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ Docker/Podman, —Ä–∞–∑–≤–µ—Ä—Ç—ã–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏–∫–ª–∞–¥–Ω—ã—Ö —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–π –≤ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å—Ä–µ–¥–∞—Ö;
    • –†–∞–∑–≤–µ—Ä—Ç—ã–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ Kubernetes/OKD/Openshift. –†–∞–∑–≤–æ—Ä–∞—á–∏–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏ –ø–æ–º–æ—â–∏ Kubeadm;
    • –†–∞–∑–≤–µ—Ä—Ç—ã–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ Nginx/Kong;
    • –†–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ —Å—Ü–µ–Ω–∞—Ä–∏–µ–≤ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –ø—Ä–∏ –ø–æ–º–æ—â–∏ Ansible. –ë—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–ª—é—Å–æ–º –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Helm;
    • –†–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ –ø–∞–π–ø–ª–∞–π–Ω–æ–≤ gitlab –∏ jenkins. –ë—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–ª—é—Å–æ–º —É–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑—ã –≤ Sonarqube, Anchore, OWASP Dependency Check;
    • –£–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —Å —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç–∞–º–∏ json (–∑–Ω–∞–∫–æ–º—Å—Ç–≤–æ —Å jsonPath), yaml, xml, csv;
    • –†–∞–∑–≤–µ—Ä—Ç—ã–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ KeyCloak. –ë—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–æ–ª—é—Å–æ–º –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞ HashiCorp Vault;
    • –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π, —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –Ω–∞ –Ω–∞ .Net Core, Spring Boot, Go, Angular Single SPA;
    • –†–∞–∑–≤–µ—Ä—Ç—ã–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ, –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –∏ –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ Cassandra, PostgreSQL (Stolon), Kafka, Elasticsearch, Redis, RabbitMQ, Zookeper, NiFi, Spark, Debezium, Minio;
    • –°–±–æ—Ä –∏ —Ä–∞–∑–±–æ—Ä –ø—Ä–æ–∏–∑–≤–æ–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –ª–æ–≥–æ–≤ –ø—Ä–∏ –ø–æ–º–æ—â–∏ Fluentd/Fluentbit;
    • –ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –æ–≤–µ—Ä–ª–µ–π–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–µ—Ç–µ–π Calico/Flannel/Canal. –ü–ª—é—Å–æ–º –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å mesh Istio –∏–ª–∏ Maesh;
    • –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ Prometheus –∏ Grafana. –ü–ª—é—Å–æ–º –±—É–¥–µ—Ç —É–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —Å Zabbix, Netdata;
    • –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ Jaeger, OpenTracing;
    • –ê–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ Docker Distribution –∏ Sonatype Nexus –∏–ª–∏ –∞–ª—å—Ç–µ—Ä–Ω–∞—Ç–∏–≤—ã: JFrog Artifactory, Harbor, Quay.
    –ß–¢–û –í–ê–ñ–ù–û –î–õ–Ø –ù–ê–°:
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ü–û –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–π–Ω–µ—Ä–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ Docker, —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã Kubernetes –∏–ª–∏ –∞–Ω–∞–ª–æ–≥–æ–≤;
    • –ê–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ PostgreSql –Ω–∞ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ middle;
    • –ê–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ Linux/Windows –Ω–∞ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ middle;
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª–∞ –ü–û —Å –æ—Ç–∫—Ä—ã—Ç—ã–º –∏—Å—Ö–æ–¥–Ω—ã–º –∫–æ–¥–æ–º: Nginx, Gitlab, Jenkins, KeyCloak, EFK-—Å—Ç–µ–∫, Prometheus, Grafana, NiFi, Kafka, Zookeeper, Redis;
    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–æ–≤ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç–æ–≤ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏;
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ Apache Cassandra (–∏–ª–∏ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏–µ NoSQL, –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø—ã, –æ—Ç–ª–∏—á–∏—è –æ—Ç SQL, –∫–æ–Ω–∫—Ä–µ—Ç–Ω—ã–µ –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º—ã);
    • –°–µ—Ç–µ–≤—ã–µ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–∏ (—Å—Ç–µ–∫ TCP/IP, –æ–ø—ã—Ç –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ —Å–µ—Ç–µ–≤–æ–≥–æ –æ–±–æ—Ä—É–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è), RDP;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –≤ —Å—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ –≤–Ω–µ–¥—Ä–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º –∫–ª–∞—Å—Å–∞ MES, LIMS, ERP –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø—Ä–µ–∏–º—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ–º;
    • –û—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å, —Å–∞–º–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å, –≥–∏–±–∫–æ—Å—Ç—å.

    –ú–´ –ü–†–ï–î–õ–ê–ì–ê–ï–ú –í–ê–ú:

    • –£—Ä–æ–≤–µ–Ω—å –∑–∞—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–Ω–æ–π –ø–ª–∞—Ç—ã –æ–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª—è–µ—Ç—Å—è –ø–æ —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç–∞–º —Å–æ–±–µ—Å–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è;
    • –û—Ñ–∏—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ —Ç—Ä—É–¥–æ—É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤–æ —Å–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å–Ω–æ –¢–ö –†–§;
    • –ì–∏–±–∫–∏–π –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –∏ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ;
    • –î–ú–° —Å–æ —Å—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–µ–π –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ –∏—Å–ø—ã—Ç–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å—Ä–æ–∫–∞;
    • –ö–æ–º–ø–µ–Ω—Å–∞—Ü–∏—è –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ–π —Å–≤—è–∑–∏;
    • –ü—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –∏ –∫–∞—Ä—å–µ—Ä–Ω—ã–π —Ä–æ—Å—Ç;
    • –ë–µ—Å–ø–ª–∞—Ç–Ω—ã–π —Ä–∞–∑–≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä–Ω—ã–π –∫–ª—É–± –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ —è–∑—ã–∫–∞;
    • –ú–æ–ª–æ–¥–æ–π –∏ –¥—Ä—É–∂–Ω—ã–π –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–∫—Ç–∏–≤ –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª–æ–≤.


  450. –ò–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä –≤–Ω–µ–¥—Ä–µ–Ω–∏—è / Junior DevOps ("–ê–Ω–ª–∏–º–∏—Ç–µ–¥ –ü—Ä–æ–¥–∞–∫—à–µ–Ω", –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞) [ 2022-05-11 ]

    Unlimited eXpress

    –ù–∞—Å —É–∂–µ –±–æ–ª–µ–µ 100 —á–µ–ª–æ–≤–µ–∫ –≤ –†–æ—Å—Å–∏–∏ –∏ –∑–∞ –µ—ë –ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–∞–º–∏, –∞ –∫ –∫–æ–Ω—Ü—É 2021 –¥–æ–ª–∂–Ω–æ —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–∂–µ 200.

    –ú—ã –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–∏, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –∫–∞–∂–¥—ã–π –¥–µ–Ω—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—é—Ç –Ω–∞–¥ —É–ª—É—á—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º –≤—Å–µ—Ö –∞—Å–ø–µ–∫—Ç–æ–≤ –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º—ã, —Å–ª–µ–¥–∏–º –∑–∞ —Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–¥–∞–º–∏ –≤ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–µ, –Ω–µ –±–æ–∏–º—Å—è, –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞—Ç—å, –æ–±—Å—É–∂–¥–∞—Ç—å –∏ —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–æ–≤—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å –Ω–æ–≤—ã–µ –¥–∞–∂–µ —Å–∞–º—ã–µ –±–µ–∑—É–º–Ω—ã–µ –∏–¥–µ–∏.

    –ß—Ç–æ –º—ã –¥–µ–ª–∞–µ–º

    –ü–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º—É, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–∞—è –∑–∞–∫—Ä–æ–µ—Ç 95% –æ–ø–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –ø–æ—Ç—Ä–µ–±–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–µ–π —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤ –∫—Ä—É–ø–Ω—ã—Ö, —Å—Ä–µ–¥–Ω–∏—Ö –∏ –Ω–µ–±–æ–ª—å—à–∏—Ö –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–π.

    –ú—ã —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞–µ–º —É–¥–æ–±–Ω–æ–µ –∑–∞–∫—Ä—ã—Ç–æ–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω—Å—Ç–≤–æ –¥–ª—è –æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è, –∑–≤–æ–Ω–∫–æ–≤ –∏ —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞, –≥–¥–µ –ª—é–±–∞—è –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏—è –æ—Å—Ç–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –Ω–∞ –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ–º —Å–µ—Ä–≤–µ—Ä–µ. –í –æ—Ç–ª–∏—á–∏–µ –æ—Ç –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏—Ö –∞–Ω–∞–ª–æ–≥–æ–≤, —Ç–∞–∫–∏—Ö –∫–∞–∫ Teams, Slack –∏–ª–∏ Telegram, –º—ã —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–ª–∏ —É–Ω–∏–∫–∞–ª—å–Ω—É—é —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—é –¥–ª—è –≤–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏—è —Å –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–º–∏ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–µ—Ä–∞–º–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–π-–ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω—ë—Ä–æ–≤, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–∞—è –ø–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—è–µ—Ç –æ–±—â–∞—Ç—å—Å—è —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ –º–µ—Å—Å–µ–Ω–¥–∂–µ—Ä, –Ω–∞—Ö–æ–¥—è—Å—å –Ω–∞ —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–µ—Ä–≤–µ—Ä–∞—Ö, –∏ –¥–µ–ª–∞—Ç—å —É–Ω–∏–∫–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ —Å–∫–≤–æ–∑–Ω—ã–µ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏.

    –ú—ã —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ–º –Ω–∞–¥ —Ç–µ–º, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã –Ω–∞—à–∏ –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç—ã —á–∞—Ç–∏–ª–∏—Å—å, —Å–æ–∑–≤–∞–Ω–∏–≤–∞–ª–∏—Å—å –∏ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–ª–∏ –≤ eXpress, –∞ –Ω–µ –¥—É–º–∞–ª–∏, –∫–∞–∫–æ–µ –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏–º —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∏—Ç—å –Ω–∞ —ç—Ç–æ—Ç —Ä–∞–∑.

    –°–µ–π—á–∞—Å –∏—â–µ–º –∫ —Å–µ–±–µ –≤ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—É –ò–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞ –≤–Ω–µ–¥—Ä–µ–Ω–∏—è/–ò–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞ Linux, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —Å —à–∏—Ä–æ–∫–∏–º —Å–ø–µ–∫—Ç—Ä–æ–º —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–π, –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤ —Ä–∞—Å—Ç–∏(–≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–∏ –≥—Ä—É–ø–ø—ã –≤–Ω–µ–¥—Ä–µ–Ω–∏—è –≤ –ê—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∞ –∏–ª–∏ –≤ –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–∏ Devops) –∏ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–µ —Å –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–æ–π.

    –ó–∞–¥–∞—á–∏:

    • –†–∞–∑–≤–µ—Ä—Ç—ã–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–Ω–æ–≥–æ –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏—è Express —É –∑–∞–∫–∞–∑—á–∏–∫–æ–≤(–ø–∏–ª–æ—Ç–Ω—ã–µ –≤–Ω–µ–¥—Ä–µ–Ω–∏—è, –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–µ –æ—Ç–∫–∞–∑–æ—É—Å—Ç–æ–π—á–∏–≤—ã–µ —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è);
    • –†–∞–∑–≤–µ—Ä—Ç—ã–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å–æ–ø—É—Ç—Å—Ç–≤—É—é—â–µ–≥–æ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–Ω–æ–≥–æ –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –¥–ª—è —Ä–µ–∑–µ—Ä–≤–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–æ–ø–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞;
    • –†–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ –∏ –∞–¥–∞–ø—Ç–∞—Ü–∏—è –¥–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏;
    • –ö–æ–Ω—Å—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ü–∏—è –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏—Ö —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏—Å—Ç–æ–≤ –∑–∞–∫–∞–∑—á–∏–∫–æ–≤ –ø–æ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–Ω–æ–º—É –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏—é.

    –ü—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–æ–∏—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —Å–æ —Å—Ç–µ–∫–æ–º:

    –†–∞–∑–Ω—ã–µ –¥–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏–±—É—Ç–∏–≤—ã Linux, c docker –∏ docker-compose, postgresql, nfs-server, ntpd, chronyd, iptables, ansible, nginx, haproxy, keep-alived, corosync, pacemaker, kafka, zookeeper, coturn, redis, Prometheus, Grafana, zabbix.

    –ù–∞—à–∏ –æ–∂–∏–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è –æ—Ç –∫–∞–Ω–¥–∏–¥–∞—Ç–∞:
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –≤ –∫–∞—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞ Linux –æ—Ç 2-—Ö –ª–µ—Ç;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã Docker –∏ Ansible;
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å–µ—Ç–µ–≤—ã—Ö —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–π, –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä –∏ –ø—Ä–æ—Ç–æ–∫–æ–ª–æ–≤;
    • –ù–∞—á–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è –ø—Ä–æ—Ç–æ–∫–æ–ª–∞ SIP;
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ LDAP —Å–µ—Ä–≤–µ—Ä–æ–≤ –∫–∞—Ç–∞–ª–æ–≥–æ–≤: Microsoft Active Directory, Openldap;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å VMWare (ESX-ESXi), –∏–ª–∏ Microsoft Hyper-V;
    • –ë—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–ª—é—Å–æ–º –æ–ø—ã—Ç –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ iptables;
    • –ñ–µ–ª–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –∏ –ø—Ä–æ–±–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –Ω–æ–≤—ã–µ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–∏;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –ø–æ–¥–≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–∫–∏ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–Ω–æ–π –¥–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏.

    –ß—Ç–æ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤—ã —Ç–µ–±–µ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–æ–∂–∏—Ç—å:

    • –º–∞—Å—à—Ç–∞–±–Ω—ã–π –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç: –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ç—å—Å—è —à–∏—Ä–æ–∫–∏–º –∫—Ä—É–≥–æ–º –∑–∞–¥–∞—á.
    • —Å–ª–æ–∂–Ω—ã–µ –∏ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–Ω—ã–µ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏: –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–æ–∏—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —Å —à–∏—Ä–æ–∫–∏–º —Å—Ç–µ–∫–æ–º —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–π;
    • —É—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã: –ø–æ–ª–Ω–∞—è —É–¥–∞–ª—ë–Ω–∫–∞ –∏–ª–∏ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ –≤ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–µ(—à–∞–≥–æ–≤–∞—è –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –æ—Ç –º. –ù–æ–≤–æ—Å–ª–æ–±–æ–¥—Å–∫–∞—è); –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã 5/2; –æ—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø–æ –¢–ö –†–§; –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é –±–µ–ª–∞—è –∫–æ–Ω–∫—É—Ä–µ–Ω—Ç–Ω–∞—è –∑–∞—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–Ω–∞—è –ø–ª–∞—Ç–∞;
    • –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ: –Ω–∞—Å—Ç–∞–≤–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ, –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–µ–µ –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –≤ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–µ –∏–ª–∏ –≤–Ω–µ—à–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∏, –∫—É—Ä—Å—ã;
    • –∑–¥–æ—Ä–æ–≤—å–µ: –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Ö–æ–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏—Å–ø—ã—Ç–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å—Ä–æ–∫–∞ - –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø –∫ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–µ –î–ú–°.


  451. Middle DevOps Engineer ("–ò–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–Ω–µ—Ç-–∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è PS", –ê–ª–º–∞—Ç—ã) map[currency:KZT from:600000 gross:false to:1e+06] [ 2022-05-11 ]
    ...æ–Ω—ã –¥–ª—è –∏–≥—Ä –∏ –æ—Ç–¥—ã—Ö–∞; –ª–∏–±–æ ‚Äî —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –ø–æ —Å–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–º—É –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–...

    –û–±—è–∑–∞–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏:

    –†–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ –≤ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–µ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∏ —Å–∞–π—Ç–æ–≤ –∏ –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤. –ù–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º–æ –ø–æ–º–æ–≥–∞—Ç—å –∑–∞–∫–∞–∑—á–∏–∫–∞–º:

    • –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—É –∏–ª–∏ —É–ª—É—á—à–∞—Ç—å —Å—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤—É—é—â—É—é, –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—é—â–∏–µ —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è

    • —Ä–∞–∑–≤–æ—Ä–∞—á–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å—Ç–µ–∫ –≤–∏—Ä—Ç—É–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –º–∞—à–∏–Ω –∏ –Ω—É–∂–Ω—ã–π —Å–æ—Ñ—Ç –¥–ª—è –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–µ–≥–æ –¥–µ–ø–ª–æ—è –∫–æ–¥–∞

    • –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥, –ª–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏ –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ SSL-—Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤

    • –≤–Ω–µ–¥—Ä—è—Ç—å CI/CD –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å—ã, –∞ —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –ø–æ–ø—É–ª—è—Ä–Ω—ã–µ devops-—Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–∏ (Kubernetes/docker, gitlab/jenkins, prometheus/grafana, ELK –∏–ª–∏ –∞–Ω–∞–ª–æ–≥–∏, acmedns)

    –û—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—ã–µ —Ç—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è:

    • –¢–≤–µ—Ä–¥–æ–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏ –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –ø—Ä–æ–¥–∞–∫—à–Ω-–∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–∞–º–∏ Kubernetes –Ω–µ–±–æ–ª—å—à–∏—Ö —Ä–∞–∑–º–µ—Ä–æ–≤. –£–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–æ–∂–∏—Ç—å –∏ –∞—Ä–≥—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –∫–∞–∫ –ª—É—á—à–µ.

    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏ –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å gitlab –∏–ª–∏ –∞–Ω–∞–ª–æ–≥–∞–º–∏. –£–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å—Ç—Ä–æ–∏—Ç—å –ø–∞–π–ø–ª–∞–π–Ω—ã –∏ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏—Ö –≤ –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—É.

    –ñ–µ–ª–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ —É–º–µ—Ç—å:

    • bash –∏ python –¥–ª—è –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ —Ä—É—Ç–∏–Ω—ã
    • ansible –∏ terraform –¥–ª—è —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä–æ–π
    –£—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è:

    –ù–∞—à–∏ —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–∏ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—é—Ç –≤ –±–æ–ª—å—à–æ–º —Å–≤–µ—Ç–ª–æ–º –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–µ, –≥–¥–µ –µ—Å—Ç—å –º–µ—Å—Ç–æ –ø–æ –¥—É—à–µ –∫–∞–∂–¥–æ–º—É: –æ–ø–µ–Ω—Å–ø–µ–π—Å—ã, —Ç–µ–ø–ª—ã–µ –ª–∞–º–ø–æ–≤—ã–µ –∫–∞–±–∏–Ω–µ—Ç—ã, –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é –æ–±–æ—Ä—É–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–∏–µ –º–µ—Å—Ç–∞, –∑–æ–Ω—ã –¥–ª—è –∏–≥—Ä –∏ –æ—Ç–¥—ã—Ö–∞; –ª–∏–±–æ ‚Äî —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –ø–æ —Å–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–º—É –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫—É.

    –ú—ã –¥–∞–µ–º —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–º —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏—Å—Ç–∞–º –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –±–µ—Å–ø–ª–∞—Ç–Ω–æ –ø—Ä–æ–π—Ç–∏ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏—é RedHat, CKA, CKSS. –£ –Ω–∞—Å –≤ —à—Ç–∞—Ç–µ —É–∂–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—é—Ç –Ω–µ—Å–∫–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –¥–µ—Å—è—Ç–∫–æ–≤ redhat-–∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–æ–≤ –∏–ª–∏ –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–æ–≤, –∏ –Ω–µ—Å–∫–æ–ª—å–∫–æ CKA/CKSS —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤.


  452. –ò–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä DevOps/DevOps Engineer (—É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ) ("RedLab", –ò–Ω–Ω–æ–ø–æ–ª–∏—Å) [ 2022-05-11 ]
    ...û–ø—ã—Ç –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è —Å—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–≤ —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–∞, —Ç–∞–∫–∏—Ö –∫–∞–∫ VPN –∏ ...

    REDLAB - –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω–µ—Ä –≤ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –∏ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–∏ –ò–¢-–ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤ (–∞—É—Ç—Å—Ç–∞—Ñ—Ñ + –∞—É—Ç—Å–æ—Ä—Å). –ú—ã –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ–º —Å–≤–æ–∏–º –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º –ø–æ–ª–Ω—ã–π —Ü–∏–∫–ª —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ –ü–û: –æ—Ç –∞—É–¥–∏—Ç–∞ –∏ —Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç–µ–≥–∏–∏ –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–∞ –¥–æ —Å–æ–ø—Ä–æ–≤–æ–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏ –¥–∞–ª—å–Ω–µ–π—à–µ–≥–æ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏—è –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–∞.

    –ú—ã —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏–∑–∏—Ä—É–µ–º—Å—è –Ω–∞ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–∏ —Ü–∏—Ñ—Ä–æ–≤—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤ –¥–ª—è –í2–í –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ –∏ —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∏—Ä—É–µ–º –≤—ã–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏.

    –°—Ä–µ–¥–∏ –Ω–∞—à–∏—Ö –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤:

    • –∫—Ä—É–ø–Ω–µ–π—à–∏–µ —Ä–æ—Å—Å–∏–π—Å–∫–∏–µ –ò–¢ –≥–∏–≥–∞–Ω—Ç—ã, –≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–µ —Å –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–º–∏ –º—ã —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑—É–µ–º –º–∞—Å—à—Ç–∞–±–Ω—ã–µ —Ñ–µ–¥–µ—Ä–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç—ã - IBS, –î–∏–∞—Å–æ—Ñ—Ç, –û–¢–†, –õ–ê–ù–ò–¢, –ê–π—Ç–µ–∫–æ, –ù–æ—Ä–±–∏—Ç, –ë–§–¢, Cinimex, –ö–æ–º–µ—Ç—Ä–∏–∫–∞, –ù–µ–æ—Ñ–ª–µ–∫—Å, –ü–∞—Ä–º–∞, –¢–µ—Ö–Ω–æ—Å–µ—Ä–≤, –¢–∏–º–§–æ—Ä—Å,

    • –º—ã –ø—Ä–∏–Ω–∏–º–∞–µ–º —É—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏–µ –≤ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–µ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤ –¥–ª—è –≤–µ–¥—É—â–∏—Ö —Ä–æ—Å—Å–∏–π—Å–∫–∏—Ö –±–∞–Ω–∫–æ–≤ —Å–∞–º—ã—Ö —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã—Ö —Ü–≤–µ—Ç–æ–≤,

    • –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–º –º—ã –ø–æ–º–æ–≥–∞–µ–º –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏—Ö –±–∏–∑–Ω–µ—Å –∏ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–≤–∞—Ç—å –Ω–æ–≤—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç—ã: –£–ë–†–∏–†, –í–°–ö, SKB Lab, Cleverence, U_C_S, DevExperts, –ï–≤—Ä–æ—Ö–∏–º, KonnektU, BPC, BrandMonitor, InvoiceBox, –°–±–µ—Ä–ó–≤—É–∫.

    –ú—ã –ø—Ä–∏–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–≤–∞–µ–º—Å—è –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤–æ–≥–æ –≤–∏–¥–µ–Ω–∏—è: –≤ —Ç–µ—Å–Ω–æ–º –≤–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏–∏ —Å –∑–∞–∫–∞–∑—á–∏–∫–æ–º –∏—â–µ–º –ª—É—á—à–∏–µ –∏–¥–µ–∏ –¥–ª—è —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è –µ–≥–æ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á –∏ –Ω–∞—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º –æ–ø—Ç–∏–º–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –≤–∞—Ä–∏–∞–Ω—Ç—ã –∏—Ö —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏.

    –í —Å–≤—è–∑–∏ —Å —Ä–∞—Å—à–∏—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º —à—Ç–∞—Ç–∞ –Ω–∞—à–∞ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞ –∏—â–µ—Ç DevOps –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞.

    –°—Ç–∞–Ω—å—Ç–µ —á–∞—Å—Ç—å—é –Ω–∞—à–µ–π –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏, –≥–¥–µ —Ü–µ–Ω–∏—Ç—Å—è –º–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏—Å—Ç–∞ –∏ –≥–¥–µ —Ö–æ—Ä–æ—à–æ –æ–ø–ª–∞—á–∏–≤–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç–∏—Ç—å –Ω–∞ –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –≤—ã–∑–æ–≤—ã.

    –ú—ã –ø–æ—Ä—É—á–∏–º:

    • –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫—É —Å—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤—É—é—â–µ–π –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã, –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –µ–µ –∫–æ—Ä—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è.

    • –†–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ —Å—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤—É—é—â–µ–π –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã.

    • –†–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫—É –Ω–æ–≤–æ–π –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã.

    • –û–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–µ–ø—Ä–µ—Ä—ã–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Ü–µ–ø–æ—á–µ–∫ CI/CD (—Å–±–æ—Ä–∫–∞ –∏ –¥–µ–ø–ª–æ–π –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π).

    • –û–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–æ–π –±–µ–∑–æ–ø–∞—Å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã.

    –î–ª—è –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è –∑–∞–¥–∞—á –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º—ã:

    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å—Ç–µ–∫–∞ TCP/IP.

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è Linux-—Å–µ—Ä–≤–µ—Ä–æ–≤ (Debian –∏–ª–∏ Ubuntu) –∏ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ —Å–ª—É–∂–± Linux (systemd).

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –Ω–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏—è Dockerfile, —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è –æ–±—Ä–∞–∑–æ–≤ –∏ –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–∞ Docker-–∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–π–Ω–µ—Ä–æ–≤, –∞ —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –æ—Å–æ–±–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–µ–π –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π –≤ Docker-–∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–π–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ö.

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Ansible –∏ Terraform.

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –≤ git.

    • –£–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø–∏—Å–∞—Ç—å bash-—Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç—ã.

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è —Å—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–≤ —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–∞, —Ç–∞–∫–∏—Ö –∫–∞–∫ VPN –∏ SSH.

    • –ü—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π –æ–ø—ã—Ç —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∏, –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ –∏ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –°–£–ë–î, —Ç–∞–∫–∏—Ö –∫–∞–∫ PostgreSQL, MySQL –∏ MongoDB.

    • –£–º–µ–Ω–∏—è —É–≤–µ—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –æ–¥–Ω–∏–º –∏–∑ –ø—Ä–æ–¥–≤–∏–Ω—É—Ç—ã—Ö –∫–æ–Ω—Å–æ–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö —Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç–æ–≤—ã—Ö —Ä–µ–¥–∞–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–≤ vim/emacs –∏ –æ–¥–Ω–∏–º –∏–∑ –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏—Ö VSCode/Atom

    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–æ–≤ –º–∞—Å—à—Ç–∞–±–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π.

    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω–∏—è –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã –æ—Ç–∫–∞–∑–æ—É—Å—Ç–æ–π—á–∏–≤–æ–≥–æ/–≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–æ–Ω–∞–≥—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è, –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è —Ä–µ—Å—É—Ä—Å–æ–≤, –±–∞–ª–∞–Ω—Å–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∫–∞ –Ω–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏.

    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—ã—Ö –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥–æ–≤ –∫ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–µ –∏ —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—é –ü–û.

    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–æ–≤ –ø–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω–∏—è CI/CD.

    –ë—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–ª—é—Å–æ–º:

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –±—Ä–æ–∫–µ—Ä–æ–≤ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π, —Ç–∞–∫–∏—Ö –∫–∞–∫ Kafka –∏ RabbitMQ.
    • –£–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —Å Kubernetes, –∫–∞–∫ –º–∏–Ω–∏–º—É–º —É–≤–µ—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –ø–∏—Å–∞—Ç—å –º–∞–Ω–∏—Ñ–µ—Å—Ç—ã; –ø—Ä–∏–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤—É–µ—Ç—Å—è —É–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–∞–≤–ª–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å, –æ–±—Å–ª—É–∂–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å, –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª—è—Ç—å –∏ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å.
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Å–±–æ—Ä–∫–∏ Java –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π —Å –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ–º Maven –∏–ª–∏ Gradle, JavaScript –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π —Å –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ npm –∏–ª–∏ yarn.

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∏, –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ –∏ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è EKF-—Å—Ç–µ–∫–∞ –∏ Prometheus —Å Grafana

    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ Python.

    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ Semantic Versioning 2.0.0.

    • –ó–Ω–∞–∫–æ–º—Å—Ç–≤–æ —Å Jenkins –∏–ª–∏ –∞–Ω–∞–ª–æ–≥–∞–º–∏.

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –æ–±–ª–∞—á–Ω—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–≤–∞–π–¥–µ—Ä–æ–≤ (AWS, Google Cloud, DigitalOcean).

    –ú—ã –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ–º:

    • –£–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—É—é —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—É.

    • –û—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø–æ –¢–ö –†–§ (full time).

    • –ò–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–Ω—ã–µ –∏ —É–Ω–∏–∫–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç—ã - —Ñ–∏–Ω–∞–Ω—Å–æ–≤–æ–π –∏ –ø—Ä–æ–º—ã—à–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π —Å—Ñ–µ—Ä–∞—Ö.

    • –°–ø—Ä–∞–≤–µ–¥–ª–∏–≤–æ–µ –≤–æ–∑–Ω–∞–≥—Ä–∞–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ –≤ —Å–æ–æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–∏–∏ —Å–æ –≤–∫–ª–∞–¥–æ–º –≤ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏.

    • –°–≤–æ–±–æ–¥—É –ª–æ–∫–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∏ –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å.

    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏—è –¥–æ —Ä—É–∫–æ–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª—è –≥—Ä—É–ø–ø—ã –∏–ª–∏ –≤ —Å—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–Ω—É —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ —ç–∫—Å–ø–µ—Ä—Ç–∞.

    • –ö–æ–º—Ñ–æ—Ä—Ç–Ω—É—é —Ä–∞–±–æ—á—É—é –∞—Ç–º–æ—Å—Ñ–µ—Ä—É.


  453. DevOps-–∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä (—Ç—Ä–∞–π–± Digital) ("–û–¢–ü –ë–∞–Ω–∫, –ê–û (OTP bank)", –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞) [ 2022-05-10 ]
    ...∫–æ–≤—Å–∫–∞—è); –ì–æ—Ç–æ–≤—ã –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–æ–∂–∏—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞. ...

    –ö–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞: DBO Core & Security

    –í –Ω–∞—à—É agile-–∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—É —Ç—Ä–µ–±—É–µ—Ç—Å—è DevOps –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä —á—Ç–æ–±—ã –¥–µ–ª–∞—Ç—å –≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–µ —Å –Ω–∞–º–∏ –∫—Ä—É—Ç—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç—ã.

    –¶–µ–ª–µ–≤–æ–π —Å—Ç–µ–∫ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–∞:
    - Docker;
    - kubernetes;
    - helm;
    - Nginx;
    - Java;
    - Prometheus + Grafana;
    - Kibana + Elasticsearch

    –ß–µ–º –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–æ–∏—Ç –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ç—å—Å—è:
    - –†–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ –¥–ª—è –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ —Ä—É—Ç–∏–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –∑–∞–¥–∞—á –∏ —É—Å–∫–æ—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–µ release lifecycle;
    - –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ –∏ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º CI/CD (Teamcity);
    - –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ –∏ —É–ª—É—á—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–æ–≤–æ–≥–æ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è, —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–æ–≤—ã—Ö —Å—Ç–µ–Ω–¥–æ–≤;
    - –°–æ–ø—Ä–æ–≤–æ–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ Dev –∏ QA –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã, –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥, –ø–æ–∏—Å–∫ —É–∑–∫–∏—Ö –º–µ—Å—Ç;
    - –í–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏–µ —Å–æ —Å–º–µ–∂–Ω—ã–º–∏ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞–º–∏ –∏ –ø–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω–∏–µ –æ—Ç–∫–∞–∑–æ—É—Å—Ç–æ–π—á–∏–≤–æ–≥–æ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è –±–∞–Ω–∫–∞

    –ß—Ç–æ –º—ã –∂–¥—ë–º –æ—Ç —Ç–µ–±—è:
    - –û—Ç–ª–∏—á–Ω—ã–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è Linux-—Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º;
    - –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–µ–±-—Å—Ç–µ–∫–∞ (HTTP/TCP/IP);
    - –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–æ–≤ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –°–£–ë–î;
    - –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å docker, kubernates;
    - –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏ –æ–ø—ã—Ç –≤–Ω–µ–¥—Ä–µ–Ω–∏—è Prometheus/Grafana/Zabbix;
    - –ü—Ä–æ–º—ã—à–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–∑–≤–æ—Ä–∞—á–∏–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ RabbitMQ/Kafka

    –ß—Ç–æ –º—ã –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ–º:

    • –†–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å–≤–æ–µ–≥–æ –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ –ø–æ—Ç–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∞ –≤ –∫—Ä—É–ø–Ω–æ–º —Å–æ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–º –ë–∞–Ω–∫–µ;
    • –ü—Ä–∏–≤–ª–µ–∫–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ —Ñ–∏–Ω–∞–Ω—Å–æ–≤—ã–µ —É—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è;
    • –î–æ–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–Ω—ã–µ –±–µ–Ω–µ—Ñ–∏—Ç—ã - –î–ú–°, –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω–µ—Ä—Å–∫–∏–µ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º—ã –ª–æ—è–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏, –ø–æ–≤—ã—à–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π cashback;
    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞—Å—Ç–∏ –∏ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å—Å—è - –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–µ–µ –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ, –≤–Ω–µ—à–Ω–∏–µ —Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–Ω–≥–∏ –∏ –º–∏—Ç–∞–ø—ã;
    • –ì–∏–±–∫–æ–µ –Ω–∞—á–∞–ª–æ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–µ–≥–æ –¥–Ω—è;
    • –ù–æ–≤—ã–π —Å–æ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π –æ—Ñ–∏—Å (–º.–í–æ–π–∫–æ–≤—Å–∫–∞—è);
    • –ì–æ—Ç–æ–≤—ã –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–æ–∂–∏—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞.


  454. DevOps Engineer ("–ê–ô–¢–ò.–°–ü–ï–ô–°", –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞) map[currency:USD from:4800 gross:false to:6400] [ 2022-05-10 ]
    ...–∞;- –º–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–Ω—ã—Ö –∑–∞–¥–∞—á;- —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π –≤–∞—Ä–∏–∞–Ω—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã, –≥–∏–±–∫–æ–µ –...

    –ü—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç:–ò–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä–∞ –¥–ª—è –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∏ —Ä–æ–±–æ—Ç–∏–∑–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Ç—Ä–∞–Ω—Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç–Ω—ã—Ö —Å—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–≤ –¥–ª—è –¥–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–∫–∏ –≥—Ä—É–∑–æ–≤
    –†–∞—Å–ø–æ–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ –≤ –µ–≤—Ä–æ–ø–µ–π—Å–∫–æ–º —Ä–µ–≥–∏–æ–Ω–µ. –†–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ –Ω–æ–≤—ã—Ö —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–π, –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ –¥–µ—è—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤—É—é—â–µ–π –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã.
    –ù–∞–¥ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–æ–º —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ—Ç –Ω–µ—Å–∫–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥: –∏–∑ –ë–µ–ª–∞—Ä—É—Å–∏, –ü–æ–ª—å—à–∏, –ß–∏–ª–∏, –°–®–ê-–∑–∞–ø–∞–¥.

    –ó–∞–¥–∞—á–∏:–†–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ –Ω–æ–≤—ã—Ö —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–π, –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ –¥–µ—è—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤—É—é—â–µ–π –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã.

    –¢—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –æ–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ:–¢–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–∏ ‚Äî AWS, Kubernetes, Helm, AWS CDK (TypeScript), Postgres, Redis, MongoDB, CloudFront

    –û–∂–∏–¥–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è, —á—Ç–æ —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–∏ –±—É–¥—É—Ç –µ–∂–µ–¥–Ω–µ–≤–Ω–æ –æ—Ç—á–∏—Ç—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –ø–æ —Å–æ–æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤—É—é—â–∏–º –∫–∞–Ω–∞–ª–∞–º Slack, –ø–ª–∞–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –æ—Å—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç—Å—è –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–º –≤ Jira. –¢–∞–∫–∂–µ –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç –æ–∂–∏–¥–∞–µ—Ç –¥–≤–∞ –µ–∂–µ–Ω–µ–¥–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö —Å—Ç–µ–Ω–¥–∞–ø–∞ –≤ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–µ–µ –≤—Ä–µ–º—è —á–∞—Å–æ–≤–æ–≥–æ –ø–æ—è—Å–∞ PST (—ç—Ç–æ + 11—á –∫ –º—Å–∫).]

    –£—Ä–æ–≤–µ–Ω—å –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ B2+

    –£—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã:

    –ì–ª–∞–≤–Ω–∞—è —Ü–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –Ω–∞—à–µ–π –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏ - —ç—Ç–æ –ª—é–¥–∏, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –≤ –Ω–µ–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—é—Ç. –ò –º—ã —Å—Ç–∞—Ä–∞–µ–º—Å—è —Å–¥–µ–ª–∞—Ç—å –≤—Å–µ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ–µ, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ –±—ã–ª–æ –º–∞–∫—Å–∏–º–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ –∫–æ–º—Ñ–æ—Ä—Ç–Ω—ã–º.
    –°–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–∞–º –º—ã –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ–º:
    - –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ, –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∑–∞ —Å—á–µ—Ç –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏;
    - –ø–µ—Ä—Å–ø–µ–∫—Ç–∏–≤—ã –∫–∞—Ä—å–µ—Ä–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ä–æ—Å—Ç–∞;
    - –º–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–Ω—ã—Ö –∑–∞–¥–∞—á;
    - —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π –≤–∞—Ä–∏–∞–Ω—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã, –≥–∏–±–∫–æ–µ –Ω–∞—á–∞–ª–æ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–µ–≥–æ –¥–Ω—è;
    - –∑–∞—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–Ω–∞—è –ø–ª–∞—Ç–∞ 300- 350—Ç.—Ä(–∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏—Ç –æ—Ç —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω—è —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏—Å—Ç–∞);
    - —Å—Ç–∞–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å, –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è —É—Å—Ç–æ–π—á–∏–≤–∞ –∫–æ –≤—Å–µ–º –∏–∑–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è–º –Ω–∞ —Ä—ã–Ω–∫–µ;
    - –æ—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –ò–ü;
    - –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤–∞—è –ø—Ä–µ–º–∏—è –¥–æ 100% –æ—Ç –µ–∂–µ–º–µ—Å—è—á–Ω–æ–≥–æ –æ–∫–ª–∞–¥–∞ –ø–æ —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç–∞–º —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã;
    - –¥–ª–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç, –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ–µ –ø–æ–≥—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ –≤ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤—É—é —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫—É.


  455. DevOps Engineer ("–í–∞–π–∑–æ—Ä –ì–µ–π–º–∑", –ú–∏–Ω—Å–∫) [ 2022-05-10 ]
    ...–∞—Ñ–∏–∫, –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –∏–ª–∏ –≤ –æ–¥–Ω–æ–º –∏–∑ –Ω–∞—à–∏—Ö —Å—Ç–∏–ª...

    –ö–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è Vizor Games –ø—Ä–∏–≥–ª–∞—à–∞–µ—Ç –æ–ø—ã—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞/DevOps –≤ –Ω–æ–≤—ã–π –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç, –≤ –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–º –º—ã –±—É–¥–µ–º –≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–µ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—É –Ω–æ–≤–æ–π –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ–π –∏–≥—Ä—ã.

    –ú—ã –¥–µ–ª–∞–µ–º –∫—Ä—É—Ç–æ–π –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç –Ω–∞ Unity. –ù–∞—à–∞ –∏–≥—Ä–∞ –ø—Ä–æ —Å—É—Ä–æ–≤—ã—Ö –≤–æ–∏–Ω–æ–≤ —Å—Ä–∞–∂–∞—é—â–∏—Ö—Å—è –≤ –Ω–µ–¥—Ä—É–∂–µ–ª—é–±–Ω–æ–º –º–∏—Ä–µ –≤ —Å–µ—Ç—Ç–∏–Ω–≥–µ –º—Ä–∞—á–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ñ–µ–Ω—Ç–µ–∑–∏. –≠—Ç–æ –±–æ–ª—å—à–æ–π –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç –¥–ª—è –≥–ª–æ–±–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ä—ã–Ω–∫–∞ –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π –º—ã –±—É–¥–µ–º –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–∞—Ç—å –∏ –æ–ø–µ—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å–∞–º–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ. –ï—Å–ª–∏ –≤—ã –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤—ã –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—è—Ç—å –≤—ã–∑–æ–≤ –∏ –ø—Ä–∏—Å–æ–µ–¥–∏–Ω–∏—Ç—å—Å—è –∫ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–µ —Å–ª–æ–∂–Ω–æ–π —Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã —Å–µ—Ä–≤–µ—Ä–æ–≤ –∏ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤ ‚Äì –≤—ã –Ω–∞—à —á–µ–ª–æ–≤–µ–∫!

    –° –Ω–∞—Å –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–Ω—ã–µ –∏ –Ω–µ—Ç—Ä–∏–≤–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏, —Å–æ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–∏, –∫—Ä—É—Ç–æ–π –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç, –ø–µ—Ä–≤–æ–∫–ª–∞—Å—Å–Ω–∞—è –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞, –æ—Ç–ª–∏—á–Ω—ã–µ —É—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è –∏ –Ω–µ–ø—Ä–µ—Ä—ã–≤–Ω–æ–µ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ.

    –û—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—ã–µ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏:

    • –ê–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–æ–≤ Kubernetes (on-premise, EKS)
    • –ê–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–æ–≤ –¥–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–∫–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ –∏–≥—Ä—ã –í–Ω–µ–¥—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏ —Å–æ–ø—Ä–æ–≤–æ–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–Ω—ã—Ö –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ –∏ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤
    • –ù–∞–ª–∞–∂–∏–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–æ–≤ –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞ –∏ –∞–ª–µ—Ä—Ç–∏–Ω–≥–∞

    –¢—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è:

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è Kubernetes
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è Linux —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º (–≤ —Ç–æ–º —á–∏—Å–ª–µ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å—é Ansible)
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å docker, docker swarm
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–æ–≤—ã–º–∏ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–∞–º–∏: prometheus, grafana, loki
    • –£–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø–∏—Å–∞—Ç—å —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç—ã –Ω–∞ Python –£–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —Å git

    –ü–ª—é—Å–æ–º –±—É–¥–µ—Ç:

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –Ω–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏—è –ø–∞–π–ø–ª–∞–π–Ω–æ–≤ Gitlab CI
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –±–∞–∑ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö (Cassandra, Postgresql, Clickhouse)
    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å–µ—Ç–µ–≤–æ–≥–æ —Å—Ç–µ–∫–∞ Linux

    –ü–æ—á–µ–º—É —É –Ω–∞—Å –ø—Ä–∏—è—Ç–Ω–æ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å:

    • –ú—ã –≤–¥–æ—Ö–Ω–æ–≤–ª—è–µ–º—Å—è –¥—Ä—É–≥ –¥—Ä—É–≥–æ–º! –î–µ–ª–∏–º—Å—è –æ–ø—ã—Ç–æ–º, –æ–±–º–µ–Ω–∏–≤–∞–µ–º—Å—è –∫—Ä—É—Ç—ã–º–∏ –∏–¥–µ—è–º–∏, –æ–±—Å—É–∂–¥–∞–µ–º –∏—Ö –∏ —Å—Ä–∞–∑—É –∂–µ –∏–¥–µ–º —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–æ–≤—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å. –ò —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç—ã –ø—Ä–µ–≤–æ—Å—Ö–æ–¥—è—Ç –≤—Å–µ –Ω–∞—à–∏ –æ–∂–∏–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è.

    • –ù–∞—à –¥–µ–ø–∞—Ä—Ç–∞–º–µ–Ω—Ç –∑–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —É—Å–∏–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ—Ç, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã —Å–ª–æ–≤–æ ¬´–∑–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞¬ª –∑–≤—É—á–∞–ª–æ –≤ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏ —á–∞—â–µ, —á–µ–º –≤—ã —É—Å–ø–µ–µ—Ç–µ –æ –Ω–µ–π –ø–æ–¥—É–º–∞—Ç—å. –í —Å—Ç–∞—Ä—Ç–æ–≤—ã–π –Ω–∞–±–æ—Ä –≤—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç –º–µ–¥–∏—Ü–∏–Ω—Å–∫–æ–µ —Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ö–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ, –∫–æ–º–ø–µ–Ω—Å–∞—Ü–∏—è –±–æ–ª—å–Ω–∏—á–Ω–æ–≥–æ, –æ—Ç–ø—É—Å–∫, 4 Sick days –≤ –≥–æ–¥, –∫–æ–º–ø–µ–Ω—Å–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç–∞. –ê —Å –ø—Ä–æ—à–ª–æ–≥–æ –≥–æ–¥–∞ –º—ã –¥–æ–±–∞–≤–∏–ª–∏ –∏ –ø—Å–∏—Ö–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—á–µ—Å–∫—É—é –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫—É –¥–ª—è —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤.

    • ‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã–í Vizor –º—ã –∑–Ω–∞–µ–º –≤—Å–µ –æ –∫–æ–º—Ñ–æ—Ä—Ç–Ω—ã—Ö —É—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è—Ö —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã: –∫–æ–Ω–∫—É—Ä–µ–Ω—Ç–Ω–∞—è –∑–∞—Ä–ø–ª–∞—Ç–∞, –≥–∏–±–∫–∏–π –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫, –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –∏–ª–∏ –≤ –æ–¥–Ω–æ–º –∏–∑ –Ω–∞—à–∏—Ö —Å—Ç–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–æ–≤ (–ú–∏–Ω—Å–∫, –ö–∏–µ–≤, –í–∏–ª—å–Ω—é—Å).

    • –û –Ω–∞—à–∏—Ö –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–∞—Ö —Ö–æ–¥—è—Ç –ª–µ–≥–µ–Ω–¥—ã, –ø—Ä–æ –Ω–∞—Å –ø–∏—Å–∞–ª–∏ –¥–∞–∂–µ –Ω–∞ —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—Ü–∞—Ö –∏–∑–≤–µ—Å—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä–Ω–æ–≥–æ –æ–Ω–ª–∞–π–Ω-–∏–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è Yatzer. –ù–∞–≤–µ—Ä–Ω–æ–µ, —É–ø–æ–º–∏–Ω–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–æ–±–Ω–æ–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–µ–µ –º–µ—Å—Ç–æ –∏ —Å–æ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—É—é —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏–∫—É –Ω–µ —Å—Ç–æ–∏—Ç. –ü–æ—ç—Ç–æ–º—É –º—ã –ª–∏—à—å –Ω–∞–º–µ–∫–Ω–µ–º, —á—Ç–æ —É –Ω–∞—Å –µ—Å—Ç—å focus room, –≥–¥–µ –º–æ–∂–Ω–æ –≤–∑–¥—Ä–µ–º–Ω—É—Ç—å –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ –≤–∫—É—Å–Ω–æ–≥–æ –æ–±–µ–¥–∞ (–∞ —ç—Ç–æ –µ—â–µ –æ–¥–∏–Ω –±–æ–Ω—É—Å –æ—Ç –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏). –ò —á–∞–π–Ω—ã–π —É–≥–æ–ª–æ–∫ –≤ –∑–∏–º–Ω–µ–º —Å–∞–¥—É. –ò –∏–≥—Ä–æ–≤–∞—è —Å –æ–≥—Ä–æ–º–Ω–æ–π –ø–ª–∞–∑–º–æ–π –∏ –ø—Ä–∏—Å—Ç–∞–≤–∫–æ–π. –ö–∞–∂–¥—ã–π –Ω–∞—à –æ—Ñ–∏—Å –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–º–∞–Ω –¥–æ –º–µ–ª–æ—á–µ–π, –≥–¥–µ –¥–∏–∑–∞–π–Ω–µ—Ä—Å–∫–∞—è –º—ã—Å–ª—å —É–º–µ–ª–æ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–ø–ª–µ—Ç–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è —Å –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ–π –∫—É–ª—å—Ç—É—Ä–æ–π.

    • –î–ª—è –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏—è –µ—Å—Ç—å –≤—Å–µ –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º–æ–µ: –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–∏–µ –∫—É—Ä—Å—ã –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ —è–∑—ã–∫–∞ –∏ —Ä–∏—Å—É–Ω–∫–∞, –ø–æ—Å–µ—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–π, –∫—É—Ä—Å–æ–≤, –≤–æ—Ä–∫—à–æ–ø–æ–≤ –∏ –º–Ω–æ–≥–æ–µ –¥—Ä—É–≥–æ–µ. –ì–ª–∞–≤–Ω–æ–µ - –≤–∞—à–µ –∂–µ–ª–∞–Ω–∏–µ, –∞ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Ä–æ—Å—Ç–∞ —É –Ω–∞—Å –≤—Å–µ–≥–¥–∞ –Ω–∞–π–¥—É—Ç—Å—è.

    • –ö–æ–Ω–µ—á–Ω–æ –∂–µ, —ç—Ç–æ –Ω–µ –≤—Å–µ. –ú—ã –≤—Å–µ–≥–¥–∞ —è—Ä–∫–æ –ø—Ä–∞–∑–¥–Ω—É–µ–º –¥–Ω–∏ —Ä–æ–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏, –Ω–æ–≤–æ–≥–æ–¥–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∞–∑–¥–Ω–∏–∫–∏, —Ç–∏–º–±–∏–ª–¥–∏–Ω–≥–∏, —Ä–µ–ª–∏–∑—ã –∏ –¥–Ω–∏ —Ä–æ–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏—è –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–æ–≤. –ì–æ—Ç–æ–≤–∏–º —Ä–∞–∑–≤–ª–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏ –ø–æ–¥–∞—Ä–∫–∏, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–∏ –ø–æ–º–Ω—è—Ç –≥–æ–¥–∞–º–∏.

    • –í –∫–æ–ø–∏–ª–∫–µ –ø—Ä–∏—è—Ç–Ω—ã—Ö –±–æ–Ω—É—Å–æ–≤ —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –ø—Ä–µ–º–∏–∏ –∑–∞ —Ä–µ–∫–æ–º–µ–Ω–¥–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –±—É–¥—É—â–∏—Ö –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–≥, –∫–æ –¥–Ω—é —Ä–æ–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏ –≤–∞–∂–Ω—ã–º —Å–æ–±—ã—Ç–∏—è–º –≤–∞—à–µ–π –∂–∏–∑–Ω–∏, –ø—Ä–µ–º–∏–∏ –∫–æ –¥–Ω—é —Ä–æ–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –∏ –ù–æ–≤–æ–º—É –≥–æ–¥—É –∏ –º–Ω–æ–≥–æ–µ –¥—Ä—É–≥–æ–µ.


  456. DevOps Engineer ("–ü–°–¢ –õ–∞–±—Å", –ú–∏–Ω—Å–∫) [ 2022-05-10 ]
    ...–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä–µ –ú–∏–Ω—Å–∫–∞ –∏ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã, –ø—Ä–∏ –∂–µ–ª–∞–Ω–∏–∏; –º–æ...

    –ì—Ä—É–ø–ø–∞ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–π RND Point / PST Labs - —ç—Ç–æ 120+ —á–µ–ª–æ–≤–µ–∫ –≤ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–∞—Ö –ú–∏–Ω—Å–∫–∞, –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤—ã –∏ –õ–æ–Ω–¥–æ–Ω–∞. –ú—ã –Ω–µ –æ—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–∞–≤–ª–∏–≤–∞–µ–º—Å—è –Ω–∞ –¥–æ—Å—Ç–∏–≥–Ω—É—Ç–æ–º –∏ –ø—Ä–æ–¥–æ–ª–∂–∞–µ–º —Ä–∞—Å—à–∏—Ä—è—Ç—å—Å—è, –±–ª–∞–≥–æ–¥–∞—Ä—è –Ω–∞—à–∏–º —Å–æ–±—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–º –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–∞–º –∏ –∞—É—Ç—Å–æ—Ä—Å–Ω—ã–º –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∞–º –¥–ª—è –Ω–∞—à–∏—Ö –∑–∞–∫–∞–∑—á–∏–∫–æ–≤ (—Å—Ä–µ–¥–∏ –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã—Ö –º–æ–∂–Ω–æ –Ω–∞–π—Ç–∏ –∫–∞–∫ –¥–∏–Ω–∞–º–∏—á–Ω—ã–µ —Å—Ç–∞—Ä—Ç–∞–ø—ã, —Ç–∞–∫ –∏ –∫—Ä—É–ø–Ω—ã–µ –º–µ–∂–¥—É–Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–Ω—ã–µ –±–∞–Ω–∫–∏).

    –ú—ã —è–≤–ª—è–µ–º—Å—è —Ä–µ–∑–∏–¥–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–º –±–µ–ª–æ—Ä—É—Å—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ –ü–∞—Ä–∫–∞ –≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–∏—Ö —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–π. –†–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ–º –Ω–∞ —Ä—ã–Ω–∫–∞—Ö –°–®–ê, –ï–≤—Ä–æ–ø—ã, –°–ù–ì. –ë–æ–ª—å—à–∏–Ω—Å—Ç–≤–æ –Ω–∞—à–∏—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–æ–≤ –æ—Ç–Ω–æ—Å—è—Ç—Å—è –∫ –±–∞–Ω–∫–æ–≤—Å–∫–æ–º—É –∏ —Ñ–∏–Ω–∞–Ω—Å–æ–≤–æ–º—É –¥–æ–º–µ–Ω–∞–º, –Ω–æ –µ—Å—Ç—å –∏ –Ω–µ–∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –∏—Å–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏—è.

    –°–µ–π—á–∞—Å –Ω–∞—à–∞ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤–∞—è –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞ –≤ –ø–æ–∏—Å–∫–∞—Ö DevOps –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞ :)

    –ß—Ç–æ –Ω—É–∂–Ω–æ –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –¥–µ–ª–∞—Ç—å:

    • –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫—É, —Å–±–æ—Ä–∫—É, —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏ –¥–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–∫—É –∫–æ–¥–∞ –Ω–∞ stage/prod;

    • –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å, –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç—ã –∂–∏–∑–Ω–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ü–∏–∫–ª–∞ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–æ–≤ (Docker-–æ–±—Ä–∞–∑—ã, CI/CD —Å—Ü–µ–Ω–∞—Ä–∏–∏, –±–∞–≥-—Ç—Ä–µ–∫–µ—Ä—ã, –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç—ã —Å–±–æ—Ä–∫–∏);

    • –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã —Ä–∞—Å–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞, –ª–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è, —Ç—Ä–∞—Åc–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∫–∏, —Ä–∞—Å–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –±–∞–∑ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö, —Ñ–∞–π–ª–æ–≤—ã—Ö —Ö—Ä–∞–Ω–∏–ª–∏—â, —à–∏–Ω —Å–æ–±—ã—Ç–∏–π;

    • –≤–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–∞–º–∏, —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤—â–∏–∫–∞–º–∏, –ø–æ–º–æ–≥–∞—Ç—å –≤ –æ—Ç–ª–∞–¥–∫–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤, –≤—ã—è–≤–ª—è—Ç—å –∏ —É—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω—è—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º—ã.

    –ß–µ–≥–æ –º—ã –∂–¥–µ–º –æ—Ç –≤–∞—Å:

    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç–∞ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã –Ω–∞ AWS;

    • —É–º–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å–ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å, –ø–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–∏—Ç—å, –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–æ–¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω—É—é –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—É (–Ω–∞ –±–∞–∑–µ Kubernetes);

    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç–∞ —ç–∫—Å–ø–ª—É–∞—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏ —Ä–∞—Å–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º –ª–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è, –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞, —Ç—Ä–∞—Å—Å–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∫–∏ (Fluentd, Prometheus, ElasticSearch, Kibana, Grafana, Zipkin, –∏ —Ç.–¥.);

    • –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–æ–≤ CI/CD;

    • —Ö–æ—Ä–æ—à–µ–≥–æ –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏—è –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–æ–≤ –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏, –≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–æ–π –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏, –æ—Ç–∫–∞–∑–æ—É—Å—Ç–æ–π—á–∏–≤–æ—Å—Ç–∏, –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ –≤–æ—Å—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è;

    • –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è, –∫–∞–∫ –Ω–∞–π—Ç–∏ –∏ —É—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º—É –Ω–∞ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ —Å–µ—Ç–∏, –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è, –û–°;

    • –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ —è–∑—ã–∫–∞ –Ω–∞ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ –æ—Ç Intermediate.

    –†–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—è —Å –Ω–∞–º–∏ –≤—ã –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∏—Ç–µ:

    • –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∫–∞—Ä—å–µ—Ä–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∏ –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ä–æ—Å—Ç–∞;

    • –ø–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–Ω–æ–µ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ –≤ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–µ —Å –æ–ø—ã—Ç–Ω—ã–º–∏ –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–≥–∞–º–∏;

    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å–æ —Å–≤–µ–∂–∏–º —Å—Ç–µ–∫–æ–º;

    • –æ—Ñ–∏—Å –≤ —Ü–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä–µ –ú–∏–Ω—Å–∫–∞ –∏ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã, –ø—Ä–∏ –∂–µ–ª–∞–Ω–∏–∏;

    • –º–æ–ª–æ–¥–æ–π –∏ –¥—Ä—É–∂–Ω—ã–π –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–∫—Ç–∏–≤;

    • –≥–∏–±–∫–∏–π –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã, —É—á–∏—Ç—ã–≤–∞—é—â–∏–π –∏–Ω–¥–∏–≤–∏–¥—É–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –±–∏–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–º—ã;

    • –æ—Ñ–∏—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ —Ç—Ä—É–¥–æ—É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤–æ —Å –ø–µ—Ä–≤–æ–≥–æ –¥–Ω—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã;

    • –∑–∞—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–Ω—É—é –ø–ª–∞—Ç—É, –≤ –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ–º —Ä–∞–∑–º–µ—Ä–µ –ø—Ä–∏–≤—è–∑–∞–Ω–Ω—É—é –∫ –∫—É—Ä—Å—É –¥–æ–ª–ª–∞—Ä–∞ –°–®–ê;

    • 100% –∫–æ–º–ø–µ–Ω—Å–∞—Ü–∏—é –ø—Ä–∏ –±–æ–ª–µ–∑–Ω–∏ –≤ —Ç–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –¥–≤—É—Ö –Ω–µ–¥–µ–ª—å –≤ –≥–æ–¥—É.


  457. Senior DevOps Engineer (GCP, k8s) ("Oxagile", –ë–∞–∫—É) [ 2022-05-10 ]
    ...ocation Flexible schedules and work environments: remote work, office facility, co-working space Relocatio...

    Here in Oxagile‚Äôs international team, we are enthusiastic about creating elegant solutions for the video domain, which are used across the world. We are a trusted partner to over 450 companies including global industry leaders like Panasonic, Broadcom, Orange, Discovery, Vodafone, Google, Kaltura, Thomson Reuters.

    For eight years straight, Oxagile has been featured on the Inc. 5000 list of the fastest-growing private companies in the U.S. This year, we have expanded our geographical presence to include locations in Ukraine, Latvia, and Poland.

    Mutual support, knowledge sharing, and continuous honing of skills are the cornerstones of our teamwork. We promote clean, well-tested, and maintainable code, value reliable architecture and advanced software engineering practices. If you want to focus on innovative technologies in OTT, RTC, AI / ML / CV and other domains, we‚Äôll provide highly experienced mentors, organize internal training, and offer tuition reimbursement for external programs and certifications. We invest in the efficiency and flexibility of our teams, monitor their motivation, and continuously work on improvements.

    Oxagile‚Äôs explosive growth and high quality of services have been proved by numerous international awards like Deloitte's Technology Fast 500‚Ñ¢, Top 100 Global Outsourcing, Inc. 5000, and Fortune 500.

    We are looking for a Principal DevOps Engineer to drive best practices in the DevOps aspects of the Flex Media Platform - a media content supply chain management platform used by top media brands around the world to manage the lifecycle of their media assets.

    You have solid experience working with a micro-services architectures utilizing Infrastructure as Code to support both internal engineering teams and production environments. You understand cloud computing platforms and are comfortable working across the stack to deliver secure and resilient solutions.

    The selected candidate will collaborate with other teams to help promote and mature the company‚Äôs DevOps culture and practices.

    ---

    We are looking for someone to join our Devops Platform team.
    The DevOps team is made up of engineers working cross-functionally to provide all of our product automations and CI/CD pipelines.
    You will be part of a small talented team that sits at the center of multiple software engineering teams to provide standardized tools and streamlined infrastructure deployments.
    We believe that giving our people a broad range of responsibilities results in the highest satisfaction for the engineers and a strong return on investment for the company. We want people who love the idea of working on tools and system testing in one week and fine tuning kubernetes internals the next.
    The ideal candidate embraces continuously evolving architecture and wants to play a role in designing how things are done here.
    You will be working with our team to help architect, build, and support a high volume / low latency platform that processes several terabytes of data each day. You will have the freedom to innovate and take your projects from test to production in a short time.

    Responsibilities:

    • Design, deploy and own streaming/data services such as Kafka, Kafka streams, Kafka connect, Schema registry, Aerospike, Spark
    • Work on improving Kafka applications, Spark monitoring using Prometheus and Grafana
    • Handle big data platforms deployed on both VMs and Kubernetes
    • Contribute to the design and implementation of new products and features, making sure they are all developed so they fit nicely in infrastructure
    • You will work alongside the development teams to provision, automate, and tune multiple environments across datacenter and cloud platforms

    Requirements:

    • At least 5 years experience as a DevOps
    • Experience in scripting (Python/GO/Bash).
    • Experience with docker and container orchestration platforms (kubernetes preferred).
    • Ability to leverage application and system metrics, log events, and wire data to analyze performance.
    • Mastery of one or more configuration management frameworks (ansible preferred).
    • Good communication skills, a great personality, and a love for working collaboratively.
    • Experience working with GCP (preferred) or other public cloud.
    • Experience in Declarative programming.


    In Return, We Provide:

    • Work at an international company that serves high-profile clients like Google, Amazon, Microsoft, Vodafone, etc.
    • Atmosphere of trust and empowerment across key projects and business processes
    • Best practices around process and team management
    • Competitive salary and payments in foreign currency ‚Äî no matter your location
    • Flexible schedules and work environments: remote work, office facility, co-working space
    • Relocation to Poland, Lithuania, Latvia, and other countries
    • Legal and accounting assistance, including for those who are self-employed
    • Medical coverage, paid vacation, sick and family leave, birthday off
    • Sports compensation, including training in corporate football, basketball, and volleyball teams
    • Internal mentoring programs, promotion and support for professional bloggers and speakers at conferences
    • Transparency and trust within the team: we encourage employee feedback and organize regular Q&A meetings with top managers
    • Free corporate English classes and professional seminars, reimbursement for external training and professional certifications
    • Corporate discounts, team-building parties, corporate events, and other perks
    • Gamification system with social activity bonuses.


  458. Senior DevOps Engineer (Remote) ("IDT Technologies", –ú–∏–Ω—Å–∫) [ 2022-05-10 ]

    Senior DevOps wanted!

    IDT is looking for a professional who'll help our Engineering Team build and deploy their code better & faster and help transition the Team to a more Agile mindset using industry standards.

    In this role, you will:

    • Work directly with the global Infrastructure Team and local engineers.
    • Be a part of the Scrum Team.
    • Provide technical guidance and educate co-workers on development and operations.
    • Manage CI and CD tools with the Team.
    • Follow all best practices and procedures established by the company.

    Our perfect colleague has:

    • Good Jenkins experience, managing and writing pipelines.
    • Experience with various AWS services.
    • Experience with —Åontainers, specifically Docker.
    • Experience with Terraform / CloudFormations.
    • Experience with Groovy or Python.
    • Good understanding of Linux and Windows operating systems.
    • Good level of English ‚Äì B2 or higher.

    It would be an advantage to have:

    • Experience with Kubernetes.
    • Experience managing artifacts (Artifactory).

    We are pleased to offer you:

    • Remote work opportunity!
    • B2B Employment ($, gross)

    About us:

    IDT is a multinational provider of cloud communications, PoS systems, unified communications, and financial services for businesses and consumers, headquartered in New Jersey. We are listed on the NYSE, employ 1300 people across 20+ countries, and have revenues over $1.5 billion.

    At IDT, we understand the challenge of being apart from those who matter most, so we create products that enable people to keep in touch and share resources worldwide.

    We are not ‚Äùanother big IT corporation‚Äù ‚Äì we encourage and support any in-house entrepreneurs to develop their ideas into business action.

    If you are here, it seems like you are interested, so let‚Äôs chat!


  459. DevOps –ò–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä ("–†-–í–∏–∂–Ω", –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞) [ 2022-05-09 ]

    –ü—Ä–∏–≤–µ—Ç!     –ù–∞—à–∏–º–∏ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–∞–º–∏ –ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É—é—Ç—Å—è –±–æ–ª–µ–µ 100 –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–π, –∏ –∏—Ö —á–∏—Å–ª–æ –ø–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–Ω–æ —Ä–∞—Å—Ç—ë—Ç! –¢–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–∏ R-Vision –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É—é—Ç—Å—è –≤ –±–∞–Ω–∫–∞—Ö, –Ω–µ—Ñ—Ç–µ–≥–∞–∑–æ–≤–æ–π –æ—Ç—Ä–∞—Å–ª–∏, —ç–Ω–µ—Ä–≥–µ—Ç–∏–∫–µ, –º–µ—Ç–∞–ª–ª—É—Ä–≥–∏–∏, –≥–æ—Å—É–¥–∞—Ä—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä–∞—Ö, –ø—Ä–æ–º—ã—à–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è—Ö –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏—Ö –æ—Ç—Ä–∞—Å–ª–µ–π.

    –ú—ã –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–≤–∞–µ–º –∏–Ω–∏—Ü–∏–∞—Ç–∏–≤—É. –ö–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è –æ—Ç–∫—Ä—ã—Ç–∞ –∫ –º–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—é –∫–∞–∂–¥–æ–≥–æ —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–∞. –£ —Ç–µ–±—è –µ—Å—Ç—å –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–µ–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ –≤–ª–∏—è—Ç—å –Ω–∞ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–∞.

    –£—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è –º–æ–∂–µ–º –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–æ–∂–∏—Ç—å —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏–µ:

    • –£—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏–µ –≤ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–µ –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤ –∏ –≤—ã–±–æ—Ä–µ —Å–æ—Ñ—Ç–∞ –∏ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–π, –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ–º—ã—Ö –≤ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–∞—Ö (–∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ, –ª–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ, —Ç—Ä–µ–π—Å–∏–Ω–≥, –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥, –º–µ—Ç—Ä–∏–∫–∏, –ë–î, –±—Ä–æ–∫–µ—Ä—ã, –æ—Ä–∫–µ—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è, –±–∞–ª–∞–Ω—Å–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∫–∞).
    • –†–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞/–ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–æ–∫ –∏ –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–π –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤.
    • –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ –≤–Ω–µ–¥—Ä–µ–Ω–∏—è –º–Ω–æ–∂–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞ –≤–∏–¥–æ–≤ –ª–∏–Ω—Ç–∏–Ω–≥–∞, —Å—Ç–∞—Ç. –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞ –∫–æ–¥–∞, –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è.
    • –£—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏–µ –≤ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤.
    • –û–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–æ–≤ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–µ –≤ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–π–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ö –∏ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞—Ö –æ—Ä–∫–µ—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏.
    • –ü–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω–∏–µ –¥–ª—è —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–æ–≤ —É–¥–æ–±–Ω–æ–π —Å—Ä–µ–¥—ã –¥–ª—è —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ –º–∏–∫—Ä–æ—Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤.
    • –†–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ –Ω–∞—à–∏—Ö —Å–æ–±—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–π –¥–ª—è –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–µ–π –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏.
    • –ê–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å–æ–±—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π —Ä—É—Ç–∏–Ω—ã –¥–µ–≤–æ–ø—Å–æ–≤. –¢.–µ. –∞–≤—Ç–æ—Ç–µ—Å—Ç—ã –Ω–∞ —Å–æ–±—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã —Å–±–æ—Ä–∫–∏, –ø–∞–π–ø–ª–∞–π–Ω—ã, –æ—Ä–≥–∞–Ω–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è –æ—Ç–∫–∞–∑–æ—É—Å—Ç–æ–π—á–∏–≤–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–≤–æ–∏—Ö –¥–µ–≤–æ–ø—Å —Ç—É–ª–∑–æ–≤, –º–µ—Ç—Ä–∏–∫–∏ –Ω–∞ —Å–æ–±—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Ç—É–ª–∑–∞—Ö, –∞–ª–µ—Ä—Ç—ã, –∞–≤—Ç–æ—á–∏—Å—Ç–∫–∏, –∏ —Ç.–¥.

    –û–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã —Ö–æ—Ä–æ—à–∏–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è/–æ–ø—ã—Ç –≤ —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏—Ö —Ç–µ–º–∞—Ö:

    –ë—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–ª—é—Å–æ–º –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —á–µ–º-–Ω–∏–±—É–¥—å –∏–∑:

  460. DevOps ("–°–ü–± –ì–£–ü –°–∞–Ω–∫—Ç-–ü–µ—Ç–µ—Ä–±—É—Ä–≥—Å–∫–∏–π –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–æ-–∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π —Ü–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä", –°–∞–Ω–∫—Ç-–ü–µ—Ç–µ—Ä–±—É—Ä–≥) [ 2022-05-09 ]

    –°–∞–Ω–∫—Ç-–ü–µ—Ç–µ—Ä–±—É—Ä–≥—Å–∫–∏–π –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–æ-–∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π —Ü–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–µ—Ç –∫–∞—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–µ –∏ –≤–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–µ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–Ω–æ–µ –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ.

    –ù–∞—à–∏ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç—ã ‚Äì —á–∞—Å—Ç—å –ø–æ–≤—Å–µ–¥–Ω–µ–≤–Ω–æ–π –∂–∏–∑–Ω–∏ —Å–æ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ –º–Ω–æ–≥–æ–º–∏–ª–ª–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ –≥–æ—Ä–æ–¥–∞. –í –Ω–∞—à–µ–º –ø–æ—Ä—Ç—Ñ–æ–ª–∏–æ –±–æ–ª–µ–µ 70 —Å–ª–æ–∂–Ω—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–æ–≤ ‚Äì —Å—Ä–µ–¥–∏ –Ω–∏—Ö –ø–æ—Ä—Ç–∞–ª –≥–æ—Å—É–¥–∞—Ä—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —É—Å–ª—É–≥ –°–∞–Ω–∫—Ç-–ü–µ—Ç–µ—Ä–±—É—Ä–≥–∞, ¬´–≠–ª–µ–∫—Ç—Ä–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–π –¥–Ω–µ–≤–Ω–∏–∫¬ª, –ø–æ—Ä—Ç–∞–ª ¬´–ù–∞—à –°–∞–Ω–∫—Ç-–ü–µ—Ç–µ—Ä–±—É—Ä–≥¬ª, Visit Petersburg –∏ –º–Ω–æ–≥–∏–µ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏–µ. –ú—ã —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–µ–º, –≤–Ω–µ–¥—Ä—è–µ–º, —Å–æ–ø—Ä–æ–≤–æ–∂–¥–∞–µ–º –∏ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏–≤–∞–µ–º –∏—Ö, —Å –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º –ª—É—á—à–∏—Ö –ø—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫ Agile –∏ Extreme Programming.

    –ú—ã –∏—â–µ–º DevOps –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞ –≤ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—É —Ü–∏—Ñ—Ä–æ–≤–æ–π —Ç—Ä–∞–Ω—Å—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –≥–æ—Å—É–¥–∞—Ä—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤.
    –ù–∞—à —Å—Ç–µ–∫: Java, React, GWT, Postgres, ElasticSearch, Spring Boot, Kafka, Kubernetes –∏ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏–µ.

    –ß–µ–º –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º–æ –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ç—å—Å—è:

    • —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã –∏ –∫–æ–Ω–≤–µ–π–µ—Ä–∞ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–µ—Ä—Ç—ã–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è CI/CD –≤ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–µ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ BI-–ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º—ã –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∏ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—è—Ç–∏—è —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω—á–µ—Å–∫–∏—Ö —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–π –Ω–∞ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ –≥–æ—Ä–æ–¥–∞ —Å –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ–º —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–π: Ansible, Kubernetes, GitLab, Nexus, Jenkins, ArgoCD
    • –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–æ—Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∏ —É—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏–Ω—Ü–∏–¥–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–Ω–æ–≥–æ –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ–º Zabbix, Prometheus, Grafana, ELK
    • –≤–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏–µ —Å –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–æ–π —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ –Ω–∞ –≤—Å–µ—Ö —Å—Ç–∞–¥–∏—è—Ö –∂–∏–∑–Ω–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ü–∏–∫–ª–∞ –æ—Ç —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–Ω—ã—Ö —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–π –¥–æ –∏—Ö —Å–æ–ø—Ä–æ–≤–æ–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏—è
    • —É—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏–µ –≤ –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑–µ –Ω–µ—à—Ç–∞—Ç–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Ç—É–∞—Ü–∏–∏, –ø—Ä–µ–¥–æ—Ç–≤—Ä–∞—â–µ–Ω–∏–∏ –∏ –±—ã—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–º —É—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–∏ –Ω–µ–∏—Å–ø—Ä–∞–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–µ–π
    • –≤–µ–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ —ç–∫—Å–ø–ª—É–∞—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–æ–π –¥–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∏ –æ—Ç—á–µ—Ç–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏
    • –≤—ã–±–æ—Ä –Ω–∞–∏–±–æ–ª–µ–µ –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥—è—â–∏—Ö –¥–ª—è —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è –∑–∞–¥–∞—á —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–π.

    –¢—Ä–µ–±—É–µ–º—ã–µ –Ω–∞–≤—ã–∫–∏:

    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è Linux —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º –æ—Ç 1 –≥–æ–¥–∞
    • —É–≤–µ—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ Linux (Debian, Ubuntu, CentOS)
    • –≤–ª–∞–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–º–∏ –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º–∏ (Ansible)
    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç —ç–∫—Å–ø–ª—É–∞—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –ò–¢ –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä —Å –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ–º —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è–º–∏ (Ansible)
    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç —ç–∫—Å–ø–ª—É–∞—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –ò–¢ –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä –Ω–∞ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–µ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–π–Ω–µ—Ä–Ω—ã—Ö —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–π (Kubernetes, Docker, Docker Swarm)
    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Gitlab, Jenkins; –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –≤ —Å–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–µ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏
    • –≤–ª–∞–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç–æ–≤—ã–º–∏ —è–∑—ã–∫–∞–º–∏ (Shell, Python)
    • –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–æ–≤ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å–µ—Ç–µ–≤—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ—Ç–æ–∫–æ–ª–æ–≤: HTTP/S, DNS, SSL
    • –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã –≤–µ–±-–ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π
    • –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–æ–≤ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –°–£–ë–î
    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ –≤–µ–±-—Å–µ—Ä–≤–µ—Ä–æ–≤ (Apache/Nginx)
    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–º–∏ –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞ (Zabbix, Prometheus)
    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—Ä–æ–ª—è –∏ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –≤–µ—Ä—Å–∏—è–º–∏ (Git, Subversion)
    • —Å—Ç—Ä–µ—Å—Å–æ—É—Å—Ç–æ–π—á–∏–≤–æ—Å—Ç—å, –æ–±—É—á–∞–µ–º–æ—Å—Ç—å –∏ –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å

    –ë—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø—Ä–µ–∏–º—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ–º:

    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –ø–æ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–∞–º DevOps
    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º —Å–±–æ—Ä–∞ –ª–æ–≥–æ–≤ (ELK)
    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–µ—Ä–æ–≤ –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π (WildFly/Glassfish/Tomcat)
    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –±–∞–∑ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö (Oracle, PostgreSQL)
    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Grafana
    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞ —Å –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ–º JMX
    • –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ SQL
    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—è–º–∏ –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–æ–π –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ (HAProxy, Corosync, Pacemaker)
    • –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –æ—Å–æ–±–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–µ–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –≤ —Å—Ä–µ–¥–∞—Ö –≤–∏—Ä—Ç—É–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ esxi, kvm.

    –£—Å–ø–µ—à–Ω–æ–º—É –∫–∞–Ω–¥–∏–¥–∞—Ç—É –º—ã –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–æ–∂–∏–º:

    • –û—Ñ–∏—Å –≤ —Ü–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä–µ –≤ 3-—Ö –º–∏–Ω—É—Ç–∞—Ö –æ—Ç —Å—Ç. –º–µ—Ç—Ä–æ ¬´–õ–∏–≥–æ–≤—Å–∫–∏–π –ø—Ä–æ—Å–ø–µ–∫—Ç¬ª
    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å –≤ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–µ –∏–ª–∏ —É–¥–∞–ª—ë–Ω–Ω–æ
    • –°—Ç–∞–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–∞—è ¬´–±–µ–ª–∞—è¬ª –∑–∞—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–Ω–∞—è –ø–ª–∞—Ç–∞, –æ–ø–ª–∞—á–∏–≤–∞–µ–º—ã–µ –æ—Ç–ø—É—Å–∫–∞ –∏ –±–æ–ª—å–Ω–∏—á–Ω—ã–µ
    • –®–∏—Ä–æ–∫–∏–µ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –¥–ª—è –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ä–æ—Å—Ç–∞
    • –û–ø–ª–∞—Ç–∞ –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è (—Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–Ω–≥–∏, —Å–µ–º–∏–Ω–∞—Ä—ã, –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∏)
    • –î–ú–°(—Å—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—è –≤–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∞)


  461. Devops –ê–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç–æ—Ä ("Russ Outdoor", –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞) map[currency:RUR from:300000 gross:false to:] [ 2022-05-08 ]
    ...ã–Ω–∫–µ - –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ, –ø—Ä–∏ –∂–µ–ª–∞–Ω–∏–∏ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å –≤ –æ...

    –ö–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è Russ Outdoor ‚Äì –∫—Ä—É–ø–Ω–µ–π—à–∏–π –æ–ø–µ—Ä–∞—Ç–æ—Ä –Ω–∞—Ä—É–∂–Ω–æ–π —Ä–µ–∫–ª–∞–º—ã –≤ –†–æ—Å—Å–∏–∏. –£ –Ω–∞—Å —Å–∞–º–æ–µ –±–æ–ª—å—à–æ–µ –∫–æ–ª–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ —Ä–µ–∫–ª–∞–º–Ω—ã—Ö –ø–æ–≤–µ—Ä—Ö–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–µ–π —Ä–∞–∑–ª–∏—á–Ω—ã—Ö —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç–æ–≤: –æ—Ç –∫–ª–∞—Å—Å–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏—Ö –±–∏–ª–±–æ—Ä–¥–æ–≤ –¥–æ –¥–∏–¥–∂–∏—Ç–∞–ª —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç–∞.

    –ú—ã —è–≤–ª—è–µ–º—Å—è —Å–∞–º–æ–π —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—á–Ω–æ–π –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–µ–π –Ω–∞ —Ä—ã–Ω–∫–µ –Ω–∞—Ä—É–∂–Ω–æ–π —Ä–µ–∫–ª–∞–º—ã. –ú—ã —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–ª–∏ —Å–æ–±—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—É—é –º–∞—Å—à—Ç–∞–±–Ω—É—é ERP-—Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—É, —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å –ø–æ —Å–±–æ—Ä—É –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –æ–± –∞—É–¥–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–∏ –Ω–∞ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–µ ClickHouse, —Å–æ–±—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π –º–∞—Ä–∫–µ—Ç–ø–ª–µ–π—Å, –ø–ª—é—Å –ø–ª–∞–Ω–∏—Ä—É—é—Ç—Å—è –Ω–æ–≤—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç—ã –ø–æ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–µ.

    –î–ª—è –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –æ—Ç–∫–∞–∑–æ—É—Å—Ç–æ–π—á–∏–≤–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∏ –¥–∞–ª—å–Ω–µ–π—à–µ–≥–æ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏—è –Ω–∞—à–∏—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º –º—ã –∏—â–µ–º –æ–ø—ã—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ DevOps –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç–æ—Ä–∞.

    –í–ê–ñ–ù–û - —ç—Ç–∞ –¥–æ–ª–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –Ω–µ —Ä—É–∫–æ–≤–æ–¥—è—â–∞—è, –Ω–∞–º –Ω—É–∂–µ–Ω –æ–ø—ã—Ç–Ω—ã–π –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –µ–¥–∏–Ω—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–º DevOps –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–º –≤ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–µ.

    –ß—Ç–æ –º—ã –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤—ã –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–æ–∂–∏—Ç—å:

    - –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ—Ä –¥–ª—è —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ —Å–≤–æ–∏—Ö –∏–¥–µ–π

    - –±–µ–ª—É—é –∑–∞—Ä–ø–ª–∞—Ç—É –≤ —Ä—ã–Ω–∫–µ

    - –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ, –ø—Ä–∏ –∂–µ–ª–∞–Ω–∏–∏ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å –≤ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–µ - –∫–æ–º—Ñ–æ—Ä—Ç–Ω—ã–π –æ—Ñ–∏—Å –Ω–∞ –ù–æ–≤–æ–π –†–∏–≥–µ (–µ—Å—Ç—å –∫–æ—Ä–ø.—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω—Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç –æ—Ç –º–µ—Ç—Ä–æ –°—Ç—Ä–æ–≥–∏–Ω–æ/–©—É–∫–∏–Ω—Å–∫–∞—è –∏ –ø–∞—Ä–∫–æ–≤–∫–∞ –¥–ª—è —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤)

    - –æ—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø–æ –¢–ö –†–§, –î–ú–°

    –ó–∞–¥–∞—á–∏:

    • –ü–æ–º–æ—â—å –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∏—Å—Ç–∞–º —Å –≤—ã–∫–∞—Ç–∫–æ–π —Ä–µ–ª–∏–∑–æ–≤ –∏ –æ—Ç–∫–∞—Ç–æ–º –æ–±—Ä–∞—Ç–Ω–æ –≤ —Å–ª—É—á–∞–µ –±–∞–≥–æ–≤
    • –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–∏—Ç—å –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥ –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –µ–≥–æ –ø—Ä–∏ –ø–æ–º–æ—â–∏ —Å—Ç–µ–∫–∞ Zabbix. Elk, Grafana
    • –ü–æ—Å—Ç–µ–ø–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π –ø–µ—Ä–µ–≤–æ–¥ –Ω–∞ git
    • –°–ª–µ–¥–∏—Ç—å –∑–∞ —Ä–µ—Å—É—Ä—Å–∞–º–∏ –∏ –±–∞–∑–æ–π –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö (mysql, ClickHouse) –∏ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–µ—Ä–æ–≤ Ubunto
    • –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ –∏ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–µ—Ä–æ–≤ nginx,apache
    • –û–±—â–µ–µ –∫–æ–ª–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–µ—Ä–æ–≤ - –±–æ–ª–µ 100, —à—Ç–∞—Ç –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∏—Å—Ç–æ–≤ 20 —á–µ–ª–æ–≤–µ–∫

    –ß—Ç–æ –Ω—É–∂–Ω–æ –æ—Ç –í–∞—Å:

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –∏ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –æ–ø–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º –Ω–∞ –±–∞–∑–µ Linux.
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å CI/–°D —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–º–∏
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–º–∏ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–µ—Ä—Ç—ã–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ (Ansible, Puppet, Chef).
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–æ–≤ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å–µ—Ä–≤–µ—Ä–æ–≤ –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π –∏ –°–£–ë–î.
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–æ–≤ –ø–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω–∏—è TCP\IP —Å—Ç–µ–∫–∞, WAN –∏ LAN —Å–µ—Ç–µ–π, –º–∞—Ä—à—Ä—É—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏, NAT.
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –≤–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏—è —Å –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–æ–π —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–æ–≤ –∏ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ source code management —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º (Git, TFS) –∏ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º –æ—Ä–≥–∞–Ω–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ —Å–æ–≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–Ω–æ–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –∫–ª–∞—Å—Å–∞ Jira\TFS\Confluence

    –ó–Ω–∞—Ç—å –∏ —É–º–µ—Ç—å —Ä–∞–∑–≤–æ—Ä–∞—á–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –∫–∞–∫ –≤ single-node, —Ç–∞–∫ –∏ –≤ cluster –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ (–≥–¥–µ –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–∏–º–æ) —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏–µ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã:

    • Kafka
    • Elastic stack
    • Redis\MemCached
    • MSSQL Server
    • Postgres\MySQL
    • RabbitMQ
    • Docker
    • ClickHouse
    • Nginx
    • Apache
    • Zabbix


  462. DevOps Engineer ("–í–°–ö, –°–ê–û", –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞) [ 2022-05-07 ]
    ...æ–¥. –£ –Ω–∞—Å –µ—Å—Ç—å: –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã; –ì—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã 5/2...

    –ö–ª—é—á–µ–≤—ã–µ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏:

    –ó–∞–¥–∞—á–∏ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–≤ –º–∏–∫—Ä–æ—Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–Ω–æ–π –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º—ã –ö–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏:

    • –ê–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ Linux-—Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º (RHEL, CentOS);
    • –ê–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–π–Ω–µ—Ä–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ (OpenShift/OKD);
    • –ê–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º—ã (Nginx, HAProxy, Gitlab, Artifactory, Keycloak, FreeIPA, Jenkins, MinIO);
    • –ù–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ pipeline Jenkins (Groovy) —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç–æ–≤;
    • –ù–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ ansible-—Ä–æ–ª–µ–π –¥–ª—è —Ä–∞–∑–≤–æ—Ä–∞—á–∏–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∏ –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º—ã;
    • –ú–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥ –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏, –ø—Ä–æ–∏–∑–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∏ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–æ–∫ –¥–ª—è —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞ (Zabbix, Prometheus, Grafana);
    • –†–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º—ã –≤ —á–∞—Å—Ç–∏ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–æ–≤ –∏ –≤–Ω–µ–¥—Ä–µ–Ω–∏—è –Ω–æ–≤—ã—Ö –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤.

    –î–ª—è –Ω–∞—Å –≤–∞–∂–Ω–æ:

    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ Linux-—Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º –Ω–∞ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç–æ—Ä–∞ (RHEL, CentOS);
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∏ –ø—Ä–∏–∫–ª–∞–¥–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º (Nginx, HAProxy, –∏ —Ç.–ø.);
    • –£–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø–∏—Å–∞—Ç—å –Ω–∞ —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç–æ–≤—ã—Ö —è–∑—ã–∫–∞—Ö (Bash, sh);
    • –£–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ —á–∏—Ç–∞—Ç—å —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫—É—é –ª–∏—Ç–µ—Ä–∞—Ç—É—Ä—É –Ω–∞ –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–º —è–∑—ã–∫–µ.

    –ë—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–ª—é—Å–æ–º:

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –Ω–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏—è —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç–æ–≤ –Ω–∞ —è–∑—ã–∫–µ Python;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –ø–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω–∏—è –Ω–µ–ø—Ä–µ—Ä—ã–≤–Ω–æ–π –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∏ –¥–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–∫–∏ (CI/CD);
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —ç–∫—Å–ø–ª—É–∞—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–π–Ω–µ—Ä–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ (OpenShift/OKD);

    • –£–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ —á–∏—Ç–∞—Ç—å/–ø–∏—Å–∞—Ç—å –∫–æ–¥.

    –£ –Ω–∞—Å –µ—Å—Ç—å:

    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã;
    • –ì—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã 5/2, –ø–Ω-—á—Ç —Å 9-00 –¥–æ 18-00, –ø—Ç —Å 9-00 –¥–æ 16-45;
    • –û—Ñ–∏—Å –≤ —Ü–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä–µ –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤—ã. 2 –º–∏–Ω—É—Ç—ã –æ—Ç –º–µ—Ç—Ä–æ.


  463. Azure DevOps / .NET Senior Engineer ("Person Hunters, –û–û–û", –¢–∞—à–∫–µ–Ω—Ç) [ 2022-05-07 ]
    ...–≤–æ; ‚Ä¢ –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ; ‚Ä¢ –ü—Ä–µ–¥–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏–...

    –û –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏

    –ï–≤—Ä–æ–ø–µ–π—Å–∫–∞—è –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è —Å–æ —à—Ç–∞–±-–∫–≤–∞—Ä—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–π –≤ –≠—Å—Ç–æ–Ω–∏–∏ –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–æ–π –ø–∞—Ä–∫–æ–≤–æ—á–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º. –°–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏–∑–∏—Ä—É–µ—Ç—Å—è –∫–∞–∫ –Ω–∞ –∑–∞–∫—Ä—ã—Ç—ã—Ö —Ç–∞–∫ –∏ –Ω–∞ –æ—Ç–∫—Ä—ã—Ç—ã—Ö —Ç–∏–ø–∞—Ö –ø–∞—Ä–∫–æ–≤–æ–∫.

    –ú—ã –∏—â–µ–º –æ–ø—ã—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ DevOps / .NET Engineer –≤ –Ω–æ–≤—ã–π –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç. –í–∞—à–∞ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∞ –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–∏—Ç—å –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—É –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º–æ–π –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–æ–π –≤ DevOps –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∞—Ö –º–∏–∫—Ä–æ—Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–Ω–æ–π –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã, –ø—Ä–∏–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ç—å –Ω–µ–ø–æ—Å—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–µ —É—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏–µ –≤ –Ω–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –∫–æ–¥–∞, –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã —Å –Ω—É–ª—è —Å–æ–≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–Ω–æ —Å –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏–º–∏ —á–ª–µ–Ω–∞–º–∏ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã.

    –¢–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π —Å—Ç–µ–∫

    –ú—ã —Å—Ç—Ä–µ–º–∏–º—Å—è —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞—Ç—å –æ–±–ª–∞—á–Ω—É—é –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º—É —Å –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä–æ–π –º–∏–∫—Ä–æ—Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤, –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—É—é –Ω–∞ –Ω–æ–≤–µ–π—à–∏—Ö —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—è—Ö:

    ‚Ä¢ .NET 5;

    ‚Ä¢ –Ø–¥—Ä–æ Entity Framework;

    ‚Ä¢ –ë–∞–∑–∞ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö Azure –¥–ª—è PostgreSQL;

    ‚Ä¢ Docker –∏ —Å–ª—É–∂–±–∞ Azure Kubernetes;

    ‚Ä¢ gRPC;

    ‚Ä¢ –°–ª—É–∂–µ–±–Ω–∞—è —à–∏–Ω–∞ Azure / RabbitMQ;

    ‚Ä¢ Redis;

    ‚Ä¢ Elasticsearch/Logstash/Kibana.

    –¢—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è:

    ‚Ä¢ –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã DevOps –æ—Ç 3-—Ö –ª–µ—Ç;

    ‚Ä¢ –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Doker –∏ K8S;

    ‚Ä¢ –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Azure –æ—Ç 2-—Ö –ª–µ—Ç;

    ‚Ä¢ –û–ø—ã—Ç –ø–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω–∏—è –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã —Å –Ω—É–ª—è;

    ‚Ä¢ –ü–æ–∑–∏—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–π –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π –∏ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ –≤ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–µ;

    ‚Ä¢ –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–∑–≤–µ—Ä—Ç—ã–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –≤ –æ–±–ª–∞–∫–µ Azure

    ‚Ä¢ –û–ø—ã—Ç –æ–±—ä–µ–∫—Ç–Ω–æ-–æ—Ä–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è (–û–û–ü);

    ‚Ä¢ –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –º–µ—Ç–æ–¥–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–∏ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ Agile;

    ‚Ä¢ –ü—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è –º–∏–∫—Ä–æ—Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–Ω–æ–π –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã;

    ‚Ä¢ –°–≤–æ–±–æ–¥–Ω–æ–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –†—É—Å—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ –∏–ª–∏ –ê–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ —è–∑—ã–∫–∞.

    –£—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è:

    ‚Ä¢ –û—Ñ–∏—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ —Ç—Ä—É–¥–æ—É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤–æ;

    ‚Ä¢ –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ;

    ‚Ä¢ –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–µ–ª–µ–≥–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –≤ –ï–≤—Ä–æ–ø—É;

    ‚Ä¢ –í—ã—Å–æ–∫–∏–π —É—Ä–æ–≤–µ–Ω—å –∑–∞—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–Ω–æ–π –ø–ª–∞—Ç—ã (1000$+, –∞ —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤—ã –æ–±—Å—É–¥–∏—Ç—å –ª—é–±—ã–µ –≤–∞—à–∏ –ø–æ–∂–µ–ª–∞–Ω–∏—è).


  464. Junior DevOps Consultant ("Person Hunters, –û–û–û", –¢–∞—à–∫–µ–Ω—Ç) [ 2022-05-07 ]
    ...progress ‚Ä¢ Flexible working hours and partially remote work. Your daily tasks: In the role of Senior...

    About the company

    We help companies modernize IT infrastructure with a focus on Kubernetes, cloud native, container technology, hybrid cloud, IaC, CI/CD, automation and DevOps. We are now looking for new colleagues in Junior DevOps Consultant role.

    Linux and open source are in our DNA, and we are constantly evolving by sharing knowledge with each other. We invest heavily in skills development through a generous training budget, and our employees are rewarded for keeping their skills at the cutting edge.

    Our offices in:

    Riga, Latvia.

    Tashkent, Uzbekistan

    Our clients from: Latvia, Sweden, Finland, Norway.

    We are looking for a DevOps Consultant who wants to work with our customers who are leading companies in the Nordic region and Western Europe. You will work as an integral part of our clients' team to ensure security, availability, performance, scalability and automation of infrastructure.

    In addition to this, an important part of the job will be to build and deploy (CI/CD) pipelines.

    Working as a DevOps Consultant, it is important that you are communicative and have the ability to work well with others.

    Requirements:

    ‚Ä¢ Competence in Linux

    ‚Ä¢ Experience of different working methods linked to DevOps

    ‚Ä¢ Proficient in scripting or programming

    ‚Ä¢ Fluent in English

    Will be an advantage:

    ‚Ä¢ Experience of technologies for deployment and orchestration

    ‚Ä¢ Experience from one or more of the major cloud platforms AWS, GCP or Azure

    Tools you will use:

    ‚Ä¢ Kubernetes, Docker, Istio, Ansible, Terraform and Jenkins

    ‚Ä¢ Azure DevOps and AWS CodePipeline

    ‚Ä¢ OpenShift, Rancher or Mirantis container platform

    We offer you:

    ‚Ä¢ Latvian Residence permit for 5 years

    ‚Ä¢ Residence permit for 5 years for family members

    ‚Ä¢ Work in modern office in Riga or Tashkent

    ‚Ä¢ The prospect of moving and working in an office in Germany or Portugal

    ‚Ä¢ Health insurance

    ‚Ä¢ Development of competence and skills to become a world-class Kubernetes expert

    ‚Ä¢ Daily uninterrupted time for education and professional growth (up to 1.5h)

    ‚Ä¢ Individual development practice designed by professional coach

    ‚Ä¢ Regular feedback from your coach/mentor on your development progress

    ‚Ä¢ Flexible working hours and partially remote work.

    Your daily tasks:

    In the role of Senior DevOps consultant, you are offered an opportunity to work with exciting challenges and projects in modern IT environments where scalability, security and automation are a priority.

    You will work with longer assignments of 6 months to 2 years, where you will be challenged and get to use your skills in the best way. For those who want, this can be combined with shorter specialist assignments, training and workshops. You are offered a permanent job with secure terms and generous compensation.

    During assignments, you will work as part of the customer's team, remotely or on site.

    ‚Ä¢ Building Kubernetes environments on cloud platforms as a service;

    ‚Ä¢ Assisting international customers with building and development of their Kubernetes environments (public/private cloud or in-house);

    ‚Ä¢ Operation of cloud platforms (building, resource planning and management, maintenance of operation, diagnostics and troubleshooting, interaction with data centers).


  465. Middle DevOps Consultant ("Person Hunters, –û–û–û", –¢–∞—à–∫–µ–Ω—Ç) [ 2022-05-07 ]
    ...progress ‚Ä¢ Flexible working hours and partially remote work. ‚Ä¢ High salary range (Ready to discuss you...

    About the company

    We help companies modernize IT infrastructure with a focus on Kubernetes, cloud native, container technology, hybrid cloud, IaC, CI/CD, automation and DevOps. We are now looking for new colleagues in Mid-level DevOps Consultant role.

    Linux and open source are in our DNA, and we are constantly evolving by sharing knowledge with each other. We invest heavily in skills development through a generous training budget, and our employees are rewarded for keeping their skills at the cutting edge.

    Our offices in:

    Riga, Latvia.

    Tashkent, Uzbekistan

    Our clients from: Latvia, Sweden, Finland, Norway.

    We are looking for a DevOps Consultant who wants to work with our customers who are leading companies in the Nordic region and Western Europe. You will work as an integral part of our clients' team to ensure security, availability, performance, scalability and automation of infrastructure.

    In addition to this, an important part of the job will be to build and deploy (CI/CD) pipelines.

    Working as a DevOps Consultant, it is important that you are communicative and have the ability to work well with others.

    Requirements:

    ‚Ä¢ Competence in Linux

    ‚Ä¢ Experience of different working methods linked to DevOps

    ‚Ä¢ Experience of technologies for deployment and orchestration

    ‚Ä¢ Proficient in scripting or programming

    ‚Ä¢ Fluent in English

    Will be an advantage:

    ‚Ä¢ Experience from one or more of the major cloud platforms AWS, GCP or Azure

    Tools you will use:

    ‚Ä¢ Kubernetes, Docker, Istio, Ansible, Terraform and Jenkins

    ‚Ä¢ Azure DevOps and AWS CodePipeline

    ‚Ä¢ OpenShift, Rancher or Mirantis container platform

    The company offers:

    ‚Ä¢ Latvian Residence permit for 5 years

    ‚Ä¢ Residence permit for 5 years for family members

    ‚Ä¢ Work in modern office in Riga or Tashkent

    ‚Ä¢ The prospect of moving and working in an office in Germany or Portugal

    ‚Ä¢ Health insurance

    ‚Ä¢ Development of competence and skills to become a world-class Kubernetes expert

    ‚Ä¢ Daily uninterrupted time for education and professional growth (up to 1.5h)

    ‚Ä¢ Individual development practice designed by professional coach

    ‚Ä¢ Regular feedback from your coach/mentor on your development progress

    ‚Ä¢ Flexible working hours and partially remote work.

    ‚Ä¢ High salary range (Ready to discuss your requests). From 1000USD and higher

    Your daily tasks:

    In the role of Senior DevOps consultant, you are offered an opportunity to work with exciting challenges and projects in modern IT environments where scalability, security and automation are a priority.

    You will work with longer assignments of 6 months to 2 years, where you will be challenged and get to use your skills in the best way. For those who want, this can be combined with shorter specialist assignments, training and workshops. You are offered a permanent job with secure terms and generous compensation.

    During assignments, you will work as part of the customer's team, remotely or on site.

    ‚Ä¢ Building Kubernetes environments on cloud platforms as a service;

    ‚Ä¢ Assisting international customers with building and development of their Kubernetes environments (public/private cloud or in-house);

    ‚Ä¢ Operation of cloud platforms (building, resource planning and management, maintenance of operation, diagnostics and troubleshooting, interaction with data centers).


  466. DevOps-—Å—Ç–∞–∂—ë—Ä ("AGIMA", –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞) [ 2022-05-06 ]
    ...∏—Ö —á–∞—Å–æ–≤ –≤ –Ω–µ–¥–µ–ª—é; –æ—Ñ–∏—Å –∏–ª–∏ —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã; –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–∏–ª—å...

    –ú—ã –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è AGIMA, –∫—Ä—É–ø–Ω–µ–π—à–∏–π –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ç–æ—Ä digital-—Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–π –≤ –†–æ—Å—Å–∏–∏ —Å –æ–¥–Ω–æ–π –∏–∑ —Å–∏–ª—å–Ω–µ–π—à–∏—Ö –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏. –° 2006 –≥–æ–¥–∞ –º—ã –≤—ã–ø—É—Å—Ç–∏–ª–∏ –±–æ–ª–µ–µ 500 –∫—Ä—É–ø–Ω—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–æ–≤ –∏ —É—Å–ø–µ–ª–∏ –ø–æ—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —Å —Ç–∞–∫–∏–º–∏ –∫—Ä—É–ø–Ω—ã–º–∏ –∑–∞–∫–∞–∑—á–∏–∫–∞–º–∏, –∫–∞–∫ X5 Retail Group, –ú–µ–≥–∞–§–æ–Ω, –ê–ª—å—Ñ–∞–°—Ç—Ä–∞—Ö–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ, –õ–µ—Ä—É–∞ –ú–µ—Ä–ª–µ–Ω, MARS, O‚ÄôStin, –°–ø–æ—Ä—Ç–º–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä, –ú.–í–∏–¥–µ–æ –∏ –º–Ω–æ–≥–∏–º–∏ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏–º–∏.

    –û—Ç–∫—Ä—ã–≤–∞–µ–º —Å—Ç–∞–∂–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∫—É –≤ –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–∏ DevOps. –í—ã –±—É–¥–µ—Ç–µ –ø–æ–º–æ–≥–∞—Ç—å –≤ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–µ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤ –Ω–∞—à–∏—Ö –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤, –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥ –∏ –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –±–µ—Å–ø–µ—Ä–µ–±–æ–π–Ω—É—é —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—É. –ê –µ—â–µ —É—á–∞—Å—Ç–≤–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –≤ –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–µ –Ω–æ–≤—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤ –∏ —É–ª—É—á—à–∞—Ç—å –∫–∞—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ –∏—Ö —ç–∫—Å–ø–ª—É–∞—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏. –£ –Ω–∞—Å –≤—ã —Å–º–æ–∂–µ—Ç–µ –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–∏—Ç—å –Ω–∞ –ø—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫–µ —Å–≤–æ–∏ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è –≤ –æ–±–ª–∞—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ DevOps.

    –ß—Ç–æ –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–æ–∏—Ç –¥–µ–ª–∞—Ç—å:

    • –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω—é—é –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—É –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏;

    • —Ä–∞–∑–≤–æ—Ä–∞—á–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å—Ä–µ–¥—ã –¥–ª—è —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ (Kubernetes –∏ –≤–µ—Å—å —Å–æ–ø—É—Ç—Å—Ç–≤—É—é—â–∏–π —Å—Ç–µ–∫);

    • —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å DevOps –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –∏ –∑–∞ –µ–µ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–∞–º–∏.

    –°—Ç–µ–∫ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–π:

    • Linux;

    • LAMP;

    • Docker, Kubernetes;

    • Ansible;

    • Zabbix.

    –ú—ã –æ–∂–∏–¥–∞–µ–º, —á—Ç–æ –≤—ã:

    • –∑–Ω–∞–µ—Ç–µ Linux –Ω–∞ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç–æ—Ä–∞;

    • –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–µ—Ç–µ, –∫–∞–∫ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—é—Ç —Å–æ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –≤–µ–±-—Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å—ã;

    • –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ –∫ –¥–µ–ª—É;

    • –¥–æ–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ –Ω–∞—á–∞—Ç–æ–µ –¥–æ –∫–æ–Ω—Ü–∞;

    • –æ–±–ª–∞–¥–∞–µ—Ç–µ –º–∏–Ω–∏–º–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–º –∫—Ä—É–≥–æ–∑–æ—Ä–æ–º –≤ –æ–±–ª–∞—Å—Ç–∏ IT –∏–ª–∏ —Å—Ç–æ–π–∫–∏–º –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–æ–º –∫ —ç—Ç–∏–º —Å—Ñ–µ—Ä–∞–º;

    • —Ö–æ—Ç–∏—Ç–µ —Ä–∞—Å—Ç–∏ –∏ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–µ —Å –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–µ–π.

    –ñ–µ–ª–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ:

    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Docker, Kubernetes.

    –ß—Ç–æ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ–º:

    • 3 –º–µ—Å—è—Ü–∞ –±–µ—Å–ø–ª–∞—Ç–Ω–æ–π —Å—Ç–∞–∂–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∫–∏ —Å –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–µ–≥–æ —Ç—Ä—É–¥–æ—É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∞;

    • –≥–∏–±–∫–∏–π –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã, –Ω–µ –º–µ–Ω–µ–µ 20 —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–∏—Ö —á–∞—Å–æ–≤ –≤ –Ω–µ–¥–µ–ª—é;

    • –æ—Ñ–∏—Å –∏–ª–∏ —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã;

    • –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –º–µ—Ä–æ–ø—Ä–∏—è—Ç–∏—è –≤ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–µ –∏ –∑–∞ –µ–≥–æ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–∞–º–∏;

    • –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –¥–ª—è —Ä–æ—Å—Ç–∞, –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏ —ç–∫—Å–ø–µ—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤;

    • –¥—Ä—É–∂–Ω–∞—è –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞ —Å —è—Ä–∫–æ–π –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ–π –∂–∏–∑–Ω—å—é.


  467. DevOPS engineer (PlanIt) - –ì—Ä—É–∑–∏—è, –≠—Å—Ç–æ–Ω–∏—è, –ò—Å–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è ("DINS", –°–∞–Ω–∫—Ç-–ü–µ—Ç–µ—Ä–±—É—Ä–≥) [ 2022-05-06 ]

    –ù–∞—à–∏ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞—é—Ç —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å PlanIt, —Ü–µ–ª—å –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–≥–æ –ø–æ–º–æ—á—å –ø–ª–∞–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—Ä–æ–ª–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å—ã —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ –ü–û –Ω–∞ –≤—Å–µ—Ö —ç—Ç–∞–ø–∞—Ö, —Ç–∞–∫–∏—Ö –∫–∞–∫ –ø–ª–∞–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–µ–ª–∏–∑–æ–≤, —Ä–µ—Å—É—Ä—Å –º–µ–Ω–µ–¥–∂–º–µ–Ω—Ç, —Ä–∞–∑–ª–∏—á–Ω—ã–µ –≤–∏–¥—ã —Ä–µ–ø–æ—Ä—Ç–∏–Ω–≥–∞ –∏ —Ç. –¥.

    –ù–∞ –ø—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫–µ PlanIt —ç—Ç–æ –º–Ω–æ–∂–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ –º–∏–∫—Ä–æ—Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤, —Ä–∞–∑–ª–∏—á–Ω—ã–º–∏ –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä–Ω—ã–º–∏ —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è–º–∏ –∏ —Ü–µ–ª—è–º–∏. –ù–∞—á–∏–Ω–∞—è –æ—Ç –∑–∞–¥–∞—á –¥–≤—É—Ö—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–Ω–Ω–µ–π —Å–∏–Ω—Ö—Ä–æ–Ω–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∏ –∑–∞–∫–∞–Ω—á–∏–≤–∞—è –ø–æ—Ç–æ–∫–æ–≤–æ–π –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–æ–π –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –∏ –æ—Ç—á–µ—Ç–∞–º–∏ –≤ —Ä–µ–∂–∏–º–µ —Ä–µ–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ –≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–∏.

    –ù–µ–º–Ω–æ–≥–æ –æ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞—Ö –∏ –Ω–∞—à–∏—Ö —Ü–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—è—Ö:

    • –†–µ—à–∞—è –ª—é–±—É—é –∑–∞–¥–∞—á—É –º—ã —Å—Ç–∞—Ä–∞–µ–º—Å—è –Ω–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ —Å–¥–µ–ª–∞—Ç—å –µ–µ, –∞ —Ç–∞–∫ —Å–∫–∞–∑–∞—Ç—å —Å–¥–µ–ª–∞—Ç—å –º–∏—Ä –ª—É—á—à–µ;

    • –ú—ã –ø–æ–æ—â—Ä—è–µ–º –∏–Ω–∏—Ü–∏–∞—Ç–∏–≤—É, –µ—Å–ª–∏ –≤—ã —Ö–æ—Ç–∏—Ç–µ —É–ª—É—á—à–∏—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å, –º—ã –≤—Å–µ–≥–¥–∞ –∑–∞;

    • –ú—ã —Å—Ç—Ä–µ–º–∏–º—Å—è —Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –≤—Å–µ–º –∞—Å–ø–µ–∫—Ç–∞–º Agile —Ç–∞–∫–∏–º –∫–∞–∫ daily standup meetings, retrospective, plannings, demos for stakeholders –∏ —Ç–∞–∫ –¥–∞–ª–µ–µ;

    • –£ –Ω–∞—Å –≤—Å–µ —Ä–µ–±—è—Ç–∞ –ø–æ–º–æ–≥–∞—é—Ç –Ω–æ–≤–µ–Ω—å–∫–æ–º—É –≤–ª–∏—Ç—å—Å—è –≤ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—É;

    • –ú—ã —Å—Ç—Ä–µ–º–∏–º—Å—è —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞—Ç—å –∫–æ–º—Ñ–æ—Ä—Ç–Ω—ã–µ —É—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è –¥–ª—è —Ä–µ–±—è—Ç –Ω–∞—á–∏–Ω–∞—è —Å –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–Ω—ã—Ö –∑–∞–¥–∞—á –∏ –∑–∞–∫–∞–Ω—á–∏–≤–∞—è –µ–∂–µ–º–µ—Å—è—á–Ω—ã–º–∏ –≤—Å—Ç—Ä–µ—á–∞–º–∏ –≤ —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç–µ One To One, –∞ —Ç–∞–∫ –∂–µ –ª–∏—á–Ω–æ–≥–æ Roadmap–∞ –¥–ª—è –∫–∞–∂–¥–æ–≥–æ.

    –í–∞–º –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–æ–∏—Ç:

    –ú—ã –∏—â–µ–º —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏—Å—Ç–∞, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–º—É –Ω—Ä–∞–≤–∏—Ç—Å—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —Å Kubernetes, Argo CD, Helm –∏ Docker. –í–∞–º –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–æ–∏—Ç —Ä–∞–∑–≤–æ—Ä–∞—á–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å —Ä–∞—Å–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã —Ç–∞–∫–∏–µ –∫–∞–∫ Kafka, MongoDB, Elasticsearch, MinIO, –∞ —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è –Ω–∞ –∏—Ö –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–µ. –ü–µ—Ä–µ–¥ —Ç–æ–±–æ–π –±—É–¥—É—Ç —Å—Ç–æ—è—Ç—å –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏ –ø–æ–≤—ã—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∫–∞–∫ —Å—Ç–∞–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Ç–∞–∫ –∏ –ø—Ä–æ–∏–∑–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º.

    –ù–∞—à–∏ –æ–∂–∏–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è:

    • –û—Ç–ª–∏—á–Ω—ã–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è Kubernetes –∏ Docker;

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã Gitlab CI, Argo CD, Helm;

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —ç–∫—Å–ø–ª—É–∞—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏ —Ä–∞—Å–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º –∏ –ø–æ–≤—ã—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–∏–∑–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏;

    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–æ–≤ –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞ –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π;

    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ö–æ—Ç—è –±—ã –æ–¥–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç–æ–≤–æ–≥–æ —è–∑—ã–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è;

    • –¢–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–∏–π —è–∑—ã–∫.

    –ë—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–ª—é—Å–æ–º:

    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ AWX/Ansible;

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å AWS.

    –ú—ã –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ–º:

    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å –≤ –∏–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–º —é—Ä–∏–¥–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–º –ª–∏—Ü–µ (–ì—Ä—É–∑–∏—è), –¥–∞–ª—å–Ω–µ–π—à—É—é —Ä–µ–ª–æ–∫–∞—Ü–∏—é –≤ –≠—Å—Ç–æ–Ω–∏—é –∏–ª–∏ –ò—Å–ø–∞–Ω–∏—é.

    • –†–µ–ª–æ–∫–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–π –ø–∞–∫–µ—Ç.

    • –®–∏—Ä–æ–∫–∏–µ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –¥–ª—è —Å–∞–º–æ—Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏, –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∏ –∫–∞—Ä—å–µ—Ä–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ä–æ—Å—Ç–∞.

    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –≤–Ω–æ—Å–∏—Ç—å —Å–≤–æ–π –≤–∫–ª–∞–¥ –≤ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ —Ä–∞—Å—Ç—É—â–µ–≥–æ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∞.

    • –ö–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞ –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–≥-–ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª–æ–≤, –±–æ–ª–µ—é—â–∏—Ö –∑–∞ —Å–≤–æ–π –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç.

    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –≤ –≥–∏–±–∫–æ–º –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫–µ.

    • –ò–Ω–¥–µ–∫—Å–∏—Ä—É–µ–º—É—é –∑–∞—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–Ω—É—é –ø–ª–∞—Ç—É, –æ–ø–ª–∞—Ç—É –±–æ–ª—å–Ω–∏—á–Ω—ã—Ö –∏ –æ—Ç–ø—É—Å–∫–æ–≤ (–≤ —Å–æ–æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–∏–∏ —Å –∑–∞–∫–æ–Ω–æ–¥–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å—Å—Ç–≤–æ–º —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω—ã –æ—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è).

    • –ö–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–µ –æ–±—É—á–∞—é—â–∏–µ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º—ã, –∫—É—Ä—Å—ã –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ —è–∑—ã–∫–∞.


  468. DevOps ‚Å¢Engineer ("OneTwoTrip", –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞) [ 2022-05-06 ]
    ...–∂–µ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–µ–Ω –≤–∞—Ä–∏–∞–Ω—Ç –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ–π —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –†–∞–±–æ—Ç—É –ø–æ –≥–∏–±–∫–æ–º...

    OneTwoTrip ‚Äî –æ–¥–∏–Ω –∏–∑ —Å–∞–º—ã—Ö –≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–æ—Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—á–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤ –ø—É—Ç–µ—à–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∏–π. –ï–∂–µ–¥–Ω–µ–≤–Ω–æ –Ω–∞ –Ω–∞—à–µ–º —Å–∞–π—Ç–µ –∏ –≤ –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ–º –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–∏ –¥–µ—Å—è—Ç–∫–∏ –º–∏–ª–ª–∏–æ–Ω–æ–≤ –ø–æ–∏—Å–∫–æ–≤—ã—Ö –∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å–æ–≤ –ø—Ä–µ–≤—Ä–∞—â–∞—é—Ç—Å—è –≤ –¥–µ—Å—è—Ç–∫–∏ —Ç—ã—Å—è—á –ø—É—Ç–µ—à–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∏–π. –ë–æ–ª–µ–µ 7 –º–ª–Ω —á–µ–ª–æ–≤–µ–∫ ‚Äî –Ω–∞—à–∏ –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç—ã.

    –ù–∞—à —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª–µ–Ω, –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç –∏ —É–¥–æ–±–µ–Ω –≤ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–∏. –° –µ–≥–æ –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å—é –º–æ–∂–Ω–æ –ø—Ä–∏–æ–±—Ä–µ—Å—Ç–∏ –±–∏–ª–µ—Ç –Ω–∞ —Å–∞–º–æ–ª—ë—Ç, –ø–æ–µ–∑–¥ –∏–ª–∏ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–±—É—Å, –∑–∞–±—Ä–æ–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –æ—Ç–µ–ª—å –∏–ª–∏ –∞—Ä–µ–Ω–¥–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –∞–≤—Ç–æ –∏ –¥–∞–∂–µ –∑–∞–∫–∞–∑–∞—Ç—å —ç–∫—Å–∫—É—Ä—Å–∏—é. –°–ª–æ–≤–æ–º, OneTwoTrip –ø–æ–º–æ–≥–∞–µ—Ç –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é —Å–ø–ª–∞–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –±—É–¥—É—â—É—é –ø–æ–µ–∑–¥–∫—É, –ø—Ä–∏–æ–±—Ä–µ—Ç–∞—è –≤—Å–µ —Ç—Ä–µ–≤–µ–ª-–ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç—ã –≤ –æ–¥–Ω–æ–º –º–µ—Å—Ç–µ: –≤ –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–∏ –∏–ª–∏ –Ω–∞ —Å–∞–π—Ç–µ.

    –°–ª—É–∂–±–∞ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∏ –æ–∫–∞–∑—ã–≤–∞–µ—Ç –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å –ø—É—Ç–µ—à–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–∏–∫–∞–º 24/7, –ø—Ä–∏–Ω–∏–º–∞—è –æ–±—Ä–∞—â–µ–Ω–∏—è, –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É—è –≤—Å–µ —Å–æ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –∫–∞–Ω–∞–ª—ã –∫–æ–º–º—É–Ω–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏–∏. –ê –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞ –Ω–µ–ø—Ä–µ—Ä—ã–≤–Ω–æ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ—Ç –Ω–∞–¥ –∫–∞—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ–º –∏ —Å–∫–æ—Ä–æ—Å—Ç—å—é –ø–æ–∏—Å–∫–∞, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã –ø—É—Ç–µ—à–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–∏–∫–∏ –Ω–∞—Ö–æ–¥–∏–ª–∏ –ª—É—á—à–∏–µ –≤–∞—Ä–∏–∞–Ω—Ç—ã –∏ —Ü–µ–Ω—ã –Ω–∞ –æ—Ç–µ–ª–∏, –±–∏–ª–µ—Ç—ã –∏ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏–µ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç—ã.
    –ú—ã –≤—Å–µ–≥–¥–∞ –∏—â–µ–º —Ç–∞–ª–∞–Ω—Ç–ª–∏–≤—ã—Ö –∏ –∞–º–±–∏—Ü–∏–æ–∑–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏—Å—Ç–æ–≤ –∏ —Ä—É–∫–æ–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª–µ–π. –ü—Ä–∏—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ –∫ –Ω–∞–º —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å –∏ —Ä–µ–∫–æ–º–µ–Ω–¥—É–π—Ç–µ –¥—Ä—É–∑—å—è–º!

    –°–µ–π—á–∞—Å –º—ã –∏—â–µ–º DevOps –≤ –Ω–∞—à—É –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—É!

    –ò—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ–º—ã–µ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–∏:

    Chef, Ruby, Golang, NodeJS, Ubuntu,

    Riak, MySQL, Postgresql, MongoDB, Redis

    Docker, Kubernetes, Nginx, AWS

    Bosun, Kibana, Grafana, OpenTSDB, ElasticSearch, Prometheus

    Jenkins, Git (BitBucket –∏ GitLab)

    –û—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—ã–µ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏:

    • –†–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã
    • –ü–æ–∏—Å–∫ –∏ —É—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–µ–ø–æ–ª–∞–¥–æ–∫ –≤ –±–æ—é
    • –†–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ DevOps –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤
    • –ê–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è, —Å–±–æ—Ä–∫–∏ –∏ –¥–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–∫–∏ –∫–æ–¥–∞
    • –î–æ—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ —Å–≤–æ–±–æ–¥–Ω—ã—Ö open source —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–π –ø–æ–¥ –Ω—É–∂–¥—ã –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏

    –ß—Ç–æ –º—ã –æ–∂–∏–¥–∞–µ–º –æ—Ç –≤–∞—Å:

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–º–∏ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–µ–π Chef, Puppet, Ansible –∏–ª–∏ Salt (–º—ã –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ–º Chef).
    • –ü—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è. –£–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏ –∂–µ–ª–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø–∏—Å–∞—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ–π –∏ –∫–æ—Ä—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–Ω—ã–π –∫–æ–¥.
    • –û—Ç–ª–∏—á–Ω–æ–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ Linux –∏ –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è SQL –∏ NoSQL –±–∞–∑ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö
    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–æ–≤ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–π–Ω–µ—Ä–Ω–æ–π –≤–∏—Ä—Ç—É–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ (Docker).
    • –í–ª–∞–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–º –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–∏–º

    –ú—ã –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ–º:

    • –î–ú–°
    • –ë–æ–Ω—É—Å—ã –∏ –ø—Ä–µ–º–∏–∏ –∑–∞ —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç: –º—ã –ª—é–±–∏–º —Å—Ç—Ä–æ–∏—Ç—å —Å–º–µ–ª—ã–µ –ø–ª–∞–Ω—ã –∏ –µ—â–µ –±–æ–ª—å—à–µ –ª—é–±–∏–º –≤–æ–ø–ª–æ—â–∞—Ç—å –∏—Ö
    • –ò–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–Ω—ã–µ –∏ –∞–º–±–∏—Ü–∏–æ–∑–Ω—ã–µ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏
    • –ù–µ–æ–≥—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—á–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–π —Ä–æ—Å—Ç –∏ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —Å —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–π —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–æ–π –º–∏—Ä–æ–≤–æ–≥–æ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω—è
    • –†–µ—Å—É—Ä—Å—ã –Ω–∞ —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—é —Å–º–µ–ª—ã—Ö –∏–¥–µ–π, –∏–¥—É—â–∏—Ö –Ω–∞ –ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å—É
    • –ì–∏–±—Ä–∏–¥–Ω—ã–π —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã: 2 –¥–Ω—è –≤ –Ω–µ–¥–µ–ª—é - –∏–∑ –¥–æ–º–∞, 3 –¥–Ω—è - –∏–∑ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–∞. –¢–∞–∫–∂–µ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–µ–Ω –≤–∞—Ä–∏–∞–Ω—Ç –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ–π —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã
    • –†–∞–±–æ—Ç—É –ø–æ –≥–∏–±–∫–æ–º—É –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫—É –≤ —É—é—Ç–Ω–æ–º –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–µ –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤—ã —Ä—è–¥–æ–º —Å –º–µ—Ç—Ä–æ ¬´–î–º–∏—Ç—Ä–æ–≤—Å–∫–∞—è¬ª.
    • –ü–æ—Å–µ—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –º–µ—Ä–æ–ø—Ä–∏—è—Ç–∏–π, –±–∏–±–ª–∏–æ—Ç–µ–∫—É —Å —Ö–æ—Ä–æ—à–∏–º–∏ –∫–Ω–∏–≥–∞–º–∏ –∏ –æ–±–º–µ–Ω –æ–ø—ã—Ç–æ–º —Å –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–Ω—ã–º–∏ –ª—é–¥—å–º–∏
